GP12garup2_u:5: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayamudīrayet // GarP_2,1.Mang //
GP12garup2_u:11: tena naḥ sandihānānāṃ sandehaṃ chettumarhasi // GarP_2,1.3 //
GP12garup2_u:17: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahābhāgāḥ śṛṇudhvaṃ bhavatāṃ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:18: sandeho nopapadyeta lokārthaṃ kila pṛcchatām // GarP_2,1.6 //
GP12garup2_u:21: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya munaye ya enaṃ samupāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:24: babhūva so 'tha babhrāma teṣu nāma harergṛṇan // GarP_2,1.9 //
GP12garup2_u:27: na rajo na tamaścaiva sattvaṃ tābhyāṃ ca miśritam /
GP12garup2_u:28: yatra pravartate naiva sattvameva pravartate // GarP_2,1.11 //
GP12garup2_u:29: na yatra māyā nāśaśca na cai rāgādayo malāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:38: dadarśa śrīhariṃ tatra śrīpatiṃ sātvatāṃ patim // GarP_2,1.16 //
GP12garup2_u:42: kirīṭinaṃ kuṇḍalinaṃ śriyā vakṣasi lakṣitam // GarP_2,1.18 //
GP12garup2_u:55: bhūrlokātsatyaparyantaṃ puraṃ yāmyaṃ vinā prabho // GarP_2,1.24 //
GP12garup2_u:58: ataḥ sukṛtināṃ loko na bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,1.26 //
GP12garup2_u:59: gāyanti devāḥ kila gītakāni dhanyāstu ye bhāratabhūmibhāge /
GP12garup2_u:60: svargāpavargasya phalārjanāya bhavanti bhūyaḥ puruṣāḥ suratvāt // GarP_2,1.27 //
GP12garup2_u:62: adhastāccālitā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitau // GarP_2,1.28 //
GP12garup2_u:64: kimarthaṃ dīyate dānaṃ godānamapi keśava // GarP_2,1.29 //
GP12garup2_u:66: tilālohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,1.30 //
GP12garup2_u:68: kathaṃ hi mriyate janturmṛto vai kutra gacchati // GarP_2,1.31 //
GP12garup2_u:69: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ hi śrayate tadā /
GP12garup2_u:70: śavaṃ skandhe vahetputro agnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,1.32 //
GP12garup2_u:72: vasundharā kimarthaṃ ca kutaḥ strīśabdakīrtanam // GarP_2,1.33 //
GP12garup2_u:76: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,1.35 //
GP12garup2_u:77: annādyaṃ gṛhamāgatya na bhoktavyaṃ janaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:78: navakāṃścaiva piṇḍāṃśca kimarthaṃ dadate sutāḥ // GarP_2,1.36 //
GP12garup2_u:79: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ yātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:80: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ gaṇābaddhaṃ kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,1.37 //
GP12garup2_u:82: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca kimarthaṃ ca janaiḥ saha // GarP_2,1.38 //
GP12garup2_u:84: kathaṃ deyaṃ pitṛbhyaśca vāhasyāvāhanaṃ katham // GarP_2,1.39 //
GP12garup2_u:88: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije // GarP_2,1.41 //
GP12garup2_u:89: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:92: daśame 'hani yatpiṇḍaṃ taddadyā dāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,1.43 //
GP12garup2_u:96: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśaitāni abdaṃ yāvatkuto ghaṭaḥ // GarP_2,1.45 //
GP12garup2_u:98: dinedine ca dātavyaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pretatṛptaye // GarP_2,1.46 //
GP12garup2_u:99: prāpte kāle vai mriyate anityā mānavāḥ prabho // GarP_2,1.47 //
GP12garup2_u:100: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:102: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca // GarP_2,1.48 //
GP12garup2_u:104: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cātyayam // GarP_2,1.49 //
GP12garup2_u:106: tṛṣṇā kāmo hyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdanā // GarP_2,1.50 //
GP12garup2_u:108: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,1.51 //
GP12garup2_u:109: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:110: pretasya melanaṃ keṣāṃ kiṃvidhaṃ tatra kārayet // GarP_2,1.52 //
GP12garup2_u:112: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narā bhuvi // GarP_2,1.53 //
GP12garup2_u:113: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim /
GP12garup2_u:114: pāpino ye durācārā ye cānye gatabuddhayaḥ // GarP_2,1.54 //
GP12garup2_u:118: śūdrasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhītā yadā bhavet // GarP_2,1.56 //
GP12garup2_u:120: anyacca śṛṇu viśvātmanmayā kautukinā rayāt // GarP_2,1.57 //
GP12garup2_u:122: tatrājani janāndṛṣṭvā duḥ kheṣveva nimajjataḥ // GarP_2,1.58 //
GP12garup2_u:123: svānte me durdharā pīḍā tatpīḍāto garīyasī /
GP12garup2_u:126: evaṃ na nirbhayaṃ sthānamanyadīśa bhavatpadāt // GarP_2,1.60 //
GP12garup2_u:128: tatrāpi bhārate varṣe bahuduḥ khasya bhāginaḥ // GarP_2,1.61 //
GP12garup2_u:131: khañjāḥ kāṇāśca badhirā mūkāḥ kuṣṭhāśca lomaśāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:134: dṛṣṭvā prasumanāḥ prāptaḥ ko mṛtyuścitratā katham // GarP_2,1.64 //
GP12garup2_u:136: vidhinābdakriyā yasya na sa durgatimāpnuyāt // GarP_2,1.65 //
GP12garup2_u:139: mriyamāṇasya kiṃ kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dānaṃ vāsavānuja /
GP12garup2_u:141: sadyo vilambato vā kiṃ dehamanyaṃ prapadyate /
GP12garup2_u:144: prasādaṃ kuru me mohaṃ chettumarhasyaśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,1.69 //
GP12garup2_u:145: sarvamantemayā pṛṣṭaṃ brūhi lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,1.70 //
GP12garup2_u:146: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe (pretakhaṇḍe)
GP12garup2_u:151: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:156: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga vainateyaṃ bravīmi te // GarP_2,2.3 //
GP12garup2_u:157: aputrasya gatirnāstu svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:158: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya hi // GarP_2,2.4 //
GP12garup2_u:160: skandhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo hyagnidātā ca pautrakaḥ // GarP_2,2.5 //
GP12garup2_u:161: tiladarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī ṛtumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:162: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,2.6 //
GP12garup2_u:163: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi kva tadā garbhadhāraṇam /
GP12garup2_u:164: ādarācca tato bhūmau yena garbhaṃ pradhāryate // GarP_2,2.7 //
GP12garup2_u:166: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati kilbiṣam // GarP_2,2.8 //
GP12garup2_u:169: sarvatra vasudhāpūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:170: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,2.10 //
GP12garup2_u:172: alepaṃ hyāturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete viyonayaḥ // GarP_2,2.11 //
GP12garup2_u:174: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāmāturo mucyate na hi // GarP_2,2.12 //
GP12garup2_u:178: yonyantaraṃ na gacchetsa krīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,2.14 //
GP12garup2_u:180: tasyaiva vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodakakriyā // GarP_2,2.15 //
GP12garup2_u:182: asurā dānavā daityā vidravanti tilaistathā // GarP_2,2.16 //
GP12garup2_u:184: dahantu te me pāpāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni vai // GarP_2,2.17 //
GP12garup2_u:185: eka eva tilo datto hemadroṇatilaiḥ samaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:186: tarpaṇe dānahomeṣu datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,2.18 //
GP12garup2_u:191: tena te pitarastṛptā apasavye kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:192: darbhamūle sthito brahmā madhye devo janārdanaḥ // GarP_2,2.21 //
GP12garup2_u:193: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:194: viprā mantrāḥ kaśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,2.22 //
GP12garup2_u:195: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:196: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,2.23 //
GP12garup2_u:204: darbhaistu kṣipyate yo 'sau darbhaistu pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,2.27 //
GP12garup2_u:205: viṣṇuloke sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:206: tūlīṃ kṛtvā kṛtau pādau saṃsthitau kṣitipṛṣṭhataḥ // GarP_2,2.28 //
GP12garup2_u:209: yane dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati /
GP12garup2_u:210: lavaṇaṃ tadrasaṃ divyaṃ sarvakāmapradaṃ nṛṇām // GarP_2,2.30 //
GP12garup2_u:212: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,2.31 //
GP12garup2_u:214: etatsalavaṇaṃ dānaṃ tena śaṃsanti yoginaḥ // GarP_2,2.32 //
GP12garup2_u:216: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,2.33 //
GP12garup2_u:217: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:218: anyacca śṛṇu pakṣīndra mṛtyo rūpaṃ prapañcataḥ // GarP_2,2.34 //
GP12garup2_u:223: sāttvikā rājasāścaiva tāmasā ye ca kecana /
GP12garup2_u:224: bhāvāḥ kālātmakāḥ sarve pravartante hi jantuṣu // GarP_2,2.37 //
GP12garup2_u:226: agniḥ khaṃ pṛthivī mitra oṣadhyo vasavastathā // GarP_2,2.38 //
GP12garup2_u:228: sarve kālena sṛjyante saṃkṣipyante yathā punaḥ // GarP_2,2.39 //
GP12garup2_u:234: tataḥ kṣaṇena caitanye vikale jaḍatāṃ gate // GarP_2,2.42 //
GP12garup2_u:236: bībhatsaṃ tu tadā rūpaṃ prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairbhavet // GarP_2,2.43 //
GP12garup2_u:240: bhūya eva hite tāta mṛtyukāladaśāmimām // GarP_2,2.45 //
GP12garup2_u:245: yairnānṛtāni coktāni prītibhedaḥ kṛto na ca /
GP12garup2_u:246: āstikaḥ śraddadhānaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.48 //
GP12garup2_u:248: yathoktakārī saumyaśca sa sukhaṃ mṛtyumṛcchati // GarP_2,2.49 //
GP12garup2_u:250: kūṭasākṣī mṛṣāvādī ye ca viśvāsaghātakāḥ // GarP_2,2.50 //
GP12garup2_u:251: te mohaṃ mṛtyumṛcchanti tathā ye vedanindakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:254: prāpte tvīdṛkpathe ghore jāyate tasya vepathuḥ // GarP_2,2.52 //
GP12garup2_u:260: uktaṃ mṛtyoḥ svarūpaṃ tu prasaṅgādanyadapyatha // GarP_2,2.55 //
GP12garup2_u:262: karmaṇāṃ prāktanānāṃ tu tadasattvenaṃ bhadetaḥ // GarP_2,2.56 //
GP12garup2_u:276: hemahārī tu kunakhī duścarmā gurutalpagaḥ // GarP_2,2.63 //
GP12garup2_u:282: araṇye nirjane deśe jāyate brahmarākṣasaḥ // GarP_2,2.66 //
GP12garup2_u:284: patraṃ ca śākhino hṛtvā gandhāṃśchucchundarī pumān // GarP_2,2.67 //
GP12garup2_u:287: madhudaṃśaḥ phalaṃ gṛdhro gāṃ godhāgniṃ bakastathā /
GP12garup2_u:289: kāṃsyahārī tu haṃsaḥ syātparasvasya ca hārakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:294: nyāsāpahārī kāṇaḥ syāstrījīvaḥ khañjako bhavet // GarP_2,2.72 //
GP12garup2_u:296: vātagulmī viprayoṣidgāmī vā jambuko bhavet // GarP_2,2.73 //
GP12garup2_u:302: syādvātha vṛṣalaḥ so 'yaṃ catvare vai viṇmūtrakṛt // GarP_2,2.76 //
GP12garup2_u:306: kṛmiḥ paryuṣitādaḥ syānmatsarī bhramaro bhavet // GarP_2,2.78 //
GP12garup2_u:310: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkubjatāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,2.80 //
GP12garup2_u:314: cātako jalahartā syājjanmāndhaḥ puṃstakaṃ haran // GarP_2,2.82 //
GP12garup2_u:320: hareḥ kathāṃ na śṛṇvanti ye na sādhujanastavam // GarP_2,2.85 //
GP12garup2_u:322: parasyānanasaṃsthaṃ yo grāsaṃ hari mandadhīḥ // GarP_2,2.86 //
GP12garup2_u:324: dambhenācarate dharmaṃ gajacarmā bhavettu saḥ // GarP_2,2.87 //
GP12garup2_u:326: liṅgapīḍī śivasvaṃ ca śivanirmālyameva ca // GarP_2,2.88 //
GP12garup2_u:331: dravyaprakārā hi yathā tathaiva prāṇijātayaḥ // GarP_2,2.90 //
GP12garup2_u:332: evaṃ vicitrairnijakarmabhirnṛṇāṃ sukhasya duḥ khasya ca janmanāmapi /
GP12garup2_u:335: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pratakā(kha)
GP12garup2_u:343: narakāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ me vada yeṣu vikarmiṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:344: pātyante duḥ khabhūyiṣṭhāsteṣāṃ bhedāṃśca kīrtaya // GarP_2,3.2 //
GP12garup2_u:347: śakyaṃ vistarato naiva vaktuṃ prādhānyato bruve // GarP_2,3.3 //
GP12garup2_u:348: rauravaṃ nāma narakaṃ mukhyaṃ tadvainibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:349: raurave kūṭasākṣī tu yāti yaścānṛtī naraḥ // GarP_2,3.4 //
GP12garup2_u:350: yojanānāṃ sahasre dve rauravo hi pramāṇataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:351: jānumātrapramāṇaṃ tu tatra gartaṃ sudustaram // GarP_2,3.5 //
GP12garup2_u:356: padepade ca pādo 'sya sphuṭyate śīryate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:361: mahārauravasaṃjñaṃ tu śṛṇuṣva narakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,3.10 //
GP12garup2_u:366: tasyāṃ baddhakarābhyāṃ ca padbhyāṃ caiva yamānugaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:367: mucyate pāpakṛnmadhye luṇṭhamānaḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,3.13 //
GP12garup2_u:373: varṣāyutāyutaiḥ pāpaṃ yaiḥ kṛtaṃ duṣṭabuddhibhiḥ // GarP_2,3.16 //
GP12garup2_u:389: na caiṣāṃ jīvitabhraṃśo jāyate pakṣisattama // GarP_2,3.24 //
GP12garup2_u:390: chinnāni teṣāṃ śataśaḥ khaṇḍānyaikyaṃ vrajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:393: aprātaṣṭhaṃ ca narakaṃ śṛṇuṣva gadato mama // GarP_2,3.26 //
GP12garup2_u:395: tānyeva tatra cakrāṇi ghaṭīyantrāṇi cānyataḥ // GarP_2,3.27 //
GP12garup2_u:399: ghaṭīyantreṣu badvā ye baddhā toyavaṭī yathā // GarP_2,3.29 //
GP12garup2_u:403: asipatravanaṃ nāma narakaṃ śṛṇu cāparam // GarP_2,3.31 //
GP12garup2_u:413: mātarbhrātastāta iti krandamānāḥ suduḥ khitāḥ // GarP_2,3.36 //
GP12garup2_u:415: teṣāṃ gatānāṃ tatrāpi ati śītiḥ samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.37 //
GP12garup2_u:417: chinnāḥ patanti te bhūmau jvalatpāvakasaṃcaye // GarP_2,3.38 //
GP12garup2_u:419: sārameyāśca te śīghraṃ śātayanti śarīrataḥ // GarP_2,3.39 //
GP12garup2_u:422: ataḥ paraṃ bhīmataraṃ taptakuṃbhaṃ nibodha me /
GP12garup2_u:425: eṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇo yāmyaiḥ kṣiptā hyadhomukhāḥ // GarP_2,3.42 //
GP12garup2_u:433: eṣa te vistareṇoktastaptakumbho mayā khaga // GarP_2,3.46 //
GP12garup2_u:439: karmaṇāṃ tāratamyena teṣuteṣu patanti hi // GarP_2,3.49 //
GP12garup2_u:440: tathā hi narako rodhaḥ śūkarastāla eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:443: adhaḥ śirāḥ pūyavaho rudhirāndhaśca viḍrabhujaḥ // GarP_2,3.51 //
GP12garup2_u:448: tāmasā narakāḥ sarve yamasya viṣaye sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:449: yeṣu duṣkṛtakarmāṇaḥ patanti hi pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,3.54 //
GP12garup2_u:451: rogho goghno bhrūṇahā ca agnidātā naraḥ patet // GarP_2,3.55 //
GP12garup2_u:453: tāle patetkṣattrahantā hatvā vaiśyaṃ ca durgatiḥ // GarP_2,3.56 //
GP12garup2_u:457: mādhvī vikrayakartāṃ ca yastu bhaktaṃ parityajet // GarP_2,3.58 //
GP12garup2_u:458: mahājvālī duhitaraṃ snuṣāṃ gacchati yastu vai /
GP12garup2_u:459: vedo vikrīyate yaiśca vedaṃ dūṣayate tu yaḥ // GarP_2,3.59 //
GP12garup2_u:461: agamyāgāmī ca naro narakaṃ śabalaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.60 //
GP12garup2_u:462: vimohe patate śūre maryādāṃ yo bhinatti vai /
GP12garup2_u:463: duriṣṭaṃ kurute yastu kṛmibhakṣaṃ prapadyate // GarP_2,3.61 //
GP12garup2_u:469: kṣīraṃ surāṃ ca māsaṃ lākṣāṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ tilān // GarP_2,3.64 //
GP12garup2_u:472: pakṣiṇaśca mṛgāṃśchā gānso 'pyevaṃ narakaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,3.65 //
GP12garup2_u:473: ājāviko māhiṣikastathā cakrī dhvajī ca yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:476: surāpo māṃsabhakṣī ca tathā ca paśughātakaḥ // GarP_2,3.67 //
GP12garup2_u:479: patanti niraye ghore viḍbhuje nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:482: agnijvālāṃ mṛgavyādho bhojyate yatra vāyasaiḥ // GarP_2,3.70 //
GP12garup2_u:484: skandante yadi vā svapne yatino brahmacāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.71 //
GP12garup2_u:486: te sarve narakaṃ yānti nirayaṃ cāpyabhojanam // GarP_2,3.72 //
GP12garup2_u:488: karmāṇi ye tu kurvanti sarve nirayavāsinaḥ // GarP_2,3.73 //
GP12garup2_u:490: sudāruṇaḥ suśītātmā tasyā dhastāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,3.74 //
GP12garup2_u:492: duḥ khotkarṣaśca sarveṣu karmasvapi nimittataḥ // GarP_2,3.75 //
GP12garup2_u:500: ekaṃ dinaṃ varṣaśatapramāṇaṃ narake bhavet // GarP_2,3.79 //
GP12garup2_u:505: ete caikaśaphāḥ ṣaṭ ca śṛṇu pañcanakhānataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:506: anyāsu bahupāpāsu duḥ khadāsu ca yo niṣu // GarP_2,3.82 //
GP12garup2_u:507: mānuṣyaṃ prāpyate kubjo kutsito vāmano 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:510: avaśiṣṭena pāpena puṇyena ca samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,3.84 //
GP12garup2_u:514: yathā puṇyakṛto yānti tanme nigadataḥ śṛṇu // GarP_2,3.86 //
GP12garup2_u:515: te yamena vinirdiṣṭāṃ yoniṃ puṇyagatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:520: jāyante nīrujāṃ gehe sa dvṛttipīrapālakāḥ // GarP_2,3.89 //
GP12garup2_u:523: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:525: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:526: tejastejasi līyate samīre ca samīraṇaḥ // GarP_2,3.92 //
GP12garup2_u:528: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,3.93 //
GP12garup2_u:529: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:530: kāmaḥ krodho hyahaṅkāro manastatraiva nāyakaḥ // GarP_2,3.94 //
GP12garup2_u:533: praviśetsa nave dehe pṛhe daradhe guhī yathā /
GP12garup2_u:534: śarīre ye samāsīnāḥ sarve vai sapta dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,3.96 //
GP12garup2_u:535: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyaḥ sarve vātāśca dehinām /
GP12garup2_u:536: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogādye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,3.97 //
GP12garup2_u:537: pittaṃ śleṣmā tathā majjā māṃsaṃ vai meda eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:538: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyurdehena saha dahyati // GarP_2,3.98 //
GP12garup2_u:540: kathayāmi punasteṣāṃ śarīraṃ ca yathā bhavet // GarP_2,3.99 //
GP12garup2_u:548: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,3.103 //
GP12garup2_u:553: athayāmi kramaprāptaṃ praṣṭu vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,3.106 //
GP12garup2_u:554: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dharmakāṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde narakatatpraveśanirgamanādivarṇanaṃ nāma tṛtīyo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:559: tasya pāpasya śuddhyarthaṃ vidheyā niṣkṛtirnaraiḥ // GarP_2,4.1 //
GP12garup2_u:562: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā tadardhārdhamathāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:563: yathāśaktyā tataḥ kuryāddaśa dānāni vai śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.3 //
GP12garup2_u:565: rajataṃ lavaṇaṃ caiva dānāni daśa vai viduḥ // GarP_2,4.4 //
GP12garup2_u:566: prāyaścitte tvāgatā ye tebhyo dadyānnaro daśa /
GP12garup2_u:568: nadīṃ vaitaraṇīṃ tartuṃ dadyādvaitaraṇīṃ ca gām /
GP12garup2_u:569: kṛṣṇastanī sakṛṣṇāṅgī sā vai vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,4.6 //
GP12garup2_u:570: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:571: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.7 //
GP12garup2_u:573: ātureṇa tu deyāni padarūpāṇi me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.8 //
GP12garup2_u:575: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ padaṃ cāṣṭavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,4.9 //
GP12garup2_u:576: tilāpātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyā sopaskarā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:577: etatsarvaṃ pradātavyaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ cātmano 'pi tat // GarP_2,4.10 //
GP12garup2_u:578: aśvo rathaśca mahīṣī vyañjanaṃ vastrameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:581: prāyāścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena daśa dānānyapi kṣitau // GarP_2,4.12 //
GP12garup2_u:583: tilapātraṃ sarpiḥ pātraṃ śayyādānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.13 //
GP12garup2_u:587: āturasya yadā prāṇā na yānti vasudhātale // GarP_2,4.15 //
GP12garup2_u:588: lavaṇaṃ ca tadā deyaṃ dvārasyodvāṭanaṃ divaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:589: yānikāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ // GarP_2,4.16 //
GP12garup2_u:591: prāyaścittaṃ kṛtaṃ yena sāṅgaṃ khaga sa vai pumān // GarP_2,4.17 //
GP12garup2_u:593: amṛtaṃ tu gavāṃ kṣīraṃ yataḥ patagasattam // GarP_2,4.18 //
GP12garup2_u:595: dānānyaṣṭau tu dattvā vai gandharvanilaye vaset // GarP_2,4.19 //
GP12garup2_u:596: ālayastatra raudre hi dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:597: chatradānena succhāyā jāyate pathi tuṣṭidā // GarP_2,4.20 //
GP12garup2_u:601: pradeśe nirjale dātā sukhī syādvai kamaṇḍaloḥ // GarP_2,4.22 //
GP12garup2_u:604: tilapātraṃ tu viprāya dattaṃ patraratha dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:612: yo 'śvaṃ dadāti viprāya svargaloke ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:613: yāvanti romāṇi haye bhavanti hi khageśvara // GarP_2,4.28 //
GP12garup2_u:616: rathaṃ dvijātaye dattvā rājasūyaphalaṃ labht // GarP_2,4.30 //
GP12garup2_u:617: dugdhādhikāṃ ca mahiṣīṃ navameghavarṇāṃ santuṣṭatarṇakavalīṃ jaghanābhirāmām /
GP12garup2_u:618: dattvā suvarṇatilakāṃ dvijapuṅgavāya lokodayaṃ sa jayatīti kimatra citram // GarP_2,4.31 //
GP12garup2_u:622: na hīyate tasya vaṃśaḥ svargaṃ prāpnotyanuttamam // GarP_2,4.33 //
GP12garup2_u:628: so 'pi tṛptimavāpnoti vināpyannena vai tadā // GarP_2,4.36 //
GP12garup2_u:633: padepade kratusamaṃ bhavettasya na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,4.38 //
GP12garup2_u:635: mṛtyau na so 'pi saṃsāre bhūyaḥ paryaṭati dvija // GarP_2,4.39 //
GP12garup2_u:638: gataprāṇaṃ tato jñātvā snātvā putrādirāśu tam /
GP12garup2_u:641: tato mṛtasya sthāne vai ekoddiṣṭaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,4.42 //
GP12garup2_u:643: āṃsanaṃ prākṣaṇa ca syānna syādetaccatuṣṭayam // GarP_2,4.43 //
GP12garup2_u:650: piṇḍasya cālanaṃ proktaṃ naiva proktamidaṃ trikam /
GP12garup2_u:652: eṣu ṣaṭsu vidhiḥ proktaḥ śrāddheṣu malineṣu te /
GP12garup2_u:653: ṣaḍeva maraṇasthāne dvāri cātvarike tathā // GarP_2,4.48 //
GP12garup2_u:655: mṛtisthāne śavo nāma bhūmistuṣyati devatā // GarP_2,4.49 //
GP12garup2_u:659: citāyāṃ sādhaka iti sañcitau preta ucyate // GarP_2,4.51 //
GP12garup2_u:661: gāthāṃ yamasya sūktaṃ vāpyadhīyānā vrajanti hi // GarP_2,4.52 //
GP12garup2_u:663: vaivasvato na tṛpyeta surayā tviva durmatiḥ // GarP_2,4.53 //
GP12garup2_u:664: imāṃ gāthamapeteti sūktaṃ vā pathi saṃpaṭhet /
GP12garup2_u:667: tataḥ śanairbhūtale vai dakṣiṇāśirasaṃ śavam // GarP_2,4.55 //
GP12garup2_u:670: śūdrānītaiḥ kṛtaṃ karma sarvaṃ bhavati niṣphalam /
GP12garup2_u:673: pratevastraṃ dvidhā kṛtvārdhena taṃ chādayettataḥ // GarP_2,4.58 //
GP12garup2_u:675: tataḥ pūrvoktavidhinā piṇḍaṃ pretakare nyaset // GarP_2,4.59 //
GP12garup2_u:677: dāhamṛtyorantarāle vidhiḥ piṇḍasya taṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.60 //
GP12garup2_u:679: anyathā copaghātācca rākṣasādyā bhavanti hi // GarP_2,4.61 //
GP12garup2_u:683: śrautena tu vidhānena hyāhitāgniṃ dahedvudhaḥ // GarP_2,4.63 //
GP12garup2_u:690: asau svargāya lokāya svāhetyuktvā tu nāmataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:692: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:697: tato jālasamīpe tu gatvā prakṣālya cāṃśukam // GarP_2,4.70 //
GP12garup2_u:699: udakaṃ tu kariṣyāmaḥ sacailaṃ puruṣāstataḥ // GarP_2,4.71 //
GP12garup2_u:701: putrādyā vṛddhapūrvāste ekavastrāḥ śikhāṃ vinā // GarP_2,4.72 //
GP12garup2_u:705: tatastaṭe samāgatya śikhāṃ baddhvā ṛjūn kuśān // GarP_2,4.74 //
GP12garup2_u:707: ādāyāñjalinā yāmyāṃ duḥ khī paitṛkatīrthataḥ // GarP_2,4.75 //
GP12garup2_u:709: bhūmāvaśmani vā sarve kṣipeyurvāgyatāḥ khaga // GarP_2,4.76 //
GP12garup2_u:713: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,4.78 //
GP12garup2_u:717: śleṣmāśru bāndhavairmuktaṃ preto bhuṅkte yato 'vaśaḥ // GarP_2,4.80 //
GP12garup2_u:718: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:723: pañcadhā saṃbhṛtaḥ kāyo yadi pañcatvamāgataḥ // GarP_2,4.83 //
GP12garup2_u:726: phenaprakhyaḥ kathaṃ nāśaṃ martyaloko na yāsyati /
GP12garup2_u:729: vidaśya rnibapatrāṇi niyatā dvāri veśmanaḥ // GarP_2,4.86 //
GP12garup2_u:733: śrautena tu vidhānena āhitāgniṃ dehadvadhaḥ // GarP_2,4.88 //
GP12garup2_u:737: citibhraṣṭā tu yā mohātsā prājāpatyamācaret // GarP_2,4.90 //
GP12garup2_u:738: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ya yāni lomāni mānuṣe /
GP12garup2_u:741: tadvaduddhṛtya sā nārī tenaiva saha modate // GarP_2,4.92 //
GP12garup2_u:744: brahmaghno vā kṛghno vā mittrighno vā bhavetpatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:745: punātyavidhavā nārī tamādāya mṛtā tu yā // GarP_2,4.94 //
GP12garup2_u:748: yāvaccāgnau mṛte patyau strī nātmānaṃ pradāhayet /
GP12garup2_u:749: tāvanna mucyate sā hi strīśarīrātkathañcana // GarP_2,4.96 //
GP12garup2_u:750: mātṛkaṃ paitṛkaṃ caiva yatra caiva pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:752: ārtārte mudite hṛṣṭā proṣite malinā kṛśā /
GP12garup2_u:753: mṛte mriyeta yā patyau sā strī jñeyā pativratā // GarP_2,4.98 //
GP12garup2_u:754: pṛthak citāṃ samāruhya na priyā gantumarhati /
GP12garup2_u:758: dahanasya vidhiḥ proktaḥ sāmānyena mayā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:762: kathaṃ dāhaḥ prakartavyastanme vada jagatpate // GarP_2,4.102 //
GP12garup2_u:764: asthīni cenna labhyante proṣitasya narasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:765: teṣāñca hi gatisthānaṃ vidhānaṃ kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,4.103 //
GP12garup2_u:766: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ patyurdurmaraṇeṣu yat /
GP12garup2_u:778: tattu durmaraṇaṃ jñeyaṃ yacca jātaṃ vidhaiṃ vinā /
GP12garup2_u:779: tena pāpena narakān bhuktvā pretatvabhāginaḥ // GarP_2,4.110 //
GP12garup2_u:781: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyañca na kuryā daurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,4.111 //
GP12garup2_u:789: nārāyaṇabaliṃ samyak tīrthe sarvaṃ prakpayet // GarP_2,4.115 //
GP12garup2_u:791: pūrvantu tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ vipraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,4.116 //
GP12garup2_u:799: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhānyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,4.120 //
GP12garup2_u:802: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:808: śaṅkhe khaḍge 'tha vā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak /
GP12garup2_u:811: brahmā viṣṇuśca rudraśca yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ // GarP_2,4.126 //
GP12garup2_u:816: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:821: evaṃ viṣṇubaliṃ dattvā yathāśaktyā vidhānataḥ // GarP_2,4.131 //
GP12garup2_u:822: samuddharati tatkṣipraṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇa nāgadaṃśānmṛto yastu viśeṣastantu me śṛṇu // GarP_2,4.132 //
GP12garup2_u:827: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:830: vinyasya tāni vṛntāni aṅgeṣveṣu pṛthak pṛthak // GarP_2,4.136 //
GP12garup2_u:837: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāneṃ tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:841: pāradaṃ retasaḥ sthāne purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:842: manaḥ śilā tathā gātre tilapakvantu sandhiṣu // GarP_2,4.142 //
GP12garup2_u:843: yavapiṣṭaṃ yathā māṃse madhu śoṇitameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:844: keśeṣu ca jaṭājūṭaṃ tvacāyāñca mṛgatvacam // GarP_2,4.143 //
GP12garup2_u:848: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkau pīne ca trapusmṛtam // GarP_2,4.145 //
GP12garup2_u:852: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣurbhyāñca kapardakam // GarP_2,4.147 //
GP12garup2_u:856: sāgnike cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasyetkramāt // GarP_2,4.149 //
GP12garup2_u:857: striyaḥ punantu ma śira imaṃ me varuṇena ca /
GP12garup2_u:860: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca karpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,4.151 //
GP12garup2_u:862: tilapātraṃ tato dadyātpadadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.152 //
GP12garup2_u:864: pretamokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpyaca // GarP_2,4.153 //
GP12garup2_u:866: tacchruddhaye tu saṃskartā putrādirniṣkṛtiṃ caret // GarP_2,4.154 //
GP12garup2_u:874: akṛtvā niṣkṛtiṃ yastu kurute dahanādikam // GarP_2,4.158 //
GP12garup2_u:876: kṛtvāgnimudakaṃ snānaṃ sparśanaṃ vahanaṃ kathām // GarP_2,4.159 //
GP12garup2_u:878: eṣāmanyatamaṃ pretaṃ yo vahettu dehata vā // GarP_2,4.160 //
GP12garup2_u:880: nimitte laghuni svalpaṃ mahanmahati kalpayet // GarP_2,4.161 //
GP12garup2_u:883: lakṣaṇaṃ brūhi me svāmiṃstrayāṇāmapi suvrata // GarP_2,4.162 //
GP12garup2_u:889: gomūtraṃ gomayaṃ kṣīraṃ dadhi sarpiḥ kuśodakam /
GP12garup2_u:891: mayā te 'yaṃ samākhyāto durmṛtasya vidhiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:895: evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kuryāttataḥ pretaśca muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:896: mṛtabhrāntyā pratikṛteḥ kṛte dāhe sa vai yadi // GarP_2,4.168 //
GP12garup2_u:900: varṣe pañcadaśe pakṣin dvādaśe vā gate sati // GarP_2,4.170 //
GP12garup2_u:904: kumbhe salilamādāya pañcagavyaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,4.172 //
GP12garup2_u:908: pañcabhiḥ snāpayitvā tu gavyaiḥ pretāṃ rajasvalām // GarP_2,4.174 //
GP12garup2_u:910: mṛtasya pañcake dāhavidhiṃ vacmi śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,4.175 //
GP12garup2_u:912: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.176 //
GP12garup2_u:914: na jalaṃ dīyate teṣu aśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,4.177 //
GP12garup2_u:918: atha vā ṛkṣamadye ca dāhastu vidhipūrvakaḥ // GarP_2,4.179 //
GP12garup2_u:924: sūtakānte tadā puttraiḥ kāryaṃ śāntikapauṣṭikam // GarP_2,4.182 //
GP12garup2_u:925: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na satiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:926: tilān gāñca suvarṇañca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,4.183 //
GP12garup2_u:932_0: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dahanavidhikṛcchralakṣaṇadagdhāgamanarajasvalāmaraṇavidhipañcakamaraṇaprāyaścittanirūpaṇaṃ
GP12garup2_u:936: evaṃ dagdhvā naraṃ pretaṃ snātvā kṛtvā tilodakam /
GP12garup2_u:937: agrataḥ strījano gacchedvrajeyuḥ pṛṣṭhato narāḥ // GarP_2,5.1 //
GP12garup2_u:940: te praviśya gṛhaṃ sarve sutādyāśca sapiṇḍakāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:941: bhaveyurdaśarātraṃ vai yata āśaucakaṃ khaga // GarP_2,5.3 //
GP12garup2_u:948: mṛnmaye patraje vāpi bhuñjīraṃste ca bhājane /
GP12garup2_u:949: uvāsantu te kuryurekāhamatha vā tryaham // GarP_2,5.7 //
GP12garup2_u:951: āśaucina iti proktamāśaucasya ca vai prabho /
GP12garup2_u:952: lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ kiyatkālaṃ bhāvyaṃ vā tadyutairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,5.8 //
GP12garup2_u:963: jalaṃ tridivamākāśe sthāpyaṃ kṣīrañca mṛnmaye // GarP_2,5.13 //
GP12garup2_u:965: kāṣṭhatraye guṇairbaddhe prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,5.14 //
GP12garup2_u:966: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā saptame navame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:967: asthisaṃcayanaṃ kāryaṃ dine tadgotrajaiḥ saha // GarP_2,5.15 //
GP12garup2_u:971: prāgudīcyāṃ caruṃ kṛtvā snātvā prayatamānasaḥ // GarP_2,5.17 //
GP12garup2_u:975: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yati vā pumān // GarP_2,5.19 //
GP12garup2_u:983: yadāhi tryahamāśaucaṃ tadā vāñjalayo daśa // GarP_2,5.23 //
GP12garup2_u:993: vipraḥ śudhyatyapaḥ spṛṣṭvā kṣattriyo vāhanaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.28 //
GP12garup2_u:994: vaiśyaḥ pratodaṃ raśmīnvā śūdro yaṣṭiṃ kṛtakriyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:999: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgaiḥ khagottama // GarP_2,5.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1003: śirastvādyena piṇḍena pretasya kriyate tathā // GarP_2,5.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1007: jānujaṅghaṃ tathā pādau pañcamena tu sarvadā // GarP_2,5.35 //
GP12garup2_u:1011: madhyamāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,5.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1014: nimittaṃ durmatiṃ kṛtvā yadi nārāyaṇo baliḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1015: ekādaśāhe kartavyo vṛṣotsargo 'pi tatra vai // GarP_2,5.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1017: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,5.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1019: niṣphalaṃ sakalaṃ vidyātpramītāya na tadbhavet // GarP_2,5.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1021: putraḥ patnyatha dauhitraḥ pitā vā duhitātha vā // GarP_2,5.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1024: alaṅkṛto vidhānena pretatvaṃ tasya no bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1026: darbhaiḥ piṣṭaistu sampādya taṃ vṛṣaṃ mocayedvudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1032: tṛtīyāṃ ṣoḍaśīṃ vacmi vainateya śṛṇuṣva tām /
GP12garup2_u:1033: dvādaśa pratimāsyāni ādyaṃ ṣāṇmāsikaṃ tathā // GarP_2,5.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1035: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe ca ṣaṇmāse māsike 'bdike // GarP_2,5.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1037: yasyaitā ni na dattāni pretaśrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,5.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1039: ekādaśe dvādaśe vā dine ādyaṃ prakīrtitam // GarP_2,5.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1047: sapiṇḍīkaraṇeṣvevaṃ vidhiṃ pakṣīndra me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1050: pātraṃ pretasya tatraikaṃ pitryaṃ pātratrayaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1053: tataḥ prabhṛti vai pretaḥ pitṛsāmānyamaśnute // GarP_2,5.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1057: sāpiṇḍyantu striyā nāsti mṛte bhartuḥ striyo bhavet // GarP_2,5.60 //
GP12garup2_u:1059: śrāddhādau saha dāhe ca patipatnyorna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,5.61 //
GP12garup2_u:1061: tāṃmṛtāhani tu samprāpte pṛthak piṇḍena yojayet // GarP_2,5.62 //
GP12garup2_u:1068: uktaṃ bhartrāpi sāpiṇḍyaṃ striyā veṣayabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1069: navaśrāddhasya te kālaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇu kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1071: dvitīyañca tato mārge viśrāmo yatra kāritaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1074: daśamaikādaśe caiva nava śrāddhāni vai khaga // GarP_2,5.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1075: śrāddhāni nava caitāni tṛtīyā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:1077: prathame 'hni tṛtīye vā pañcame saptame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1080: uktāni te mayā tāni ṛṣīṇāṃ matabhedataḥ // GarP_2,5.72 //
GP12garup2_u:1086: ekoddiṣṭaṃ me nibodha cetthamāvatsaraṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,5.75 //
GP12garup2_u:1089: pratyabdaṃ yo yathā kuryāttathā kuryātsa tānyapi /
GP12garup2_u:1090: ekādaśe dvādaśe 'hni preto bhuṅkte dinadvayam // GarP_2,5.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1092: sāpiṇḍye tu kṛte tasya pretaśabdo nivartate // GarP_2,5.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1094: annaṃ dīpo jalaṃ vastramanyadvādīyate ca yat // GarP_2,5.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1100: tasminmārge vrajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,5.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1107: catvāriṃ śattathā sapta pratyahaṃ yāti tatra saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1110: evaṃ krameṇa yātabye mārge pāparataistu yat // GarP_2,5.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1124: purāṇi ṣoḍaśāmuṣmanmārge tāni ca me śṛṇu // GarP_2,5.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1125: yāmyaṃ sauripuraṃ nagedvabhavanaṃ gandharvaśailāgamau krauñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam /
GP12garup2_u:1126: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaptabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahubhītiṣoḍaśapurāṇyetānyadṛṣṭani te // GarP_2,5.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1127: tatra yāmya puraṃ gacchanputraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:1128: hāheti krandate nityaṃ svakṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ smaran // GarP_2,5.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1130: puṣpabhadrā nadī yatra nyagrodhaḥ priyadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,5.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1131: viśrāmecchāṃ karotyatra kārayanti na te bhaṭāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1132: kṣitau dattaṃ sutaistasya snehādvā kṛpayā tathā // GarP_2,5.98 //
GP12garup2_u:1135: jalāśayo naiva kṛto mayā tadā manuṣyatṛptyai paśupakṣitṛptaya /
GP12garup2_u:1136: gotṛptihetorna ca gocaraḥ kṛtaḥ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.100 //
GP12garup2_u:1137: tatra nāmnā tu rājāsau jaṅgamaḥ kāmarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:1138: bhayāt taddarśanājjātādbhuṅkte piṇḍaṃ sa śaṅkitaḥ // GarP_2,5.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1139: tripakṣe jalasaṃyuktaṃ kṣitau dattaṃ tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1141: na nityadānaṃ na gavāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ pustaṃ ca dattaṃ na hi vedaśāstrayoḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1142: purāṇadṛṣṭo na hi sevito 'dhvā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.103 //
GP12garup2_u:1144: māsi dvitīye yaddattaṃ bāndhavaistu tato vrajet // GarP_2,5.104 //
GP12garup2_u:1148: tṛtīye māsi samprāpte gandharvanagare śubham // GarP_2,5.106 //
GP12garup2_u:1151: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:1152: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.108 //
GP12garup2_u:1157: na jñānamārgo na ca yogamārgo na karmamārgo na ca bhaktimārgaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1158: na sādhusaṅgātkimapi śrutaṃ mayā śarīra he nistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,5.111 //
GP12garup2_u:1159: tataḥ krūrapura māsi pañcame yāti kāśyapa /
GP12garup2_u:1160: bhuvi dattaṃ piṇḍajalaṃ bhuktvā krūrapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,5.112 //
GP12garup2_u:1162: hā mātarhāpitarbhrātaḥ sutā hā hā mama striyaḥ // GarP_2,5.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1164: evaṃ lālapyamānaṃ te yamadūtā vadantihi // GarP_2,5.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1165: kva mātā kva pitā mūḍha kva jāyā kva sutaḥ suhṛt /
GP12garup2_u:1166: svakarmopārjite bhuṅkṣvaṃ mūrkha yātāściraṃ pathi // GarP_2,5.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1167: jānāsi śambalamalaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no 'śambalaḥ prayatate paralokagatyai /
GP12garup2_u:1168: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yena na bhavet krayavikrayo 'pi // GarP_2,5.116 //
GP12garup2_u:1172: kutra yāmi na hi gāmi jīvitaṃ hā mṛtasya maraṇaṃ punarna vai /
GP12garup2_u:1173: itthameva vilapan prayātyasau yātanārhadhṛtavigrahaḥ pati // GarP_2,5.119 //
GP12garup2_u:1175: tatra ṣaṇmāsapiṇḍena tṛptaḥ san vrajate puraḥ // GarP_2,5.120 //
GP12garup2_u:1177: mātā bhrātā pitā putraḥ ko 'pi me vartate na vā /
GP12garup2_u:1178: yo māmuddharate pāpaṃ patantaṃ duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,5.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1179: vrajatastatra mārge tu tatra vaitaraṇī śubhā /
GP12garup2_u:1182: te vadanti pradattā gauryadi vaitaraṇī tvayā /
GP12garup2_u:1183: nāvamenāṃ samāroha sukenottara vai nadīm // GarP_2,5.124 //
GP12garup2_u:1184: tatra yena pradattā gauḥ sa sukhenaiva tāṃ taret /
GP12garup2_u:1185: adāyī tatra ghṛṣyeta karagrāhantu nāvikaiḥ // GarP_2,5.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1187: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī khaga // GarP_2,5.126 //
GP12garup2_u:1188: dattā pāpaṃ dahet sarvaṃ mama lokantu sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:1189: maptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,5.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1190: vrajettu sodakaṃ bhuktvā piṇḍaṃ vai saptamāsikam /
GP12garup2_u:1192: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ taptaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ hitam /
GP12garup2_u:1193: yādṛśaṃ caritaṃ karma mūḍhātman bhuṅkṣva tādṛśam // GarP_2,5.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1194: māsyaṣṭame duḥ khade tu pare bhuktvātha sodakam /
GP12garup2_u:1195: piṇḍaṃ prayātsayau tārkṣya nānākrandapuraṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1199: navame māsi dattaṃ vai nānākrandapure tataḥ // GarP_2,5.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1201: daśame māsi dattaṃ vai sutaptabhavanaṃ tataḥ // GarP_2,5.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1205: daśame māsi piṇḍādi tatra bhuktvā prasarpati // GarP_2,5.135 //
GP12garup2_u:1206: māse caikādaśe pūrṇe puraṃ raudraṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1207: gacchanneva vilapate yathā pṛṣṭhe prapīḍitaḥ // GarP_2,5.136 //
GP12garup2_u:1210: kṣitau dattañca piṇḍādi bhuktvā tatra tato vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1215: ūnābdikañca yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,5.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1216: saṃpūrṇe tu tato varṣe śītāḍhyaṃ nagaraṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1224: tato yāmyaṃ nātidūre nagaraṃ sa hi gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:1226: trayodaśa pratīhārāḥ śravaṇā nāma tatra vai /
GP12garup2_u:1229: mṛtyukālāntakādīnāṃ madhye paśyati vai yamam // GarP_2,5.147 //
GP12garup2_u:1233: tannirdiṣṭāṃ tato janturgatiṃ yāti śubhāśubhām // GarP_2,5.149 //
GP12garup2_u:1234: pāpī pāpāṃ gatiṃ yāti yathā te kathitaṃ purā /
GP12garup2_u:1236: ye tu puṇyakṛtastatra te paśyanti yamaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:1238: ekādaśe dvādaśe hi ṣaṇmāse ābdike tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1239: viprān bahūn bhojayet tatra yanmahatī kṣudhā // GarP_2,5.152 //
GP12garup2_u:1241: yo na sādhayati svārthamevaṃ paścāddhikhidyate // GarP_2,5.153 //
GP12garup2_u:1244: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde varṣakṛtyayamalokamārgayātanādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1249: akṛte tu vṛṣotsarge paralokagatirna hi // GarP_2,6.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1250: tasmāt kṛṣṇa vṛṣotsargaḥ kartavya iti me śrutam /
GP12garup2_u:1251: kiṃ phalaṃ vṛṣayajñasya purā kena kṛto hare // GarP_2,6.2 //
GP12garup2_u:1252: anaḍvān kīdṛśaḥ proktaḥ kasmin kāle viśeṣataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1253: ko vidhistasya nirdiṣṭaḥ sarvaṃ me kṛpayā vada // GarP_2,6.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1256: brahmaputreṇa yat proktaṃ rājānaṃ vīravāhanam // GarP_2,6.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1264: mune mayā kṛto dharmo yathāśakti prayatnataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1265: yamasya śāsanaṃ śrutvā bibhemi nitarāṃ hṛdi // GarP_2,6.8 //
GP12garup2_u:1267: na paśyāmi mahābhāga tathā vada dayānidhe // GarP_2,6.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1271: dānaṃ tīrthaṃ tapo yajñāḥ saṃnyāsaḥ paitṛko mahaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1273: eṣṭavyā bahavaḥ putrā yadyeko 'pi gayāṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:1274: yajeta vāśvamedhena nīlaṃ vā vṛṣamutsṛjet // GarP_2,6.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1278: pretatvaṃ niścalaṃ tasya kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu kiṃ bhavet // GarP_2,6.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1280: vṛṣayajñaiḥ pramucyate nānyathā sādhanaiḥ khaga // GarP_2,6.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1288: lohito yastu varṇena mukhe pucche ca pāṇḍuraḥ // GarP_2,6.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1289: pītaḥ khuraviṣāṇeṣu sa nīlo vṛṣa ucyate /
GP12garup2_u:1290: śvetavarṇo bhavedvipro lohitaḥ kṣattra ucyate // GarP_2,6.20 //
GP12garup2_u:1291: pītavarṇo bhavedvaiśyaḥ śūdraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1299: dharmarājasya purato vācyaṃ me sukṛtaṃ vṛṣa /
GP12garup2_u:1308: pitṛparvaṇi saṃprāpte kuśāryo kānanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,6.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1314: sa tatra nagaraṃ rājan dadarśa bahuvistaram // GarP_2,6.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1322: kiṃ svapna uta māyā vai madīyo mānaso bhramaḥ // GarP_2,6.36 //
GP12garup2_u:1327: mahatyā ca śriyā yuktaṃ stūyamānaṃ suvandibhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1328: rājāpi dṛṣṭvā taṃ vipraṃ pratyutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,6.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1331: adya me saphalaṃ janma pāvitañca kulaṃ prabho /
GP12garup2_u:1332: viṣṇubhaktasya dharmasya yatte dṛggocaraṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,6.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1334: yataḥ samāgato devaḥ punastatraiva nīyatām // GarP_2,6.42 //
GP12garup2_u:1335: iti śrutvā vaco rājñaḥ papraccha dvijapuṅgavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1337: ko 'yaṃ deśa- kuto lokā uttamā madhyamādhamāḥ // GarP_2,6.43 //
GP12garup2_u:1343: virakta indriyārthebhyaḥ sa me pūjyo na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1347: anugṛhāṇa māṃ deva kṣamasva mama sāhasam /
GP12garup2_u:1348: ityuktvā darśayāmāsa mantriṇāṃ saṃjñayā bhruvaḥ // GarP_2,6.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1349: vadiṣyati samagraṃ te svayaṃ vaktuṃ na sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:1350: sāmantaḥ sarvavedajño jñātvā hārdaṃ nṛpasya ca // GarP_2,6.49 //
GP12garup2_u:1355: gavāṃ śuśrūṣako nityaṃ brāhmaṇānāñca pūjakaḥ // GarP_2,6.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1359: kadācidbandhubhiḥ sākaṃ kṛtvā tīrthāni bhūriśaḥ // GarP_2,6.53 //
GP12garup2_u:1365: dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ dharmanilayaṃ praklinnaṃ mānasaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:1367: śīryamāṇaṃ śarīraṃ hi jñātvā mṛtyuṃ puraḥ sthitam // GarP_2,6.56 //
GP12garup2_u:1369: kṛtvā tīrthāni vidhivadviśrāṇya vipulaṃ vasu // GarP_2,6.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1372: tīrthāni santi bhūrīṇi varṣai'smin bhārate śubhe // GarP_2,6.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1373: yattvayā hyupacīrṇāni tāni sarvāṇi me vada /
GP12garup2_u:1375: gaṅgā ca sūrya tanayā mahāpuṇyā sarasvatī // GarP_2,6.59 //
GP12garup2_u:1378: mṛtānāṃ yatra jantūnāṃ karṇe japati tārakam /
GP12garup2_u:1383: āgneyaṃ vāyukauberaṃ kaumāraṃ bhūruhāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.63 //
GP12garup2_u:1384: saukaraṃ mathurā yatra nityaṃ sannihato hariḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1387: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā malayaḥ kṛṣṇaveṇikā // GarP_2,6.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1391: veṅkaṭādrau mahātejāḥ śrīraṅgākhyaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ // GarP_2,6.67 //
GP12garup2_u:1398: avāpa girijā devī tapasā yatra śaṅkaram /
GP12garup2_u:1409: anyānyapi ca tīrthāni kṛtāni kṛpayā tava // GarP_2,6.76 //
GP12garup2_u:1413: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvarṇānāṃ vidyayā vayasādhikaḥ // GarP_2,6.78 //
GP12garup2_u:1415: kiṃ kuryāṃ kaṃ nu pṛcche 'haṃ mano me 'ticalaṃ mune // GarP_2,6.79 //
GP12garup2_u:1417: manāgapi na sahate virahaṃ timiraṃ bruvat // GarP_2,6.80 //
GP12garup2_u:1419: śāntiṃ yathā samāyāti sampannamiva bhūsura // GarP_2,6.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1422: manastu prabalaṃ nityaṃ savikāraṃ svabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,6.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1433: śuśrūṣaṇānuvṛttyā ca praśrayeṇa damena ca // GarP_2,6.87 //
GP12garup2_u:1435: manīṣā nirmalā yena jātā mama śubhārthinī // GarP_2,6.88 //
GP12garup2_u:1438: śṛṇu vatsa pravakṣyā mo hitāya tava bālaka // GarP_2,6.89 //
GP12garup2_u:1439: yena vai dhriyamāṇena ihāmutra sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1442: devatvaṃ yāti sattvena rajasā ca manuṣyatām // GarP_2,6.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1444: māturlabdhvā punarjanma mriyate ca punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,6.92 //
GP12garup2_u:1450: navanīyaṃ yathā dadhno jyotiḥ kāṣṭhādapi kvacit // GarP_2,6.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1451: manthanaiḥ sādhanairevaṃ paraṃ jñātvā sukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1452: ātmā nityo 'vyayaḥ satyaḥ sarvagaḥ sarvabhṛnmahān // GarP_2,6.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1458: bhaktānukampī bhagavān sādhūnāṃ rakṣaṇāya ca // GarP_2,6.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1462: tataḥ kṛtārtho bhavati sadā sarvatra niḥ spṛhaḥ // GarP_2,6.101 //
GP12garup2_u:1465: kva svapne niyataṃ dhairyamindrajāle kva satyatā /
GP12garup2_u:1466: kva nityatā śaranmeghe kva vā satyaṃ kalevare // GarP_2,6.103 //
GP12garup2_u:1469: ityuktvā te gatāḥ sarve sādhavo dīnavatsalāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1474: antarhitaṃ mahatejo yathā saudāminī divi // GarP_2,6.107 //
GP12garup2_u:1476: kāle kalevaraṃ tyaktvā gatavān harimavyayam // GarP_2,6.108 //
GP12garup2_u:1480: ityuktvā me svānubhavaṃ yayau yādṛcchiko muniḥ // GarP_2,6.110 //
GP12garup2_u:1482: ataste sādhusaṅgatyā bhaktyā ca paramātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.111 //
GP12garup2_u:1485: kṣipraṃ naśyati dharmajña jalānāṃ śarado yathā /
GP12garup2_u:1487: pītvā te vākyapīyūṣaṃ svāntaṃ me śāntimāgamat // GarP_2,6.113 //
GP12garup2_u:1489: iti śrutvā vacastasya provāca ṛpisattamaḥ // GarP_2,6.114 //
GP12garup2_u:1492: yattvayā sukṛtaṃ bhūrivṛṣotsargaṃ vinā kṛtam // GarP_2,6.115 //
GP12garup2_u:1494: vṛṣotsargasamaṃ kiñcit sādhanaṃ na mahītale // GarP_2,6.116 //
GP12garup2_u:1496: vṛṣotsargaḥ kṛto yena aśvamedhasya yājakaḥ // GarP_2,6.117 //
GP12garup2_u:1497: ubhau samau mayā dṛṣṭau divyau tau śakrasannidhau /
GP12garup2_u:1498: atastvaṃ puṣkaraṃ gatvā vṛṣotsargaṃ vidhāya ca // GarP_2,6.118 //
GP12garup2_u:1499: tato yāhi gṛhaṃ sādho yena sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:1501: tataḥ sa punarāgatya kārtikyāṃ puṣkare vare // GarP_2,6.119 //
GP12garup2_u:1507: tena rājakule janma vīrasenasya dharmataḥ // GarP_2,6.122 //
GP12garup2_u:1509: prakurvato vṛṣotsargaṃ tatra ye paricārakāḥ // GarP_2,6.123 //
GP12garup2_u:1512: tato dūratarā ye ca dṛśyante malinā janāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1513: durbhagā malinā rūkṣāḥ kṛśā vigatavāsasaḥ // GarP_2,6.125 //
GP12garup2_u:1516: dharmyaṃ vicitramākhyānaṃ śrutaṃ me yat parāśarāt /
GP12garup2_u:1517: atastvaṃ svagṛhaṃ gaccha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mamopari // GarP_2,6.127 //
GP12garup2_u:1518: śrutvā vipaścidvākyaṃ sa vismayaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1519: gṛhaṃ jagāma vipro 'sau prāpito rājasevakaiḥ // GarP_2,6.128 //
GP12garup2_u:1522: samācara vidhānena yadi bhīto yamādapi // GarP_2,6.129 //
GP12garup2_u:1524: mayā dharmarahasyaṃ te kathitaṃ rājasattama // GarP_2,6.130 //
GP12garup2_u:1526: vṛṣotsargaṃ na kurvīta gāṃ dadyācca payasviḥ nīm // GarP_2,6.131 //
GP12garup2_u:1528: śrutvā vākyaṃ vasiṣṭhasya rājā madhupurīṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1529: cakāra vidhivat sarvaṃ vṛṣotsargamahaṃ khaga // GarP_2,6.132 //
GP12garup2_u:1531: kālena nidhanaṃ prāpto nīto vaivasvatānugaiḥ // GarP_2,6.133 //
GP12garup2_u:1532: sa kālanagaraṃ hitvā gato dūrataraṃ pathi /
GP12garup2_u:1536: gataṃ pāpapuraṃ tattu na draṣṭavyaṃ bhavādṛśaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1539: ātmānaṃ darśayā māsa tasya rājño mahātmanaḥ // GarP_2,6.137 //
GP12garup2_u:1543: nīyatāṃ devalokāya yatra bhogāḥ supuṣkalāḥ // GarP_2,6.139 //
GP12garup2_u:1545: na jāne kena puṇyena svargaṃ nayasi māṃ vibho // GarP_2,6.140 //
GP12garup2_u:1547: tvayā kṛtāni puṇyāni dānaṃ yajñāḥ savistarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1552: vīrabāhurdivaṃ gatvā devaiḥ saha mumoda ha // GarP_2,6.143 //
GP12garup2_u:1554: mayā te kathitaṃ pakṣin vṛṣayajñaḥ suvistaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1555: prāṇināṃ karmanirhāraṃ śrutvā pāpaiḥ pramucyate // GarP_2,6.144 //
GP12garup2_u:1556: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvidṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargamāhātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1561: punaranyāṃ kathāṃ brūhi yatra te mahimādbhutaḥ // GarP_2,7.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1572: jalasyonmīlya nayane diśaḥ sarvā nyabhīlayat // GarP_2,7.6 //
GP12garup2_u:1579: ete cānye ca bahavo vṛkṣāsteṣu na dṛśyate /
GP12garup2_u:1580: pakṣiṇāmapi vai panthā manuṣyasya kutaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,7.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1584: śvāpadaiśca tathā cānyaiḥ piśācai rākṣasairvṛte // GarP_2,7.12 //
GP12garup2_u:1586: kāndiśīkaḥ samabhavaḍh yadbhaviṣyo yayau punaḥ // GarP_2,7.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1589: sa tatra vaṭavṛkṣāgre snāyuvaddhaṃ śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1590: dadarśa tadbhujaścaiva pañca pretān sudāruṇām // GarP_2,7.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1598: ahaṃ pūrvamahaṃ pūrvaṃ yāmītyāktvā pradudruvuḥ // GarP_2,7.19 //
GP12garup2_u:1606: avatīrya tato vyomno gṛhītvā caraṇaiḥ // GarP_2,7.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1608: sa nīyamānamātmānaṃ vilokya viyati dvijaḥ // GarP_2,7.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1609: jagāma manasā māṃ sa śaraṇaṃ bhayavihvalaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1610: namaścakre cakradharaṃ cetasā cinmayaṃ samam // GarP_2,7.25 //
GP12garup2_u:1611: vakraṃ nakraṃ cakrapātena dūre kṛtvā hṛtvā tasya duḥ khaṃ mukundaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1612: mātaṅgaṃ yo 'mūmucannakravaktrātpāśaṃso 'sau karmaṇāṃ me lunātu // GarP_2,7.26 //
GP12garup2_u:1614: nirbaddhānyo bhargayajñāya muktaścakro me 'sau karmapāśaṃ lunātu // GarP_2,7.27 //
GP12garup2_u:1616: agacchaṃ sahasā tatra yatra pretaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,7.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1618: papraccha na kiyantaṃ vai kālaṃ tānpṛṣṭhato 'nvagām // GarP_2,7.29 //
GP12garup2_u:1622: nikocyākṣi svapārśvaṃ sa nīto vai yakṣarāṇmayā // GarP_2,7.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1623: tamavocaṃ mahāyakṣaṃ tvaṃ hi pratibhaṭo bhava /
GP12garup2_u:1624: pretānnāśaya tadbhūyaḥ śavañca hara tadgatam // GarP_2,7.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1625: ityuktaḥ sa mahāghoraṃ kṛtvā roṣaṃ suduḥ saham /
GP12garup2_u:1626: jagrāha pretarūpaṃ tatpretānāmapi duḥ khadam // GarP_2,7.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1627: sa vivṛtya svakau bāhū sṛkkiṇī parilelihan /
GP12garup2_u:1629: bāhubhyāṃ dvau dvau ca padbhyāṃ mūrdhnaikaṃ ca samāharat /
GP12garup2_u:1631: te vivarṇamukhāḥ sarve taṃ dvijañca śavaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:1634: daṃṣṭrāghātaiśca sarve tamekaṃ pretaṃ vyadārayan // GarP_2,7.37 //
GP12garup2_u:1636: jīvaṃ na tu śavaṃ teṣāṃ jahre prāṇamivāntakaḥ // GarP_2,7.38 //
GP12garup2_u:1637: hṛtamātre śave te tu pāriyātre girau dvijam /
GP12garup2_u:1638: muktvādhamātre pramuditā ekaṃ pretaṃ sudāruṇāḥ // GarP_2,7.39 //
GP12garup2_u:1640: adṛśyatāṃ yayau te 'tha hatāśā vipramāgaman // GarP_2,7.40 //
GP12garup2_u:1642: mama sthānasya viprasya mahimneva ca tatkṣaṇe // GarP_2,7.41 //
GP12garup2_u:1643: sadyaḥ smṛtiḥ samutpannā teṣāṃ pūrvasya janmanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1648: kiṃ māyā kimu vā svapna utāho cittavibhramaḥ // GarP_2,7.44 //
GP12garup2_u:1652: kiṃnāmānaḥ kimācārāḥ kathañcemāṃ daśāṃ gatāḥ // GarP_2,7.45 //
GP12garup2_u:1653: avinītāḥ kathaṃ pūrvaṃ vinītāḥ sāmprataṃ katham /
GP12garup2_u:1657: ahaṃ paryuṣito nāmnā eṣa sūcīmukhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,7.47 //
GP12garup2_u:1660: pretānāṃ karmajātānāṃ kuto nāma nirarthakam // GarP_2,7.48 //
GP12garup2_u:1661: niruktimeṣāṃ nāmnāṃ vai pretā vadata mā ciram /
GP12garup2_u:1665: kadācicchrāddhakāle vai mayā vipro nimantritaḥ // GarP_2,7.50 //
GP12garup2_u:1666: sa ca kṛtvā vilambena vṛddho madgṛhamāgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1667: akṛtaśrāddhakarmāhaṃ taṃ pākaṃ bhuktavān kṣudhā // GarP_2,7.51 //
GP12garup2_u:1669: tasmāt pāpānmṛtaḥ pāpo yoniṃ vai kutsitāṃ gataḥ // GarP_2,7.52 //
GP12garup2_u:1670: yataḥ paryuṣitaṃ dattaṃ tataḥ paryuṣitaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1675: vane tu vijane tatra pāpādhvagagatiṃ gataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1676: tasyāḥ savastraṃ pātheyaṃ tatsūnorvasanāni ca // GarP_2,7.55 //
GP12garup2_u:1680: mayātha sakalaṃ pītaṃ jalaṃ pātrāttṛṣāvatā // GarP_2,7.57 //
GP12garup2_u:1682: putraśokānmṛtā mātā kūpe prāsya nijaṃ vapuḥ // GarP_2,7.58 //
GP12garup2_u:1685: yadyapi prāpnuyāṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣituntu na śakyate /
GP12garup2_u:1687: ata āsye tu vivaraṃ sūcyagreṇa samaṃmama /
GP12garup2_u:1690: purāhaṃ vaiśyajātīyaḥ sākaṃ sakhyā ca kenacit /
GP12garup2_u:1692: mitraṃ ca me bahudhanaṃ tasya lobho mahāṃstataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1697: abhūttadāti pāpasya krūrā matiratīva me // GarP_2,7.65 //
GP12garup2_u:1699: katkṛtyaṃ kurvato nāvi lokaistu jñātameva na // GarP_2,7.66 //
GP12garup2_u:1702: tatsarvaṃ svagṛhe muktvā tasya patnyai nyavedayam /
GP12garup2_u:1703: dasyubhirme hato bhrātā dhanamācchidya vai pathi // GarP_2,7.68 //
GP12garup2_u:1705: śokārtā sāpi tatkālaṃ mamatvaṃ gṛhabandhuṣu // GarP_2,7.69 //
GP12garup2_u:1707: tato niṣkaṇṭakaṃ taddhi vīkṣya hṛṣṭo gato gṛham // GarP_2,7.70 //
GP12garup2_u:1709: mitraṃ pūre hi niḥ kṣipya yadahaṃ śīghramāgataḥ // GarP_2,7.71 //
GP12garup2_u:1714: vṛddhau me pitarāvāstāṃ laghurekaḥ sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,7.73 //
GP12garup2_u:1715: śīghraṃ sa ca mayā bhrātā lubdhenaikaḥ pṛthakkṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1717: adattāṃ pitarau cchannaṃ kiñcitkiñcittu tasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:1722: sosau bālo 'pi babhrāma pitṛbhyāṃ rahito dvija // GarP_2,7.77 //
GP12garup2_u:1731: tāsāṃ me kurvataḥ pūjāṃ pāpā matirajāyata // GarP_2,7.81 //
GP12garup2_u:1733: ullekhanañca ratnānāṃ netrādibhyaḥ kṛtaṃ mayā // GarP_2,7.82 //
GP12garup2_u:1735: netrāṇi ca viratnāni nṛpaścukrodha vahnivat // GarP_2,7.83 //
GP12garup2_u:1737: ābhyo ratnaṃ suvarṇañca hṛtaṃ yena bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,7.84 //
GP12garup2_u:1738: jñātaśca sa hi me vadhyo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1739: ahaṃ tatsakalaṃ jñātvā rātrāvasidharo gṛham // GarP_2,7.85 //
GP12garup2_u:1741: gṛhītvātha maṇīn svarṇaṃ niśīthe 'haṃ gato 'nyataḥ // GarP_2,7.86 //
GP12garup2_u:1751: dhṛtirjñānaṃ naiva yatra vayaṃ tatra vasāmahe // GarP_2,7.90 //
GP12garup2_u:1752: tasya pīḍāṃ vapaṃ kurmo naiva śrāddhaṃ na tarpaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:1753: yasya gehe tadaṅgāttu māṃsañca rudhiraṃ kramāt // GarP_2,7.91 //
GP12garup2_u:1754: jakṣāmaśca pibāmaśca ukta ācāra eṣa naḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1757: vamanaṃ viḍū dūṣikā ca śleṣmā mūtrāśruṇī tathā // GarP_2,7.93 //
GP12garup2_u:1758: etadbhakṣyañca pānañca mā pṛcchātaḥ paraṃ dvija /
GP12garup2_u:1759: lajjā no jāyate svāminnāhāraṃ vadatāṃ svakam // GarP_2,7.94 //
GP12garup2_u:1761: akasmājjanmanāṃ vipra smṛtiḥ prāptā tu paurvikī // GarP_2,7.95 //
GP12garup2_u:1764: evaṃ vadatsu preteṣu tathā śrutavati dvije // GarP_2,7.96 //
GP12garup2_u:1766: sa tu dṛṣṭvā dvijaśreṣṭho hṛdgataṃ puruṣaṃ puraḥ // GarP_2,7.97 //
GP12garup2_u:1771: kṛpayā yaḥ samuddhāraṃ kuruṣe vai namo 'sta te // GarP_2,7.99 //
GP12garup2_u:1772: evaṃ dvijātau bruvati prabhū taprabhaiśca mukhyāṃbaracāriyuktaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1773: tadā madicchāprabhavairvimānaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ samantādruruce giriḥ saḥ // GarP_2,7.100 //
GP12garup2_u:1774: itthaṃ vimānena madīyalokaṃ gato dvijaraso 'pyatha pañcamistaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1776: pretāḥ saṃgavaśena nākamavansantaptako brāhmaṇo viṣvaksana iti prasiddhavibhavo nāmnā gaṇe me 'bhavat /
GP12garup2_u:1777: etatte sakalaṃ mayā nigāditaṃ yaścaitadutkīrtayedyaścedaṃ śṛṇuyānna so 'pi puruṣaḥ pretatvamāpnoti hi // GarP_2,7.102 //
GP12garup2_u:1778: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe pañcapretopākhyānaṃ nāma saptamo 'dyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1783: kriyāḥ katividhāḥ proktā vadaitatsarvameva me // GarP_2,8.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1785: putraḥ pautraḥ prapautro vā tadbhrātā bhrātṛsantatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1788: kuladvaye 'pi cocchinne strībhiḥ kāryāḥ kriyāḥ khaga // GarP_2,8.3 //
GP12garup2_u:1790: pūrvāḥ kriyā madhyamāśca tathā caivottarāḥ kriyāḥ // GarP_2,8.4 //
GP12garup2_u:1792: śrāddhaṃ tatra prakartavyaṃ phalaṃ tasya śṛṇuṣva me // GarP_2,8.5 //
GP12garup2_u:1801: kartavyaṃ kiṃ tadā viṣṇo puruṣeṇa vijānatā // GarP_2,8.9 //
GP12garup2_u:1803: adhikāro yadā nāsti yadi nāsti ca niścayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:1804: jīvite sati jīvāya dadyācchrāddhaṃsvayaṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,8.10 //
GP12garup2_u:1806: kartāramatha bhoktāraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarveśvaraṃ yajet // GarP_2,8.11 //
GP12garup2_u:1809: agnaye kavyavāhanāya svadhā nama iti smaran /
GP12garup2_u:1810: somāyatvā pitṛmate svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.13 //
GP12garup2_u:1812: yamāyāṅgirase cātha svadhā nama iti smaran // GarP_2,8.14 //
GP12garup2_u:1813: tayormadhye tu niḥ kṣipya viprānsaṃmantrya bho jayet /
GP12garup2_u:1814: prathamāmuttare nyasya dvitīyāṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset // GarP_2,8.15 //
GP12garup2_u:1820: sāmyāṃ dhenuṃ tato dadyādvasūddeśaṃ dvijāya tu // GarP_2,8.18 //
GP12garup2_u:1821: āgneyyāṃ cātha raudrāya yāmyāṃ sūryadvijāya tu /
GP12garup2_u:1825: tataḥ kāmaṃ kuleśānīṃ śivaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ smaret /
GP12garup2_u:1827: vastrāṇi lohakhaṇḍāni jitaṃ ta iti saṃjapan /
GP12garup2_u:1828: dakṣiṇābhimukho vahniṃ jvālayettatra ca svayam // GarP_2,8.22 //
GP12garup2_u:1830: hutvā śmāśānikaṃ homaṃ pūrṇāhutyantameva hi // GarP_2,8.23 //
GP12garup2_u:1831: niragrimatha vā bhūmiṃ yamaṃ rudrañca saṃsmaret /
GP12garup2_u:1832: hutvā prādhānike sthāne paścādāvāhayecca tam // GarP_2,8.24 //
GP12garup2_u:1836: oṃ yamāya namaśceti dvitīyaṃ tadanantaram // GarP_2,8.26 //
GP12garup2_u:1838: tato dīpte samiddhe 'gnau bhūmau prakṛtidāruṇe // GarP_2,8.27 //
GP12garup2_u:1840: yamāya dharmarājāya mṛtyave cāntakāya ca // GarP_2,8.28 //
GP12garup2_u:1846: daśa piṇḍāṃstu dāndattvā viṣṇoḥ saumyaṃ mukhaṃ smaret // GarP_2,8.31 //
GP12garup2_u:1848: āśaucānte tataḥ kuryādātmano vā marasya tu // GarP_2,8.32 //
GP12garup2_u:1850: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ jīvacchrāddhaṃ mayā khaga // GarP_2,8.33 //
GP12garup2_u:1851: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇa garuḍasaṃvāde śrāddhakartrātmaśrāddhayornirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:1856: kasyacitkenacidrājñā kimādyā sā kṛtā purā // GarP_2,9.1 //
GP12garup2_u:1858: suparṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi yathā rājñā kriyā kṛtā /

GP12garup2_u:2290: bhoktāro viprayujyante kartā doṣeṇa lipyate // GarP_2,12.21 //
GP12garup2_u:2291: ko 'pi mṛtyuṃ na jayati bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2292: sukhaduḥ khādiko vāpi punarāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,12.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2294: ekaḥ prajāyate jantureka eva pralīyate // GarP_2,12.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2295: eko 'pi bhuṅkte sukṛtameka eva ca duṣkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2300: śarīraṃ vahninā dagdhaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ saha sthitam // GarP_2,12.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2301: śubhaṃ vā yadi vā pāpaṃ bhuṅkte sarvatra mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2302: yadanastamite sūrye na dattaṃ dhanamarthinām // GarP_2,12.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2303: na jāne tasya tadvittaṃ prātaḥ kasya bhaviṣyati /
GP12garup2_u:2304: rāraṭīti dhanaṃ tasya ko me bhartā bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,12.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2308: dhanena dhāryate dharmaḥ śraddhāpūtena cetasā // GarP_2,12.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2310: dharmācca jāyate hyartho dharmātkāmo 'pi jāyate // GarP_2,12.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2313: akiñcanā hi munayaḥ śraddhāvanto divaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2314: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapastaptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2315: asadityucyate pakṣinpretya ceha na tatphalam // GarP_2,12.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2316: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde mṛtasya dharmamātrānuyāyitvanirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2320: karmaṇā kena deveśa pretatvaṃ naiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:2321: pṛthivyāṃ sarvajantūnāṃ tad brūhi parameśvara // GarP_2,13.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2328: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi vṛṣotsargaṃ karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2329: pretatvaṃ na bhavettasya vinā dānamakhavrataiḥ // GarP_2,13.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2333: kiṃ phalaṃ tu bhavedante kṛtaiḥ śrāddhaistu ṣoḍaśaiḥ // GarP_2,13.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2336: nopatiṣṭhati tacchreyo dātuḥ pretasya niṣphalam // GarP_2,13.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2338: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,13.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2341: jalena śṛṅgiṇā vāpi śastrādyairmriyate yadi // GarP_2,13.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2346: sārdhamāsena vaiśyastu śūdro māsena śudhyati // GarP_2,13.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2348: brahmacārī śucirbhūtvā na sa yātīha durgatim // GarP_2,13.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2353: puttro vā sodaro vāpi pautro bandhujanastathā /
GP12garup2_u:2354: gotriṇaścārthabhāgī ca mṛte kuryād vṛṣotsavam // GarP_2,13.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2355: putrābhāve tu patnī syāddauhittro duhītāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:2356: puttreṣu vidyamāneṣu vṛṣaṃ nānyena kārayet // GarP_2,13.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2358: puttrā yasya na vidyante narā nāryaḥ sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:2361: aputtrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:2363: yāni kāni ca dānāni svayaṃ dattāni mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2364: tānitāni ca sarvāṇi tūpatiṣṭhanti cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,13.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2366: svahastena pradattāni dehānte cākṣayaṃ phalam // GarP_2,13.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2372: vāyubhūtaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo bhramate ca divāniśam // GarP_2,13.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2373: kṛmiḥ kīṭaḥ pataṅgo vā jāyate mriyate punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2374: asadgarbhe bhavetso 'pi jātaḥ sadyo vinaśyati // GarP_2,13.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2375: yāvatsvasthamidaṃ śarīramarujaṃ yāvajjarā dūrato yāvaccendriyaśaktirapratihatā yāvatkṣayo nāyuṣaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2376: ātmaśreyasi tāvadeva viduṣā kāryaḥ prayatno mahānsandīpte bhavane tu kūpakhananaṃ pratyudyamaḥ kīdṛśaḥ // GarP_2,13.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2377: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsargadānadharmaputrādipraśaṃsanaṃ nāma trayodaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2382: svasthāvasthena dattena vidhihīnena vā vibho // GarP_2,14.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2384: ekā gauḥ svasthacittasya hyāturasya ca gośatam /
GP12garup2_u:2391: dātavyaṃ pratyahaṃ pātre nimitteṣu viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,14.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2393: apātre jātu gaurdattā dātāraṃ narakaṃ nayet // GarP_2,14.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2395: dehāntaraṃ pariprāpya svahastena kṛtaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,14.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2400: svalpenāpi hi vittena svayaṃ hastena yatkṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:2401: akṣayaṃ yāti tatsarvaṃ yathājyaṃ ca hutāśane // GarP_2,14.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2402: ekā caikasya dātavyā śayyā kanyā payasvinī /
GP12garup2_u:2403: sā vikrītā vā dahatyāsaptamaṃ kulam // GarP_2,14.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2407: evaṃ jñātvā khagaśreṣṭha vṛṣayajñaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,14.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2408: akṛtvā mriyate yastu aputro naiva muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:2409: aputro 'pi hi yaḥ kuryātsukhaṃ yāti mahāpathe // GarP_2,14.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2411: na tāṃ gatimavāpnoti vṛṣotsargeṇa yā gatiḥ // GarP_2,14.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2416: kasminkāle tithau kasyāṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet // GarP_2,14.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2417: kṛtvā kiṃ phalamāpnoti etanme vada sāmpratam /
GP12garup2_u:2418: tvatprasādena govinda mukte bhavati mānavaḥ // GarP_2,14.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2422: śubhe lagne muhūrte vā śucau deśe samāhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2423: brāhmaṇaṃ tu samāhūya vidhijñaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,14.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2427: grahāṇāṃ sthāpanaṃ kuryātpūrvaṃ caiva khageśvara // GarP_2,14.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2428: mātṝṇāṃ pūjanaṃ kāryaṃ vasordhārāṃ ca pātayet /
GP12garup2_u:2429: vahniṃ saṃsthāpya tatraiva pūrṇaṃ homaṃ tu kārayet // GarP_2,14.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2433: pradakṣiṇaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhomānte ca visarjanam // GarP_2,14.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2435: dharma tvaṃ vṛṣarūpeṇa brahmaṇā nirmitaḥ purā // GarP_2,14.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2439: abhiṣiñcettato nīlaṃ rudrakumbho dakena tu // GarP_2,14.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2441: anna (ātma) śrāddhaṃ tataḥ kuryāddadyāddānaṃ dvijottame // GarP_2,14.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2444: nyūnaṃ saṃpūrṇatāṃ yāti vṛṣotsarge kṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2445: sutṛpto dustare mārge mṛto yāti na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,14.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2446: yamalokaṃ na paśyanti sadā dānaratā narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2447: yāvanna dīyate jantoḥ śrāddhaṃ caikādaśāhikam // GarP_2,14.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2449: trayodaśā tathā sapta pañca trīṇī krameṇa tu // GarP_2,14.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2451: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta sapta pañca yathākramam // GarP_2,14.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2453: vṛṣaṃ hi śannodevīti vedoktavidhinā tataḥ // GarP_2,14.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2455: vāme cakraṃ pradātavyaṃ triśūlaṃ dakṣiṇe tathā // GarP_2,14.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2456: mūlyaṃ dadyād vṛṣasyāpi taṃ vṛṣaṃ ca visarjayet /
GP12garup2_u:2469: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,14.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2471: tilapātrāṇi kurvīta śayyādānaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,14.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2473: evaṃ yaḥ kurute tārkṣya putravānapyaputravān // GarP_2,14.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2474: sa siddhiṃ samavāpnoti yathā te brahmacāriṇaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2479: puṇyaṃ deyaṃ prayatnena pratyahaṃ vardhate khaga // GarP_2,14.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2481: tattasya cākṣayaṃ sarvaṃ vedikāyāṃ yathā kila // GarP_2,14.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2483: tathaiva pratipūjyante loke sarve ca nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,14.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2485: te yānti paramāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,14.51 //
GP12garup2_u:2487: śṛṅgeṇālikhate vāpi bhūmiṃ nityaṃ praharṣitaḥ // GarP_2,14.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2496: ye namasyanti govindaṃ na teṣāṃ vidyate bhayam /
GP12garup2_u:2498: yāsyanti te parāṃllokāniti satyaṃ vaco mama /
GP12garup2_u:2503: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde godānavṛṣotsargadaśadānabhūridānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturdaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2511: prayāṇakāni sarvāṇi nagarāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,15.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2513: yamalokasya cordhvaṃ vai antarā mānuṣasya ca // GarP_2,15.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2514: kukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi bhuktvā loke yathārjitam /
GP12garup2_u:2517: yasya yo vihito mṛtyuḥ sa taṃ dhruvamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,15.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2524: ekā vaktre tu dātavyā ghrāṇayugme tathā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2525: akṣṇośca karṇayoścaiva dvedve deye yathākramam // GarP_2,15.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2526: atha liṅge tathā caikā tvekāṃ brahmāṇḍakekṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:2527: karayugme ca kaṇṭhe ca tulasīṃ ca pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2531: pituḥ pretaṃ svayaṃ putraḥ skandhamāropya bāndhavaiḥ // GarP_2,15.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2533: adagdhapūrvā yā bhūmiścitāṃ tatraiva kārayet // GarP_2,15.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2538: bībhatsaṃ dāruṇaṃ rūpaṃ praṇaiḥ kaṇṭhaṃ samāśritaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2539: phenamudgirate kopi mukhaṃ lālākulaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,15.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2542: duḥ khena pāpino yānti yamamārge ca durgame /
GP12garup2_u:2545: āhūya pāpinaḥ sarvānyamo daṇḍena rajjayet // GarP_2,15.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2551: aṅguṣṭhamātraḥ puruṣo hāhā kurvan kalevarāt // GarP_2,15.22 //
GP12garup2_u:2553: nirviceṣṭaṃ śarīraṃ tu prāṇairmuktaṃ jugupsitam // GarP_2,15.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2557: dānaṃ vittādṛtā vācaḥ kīrtidharmau tathāyuṣaḥ // GarP_2,15.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2559: tasyaivaṃ nīyamānasya dūtāḥ santarjayanti hi // GarP_2,15.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2560: darśayanto bhayaṃ tīvraṃ narakāya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2561: śīghraṃ pracala duṣṭātman gato 'sitvaṃ yamālaye // GarP_2,15.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2563: evaṃ vācastadā śṛṇvanbandhūnāṃ ruditaṃ tathā // GarP_2,15.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2565: sthāne śrāddhaṃ prakurvīta tathā cekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,15.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2567: mṛtasthāne tathā dvāre catvare tārkṣya kāraṇāt // GarP_2,15.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2568: viśrāme kāṣṭhacayane tathā sañcayane ca ṣaṭ /
GP12garup2_u:2569: śṛṇu tatkāraṇaṃ tārkṣya ṣaṭ piṇḍaparikalpane // GarP_2,15.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2570: mṛtasthāne śavo nāma tena nāmnā pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:2573: dvāre tu piṇḍaṃ deyaṃ ca pānthamityabhidhāya tu // GarP_2,15.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2575: catvare khecaro nāma tamuddiśya pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2577: viśrāme bhūtasaṃjño 'yaṃ tena tatra pradāpayet // GarP_2,15.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2578: piśācā rākṣasā yakṣā ye cānye diśi vāsinaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2581: citāyāṃ sādhakaṃ nāma vadantyeke khageśvara // GarP_2,15.37 //
GP12garup2_u:2585: anyathā copaghātāya pūrvoktāste bhavanti hi // GarP_2,15.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2586: utkrāme prathamaṃ piṇḍaṃ tathā cārdhapayepi ca /
GP12garup2_u:2587: citāyāṃ tu tṛtīyaṃ syāttrayaḥ piṇḍāśca kalpitāḥ // GarP_2,15.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2601: yamāya cāntakāyeti mṛtyave brahmaṇe tathā // GarP_2,15.47 //
GP12garup2_u:2603: ūrdhvaṃ tu jvālayedvahniṃ pūrvabhāge citāṃ punaḥ // GarP_2,15.48 //
GP12garup2_u:2605: asau svargāya lokāya svāhā jvalati pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,15.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2607: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ putreṇa kila niścitam // GarP_2,15.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2608: roditavyaṃ tato gāḍhamevaṃ tasya sukhaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2611: tāvadbhūtāḥ pratīkṣante taṃ pretaṃ bāndhavārthinam // GarP_2,15.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2617: dvārasya dakṣiṇe bhāge gomayaṃ gaurasarṣapān // GarP_2,15.55 //
GP12garup2_u:2619: bhakṣayennimbapatrāṇi ghṛtaṃ prāśya gṛhaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,15.56 //
GP12garup2_u:2621: aśrupātaṃ na kurvīta dadyādasmai jalāñjalīn // GarP_2,15.57 //
GP12garup2_u:2623: ato na roditavyaṃ hi kriyāḥ kāryāḥ svaśaktitaḥ // GarP_2,15.58 //
GP12garup2_u:2624: dugdhaṃ ca mṛnmaye pātre toyaṃ dadyāddinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:2625: sūrye cāstaṃ gate tārkṣya valabhyāṃ catvare 'pi vā // GarP_2,15.59 //
GP12garup2_u:2627: śmaśānaṃ catvaraṃ gehaṃ vīkṣanyāmyaiḥ sa nīyate // GarP_2,15.60 //
GP12garup2_u:2628: garte piṇḍā daśāhaṃ ca dātavyāśca dinedine /
GP12garup2_u:2631: puttreṇa hi kriyā kāryā bhāryayā tadabhāvataḥ // GarP_2,15.62 //
GP12garup2_u:2633: śmaśāne cānyatīrthe vā jalaṃ piṇḍaṃ ca dāpayet // GarP_2,15.63 //
GP12garup2_u:2637: pratyahaṃ te vibhajyante caturbhāgāḥ khageśvara // GarP_2,15.65 //
GP12garup2_u:2643: nāma gotraṃ samuccārya yaddattaṃ taddaśāhikam // GarP_2,15.68 //
GP12garup2_u:2645: prathame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastena mūrdhā prajāyate // GarP_2,15.69 //
GP12garup2_u:2646: grīvā skandhau dvitīye ca tṛtīye hṛdayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:2647: caturthena bhavetpṛṣṭhaṃ pañcame nābhireva ca // GarP_2,15.70 //
GP12garup2_u:2648: ṣaṭ saptame kaṭī guhyamṛrū cāpyaṣṭame tathā /
GP12garup2_u:2649: tālū pādau ca navame daśame 'hni kṣudhā bhavet // GarP_2,15.71 //
GP12garup2_u:2650: dehaṃ prāptaḥ kṣudhāviṣṭo gṛhe dvāre ca tiṣṭhati /
GP12garup2_u:2651: daśame 'hani yaḥ piṇḍastaṃ dadyādāmiṣeṇa tu // GarP_2,15.72 //
GP12garup2_u:2653: atastvāmiṣabāhyena kṣudhā tasya na naśyati // GarP_2,15.73 //
GP12garup2_u:2658: trayodaśe 'hni sa preto nīyate ca mahāpathe /
GP12garup2_u:2659: piṇḍajaṃ dehamāśritya divā naktaṃ bubhukṣitaḥ // GarP_2,15.76 //
GP12garup2_u:2661: kṣudhā tṛṣṇātmikā caiva savva saumyaṃ kṛtātmanām // GarP_2,15.77 //
GP12garup2_u:2666: gṛhīto yamapāśaiśca hāheti rudite tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2667: svagṛhaṃ tu parityajya yāmyaṃ puramanuvrajet // GarP_2,15.80 //
GP12garup2_u:2668: krameṇa yāti sa pretaḥ puraṃ yāmyaṃ śubhāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2669: atītya tānitānyeva mārge puravarāṇi ca // GarP_2,15.81 //
GP12garup2_u:2671: kroñcaṃ krūrapuraṃ vicitrabhavanaṃ bahvāpadaṃ duḥ khadam // GarP_2,15.82 //
GP12garup2_u:2672: nānākrandapuraṃ sutaprabhavanaṃ raudraṃ payovarṣaṇaṃ śītāḍhyaṃ bahudharmabhītabhavanaṃ yāmyaṃ puraṃ cāgrataḥ // GarP_2,15.83 //
GP12garup2_u:2674: tasminmārge brajatyeko gṛhīta iva markaṭaḥ // GarP_2,15.84 //
GP12garup2_u:2675: tathava sa vrajanmārge putraputreti ca bruvan /
GP12garup2_u:2676: hāheti krandate nityaṃ kīdṛśaṃ tu mayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.85 //
GP12garup2_u:2678: mahatā puṇyayogena mānuṣyaṃ janma labhyate // GarP_2,15.86 //
GP12garup2_u:2679: na tatprāpya pradattaṃ hi yācakebhyaḥ svakaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:2682: sukhasya duḥ khasya na kopi dātā paro dadātīti kubuddhireṣā /
GP12garup2_u:2683: purā kṛtaṃ karma sadaiva bhujyate dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.89 //
GP12garup2_u:2684: mayā na dattaṃ na hutaṃ hutāśane tapo na taptaṃ himaśailagahvare /
GP12garup2_u:2685: na sevitaṃ gāṅgamaho mahājalaṃ dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.90 //
GP12garup2_u:2686: na nityadānaṃ na gāvāhnikaṃ kṛtaṃ na vedadānaṃ na ca śāstrapustakam /
GP12garup2_u:2687: purā nadṛṣṭaṃ na ca sevito 'dhvā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.91 //
GP12garup2_u:2688: jalāśayo naiva kṛto hi nirjale manuṣyahetoḥ paśupakṣihetave /
GP12garup2_u:2689: gotṛptihetorna kṛtaṃ hi gocaraṃ dehinkvacinnastara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.92 //
GP12garup2_u:2690: mayā na bhuktaṃ patisaṅgasaukhyaṃ vahnipraveśo na kṛto mṛte sati /
GP12garup2_u:2691: tasminmṛte tadvratapālanaṃ vā dehinkvacinnistara yattvayā kṛtam // GarP_2,15.93 //
GP12garup2_u:2693: nārīśarīraṃ bahuduḥ khabhājanaṃ labdhaṃ mayā pūrvakṛtairvikarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,15.94 //
GP12garup2_u:2694: uktāni vācyāni mayā narāṇāmataḥ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'pi pakṣin /
GP12garup2_u:2695: strīṇāṃ śarīraṃ pratilabhya dehī bravīti karmāṇi kṛtāni pūrvam // GarP_2,15.95 //
GP12garup2_u:2696: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistāratanmāhātmyatadyānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcadaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2701: krandamānasya nitarāṃ pīḍitasya ca kiṅkaraiḥ // GarP_2,16.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2703: aṣṭādaśe tvahorātre pūrvaṃ yāmyapuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2704: tasminpuravare ramye pretānāṃ ca gaṇo mahān /
GP12garup2_u:2706: pure sa tatra viśrāmaṃ prāpyate yamakiṅkaraiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2707: jāyāputrādikaṃ saukhyaṃ smarettatra suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2709: svadhanaṃ svakalatrāṇi gṛhaṃ putrāḥ sukhāni ca // GarP_2,16.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2710: bhṛtyamitrāṇi cānyacca sarvaṃ śocati vai tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2713: kva dhanaṃ kva sutā jāyā kva gṛhaṃ kva tvamīdṛśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2714: svakarmopārjitaṃ bhuṅkṣva ciraṃ gaccha mahāpathe // GarP_2,16.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2715: jānāsi śaṃbalavaśaṃ balamadhvagānāṃ no śaṃbalaḥ prayatate paralokapāntha /
GP12garup2_u:2716: gantavyamasti tava niścitameva tena mārgeṇa yatra bhavataḥ krayavikrayau na // GarP_2,16.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2719: atra dattaṃ sutaiḥ pātre (traiḥ) snehādvā kṛpayātha vā /
GP12garup2_u:2720: māsikaṃ piṇḍamaśrāti tataḥ sauripuraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,16.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2721: tatra nāmnā tu rājā vai jaṅgamaḥ kālarūpadhṛk /
GP12garup2_u:2722: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu viśrāme kurute matim // GarP_2,16.11 //
GP12garup2_u:2724: traipakṣike tu yaddattaṃ tatpuraṃ sa vyatikramet // GarP_2,16.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2726: gacchanvanāni raudrāṇi dṛṣṭvā krandati tatra saḥ // GarP_2,16.13 //
GP12garup2_u:2727: bhīṣaṇaiḥ kliśyamānastu rudate ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2729: bhuktvā cānnaṃ jalaṃ pītvā yaddattaṃ vāndhavairiha /
GP12garup2_u:2732: tṛtīyaṃ māsikaṃ bhuktvā tatra gacchatyasau puraḥ // GarP_2,16.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2733: śailāgamaṃ caturthe sa māse prāpnoti vai puram /
GP12garup2_u:2735: caturthamāsike śrāddhaṃ bhukte tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2736: tato yāti puraṃ pretaḥ krūraṃ māse tu pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:2737: iha dattaṃ sutairbhuṅkte preto vai tatpure sthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2738: ṣaṣṭhe māsi tataḥ preto yāti krauñcābidhaṃ puram // GarP_2,16.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2740: muhūrtārdhaṃ tu viśramya kampamānaḥ suduḥ khitaḥ // GarP_2,16.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2742: prayāti citranagaraṃ vicitro yatra pārthivaḥ // GarP_2,16.21 //
GP12garup2_u:2746: mārge punaḥ punastasya bubhukṣā pīḍayatyalam // GarP_2,16.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2748: saukhyaṃ yo me janayati patataḥ śokasāgare // GarP_2,16.24 //
GP12garup2_u:2754: vayaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmaḥ sukheneti vadanti te // GarP_2,16.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2755: antaraṃ dehi bho pāntha bahulā cedrucistava /
GP12garup2_u:2756: tena tatra pradattā gaustayā nāvā prasarpati /
GP12garup2_u:2757: manujānāṃ hitaṃ dānamante vaitaraṇī smṛtā // GarP_2,16.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2758: parāpāpaṃ dahetsarvaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ ca sā nayet /
GP12garup2_u:2759: na dattā cetkhagaśreṣṭha tāṃ sametya samajjati // GarP_2,16.29 //
GP12garup2_u:2761: deyā ca viduṣe dhenustāṃ nadīṃ tartumicchatā // GarP_2,16.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2763: pātheyārthaṃ mayā kiñcinna pradattaṃ dvijāyaca // GarP_2,16.31 //
GP12garup2_u:2764: na dattaṃ na hutaṃ japtaṃ na snātaṃ na kṛtaṃ stutam /
GP12garup2_u:2765: yādṛśaṃ karma caritaṃ mūḍha bhuṅkṣveti tādṛśam // GarP_2,16.32 //
GP12garup2_u:2767: vaitaraṇyāḥ parataṭe bhuṅkte dattaṃ ghaṭādikam // GarP_2,16.33 //
GP12garup2_u:2769: tārkṣya tatra viśeṣeṇa bhojayīta dvijāñchubhān // GarP_2,16.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2771: prayāti pratyahaṃ tārkṣya ahorātreṇa karśitaḥ // GarP_2,16.35 //
GP12garup2_u:2772: saptame māsi samprāpte puraṃ bahvāpadaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:2773: tatra bhuktva pradattaṃ yacchrāddhaṃ saptamamāsikam // GarP_2,16.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2776: svayaṃ ca śūnyahṛdayaḥ samākrandati duḥ khitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2777: tanmāsikaṃ ca yacchrāddhaṃ bhuktvā tatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,16.38 //
GP12garup2_u:2778: vihāya tatpuraṃ preto yāti taptapuraṃ prati /
GP12garup2_u:2780: dvijabhojyaṃ piṇḍadānaṃ kṛtaṃ śrāddhaṃ sutena yat // GarP_2,16.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2781: māsi vai daśame prāpte raudraṃ sthānaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2782: daśame māsi yaddattaṃ tadbhuktvā ca prayāti saḥ // GarP_2,16.40 //
GP12garup2_u:2784: meghāstatra pravarṣanti pretānāṃ duḥ khadāyakāḥ // GarP_2,16.41 //
GP12garup2_u:2786: dvādaśe māsi yacchrāddhaṃ tatra bhuṅkte suduḥ śitaḥ // GarP_2,16.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2787: kiñcinnyūne tato varṣe sārdhe caikādaśe 'tha vā /
GP12garup2_u:2788: yāti śītapuraṃ tatra śītaṃ yatrātiduḥ khadam // GarP_2,16.43 //
GP12garup2_u:2789: śītārtaḥ kṣudhitaḥ so 'tha vīkṣate hi diśo daśa /
GP12garup2_u:2790: tiṣṭhettu bāndhavaḥ ko 'pi yo me duḥkhaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,16.44 //
GP12garup2_u:2791: kiṅkarāstaṃ vadantyevaṃ kva te puṇyaṃ hi tādṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:2792: śrutvā teṣāṃ tu tadvākyaṃ hā daiva iti bhāṣate // GarP_2,16.45 //
GP12garup2_u:2793: daivaṃ hi pūrvasukṛtaṃ tanmayā naiva sañcitam /
GP12garup2_u:2794: evaṃ sañcintya bahuśo dhairyamālambate punaḥ // GarP_2,16.46 //
GP12garup2_u:2799: śubhāśubhaṃ tu yatkarma te vicārya punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2800: śravaṇā brahmaṇaḥ putrā manuṣyāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭitam /
GP12garup2_u:2801: kathayanti tadā loke pūjitāḥ pūjitāḥ svayam // GarP_2,16.49 //
GP12garup2_u:2802: naraistuṣṭaiśca puṣṭaiśca yatproktaṃ ca kṛtaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2803: sarvamāvedayanti sma citragupte yame ca tat // GarP_2,16.50 //
GP12garup2_u:2807: evaṃ teṣāṃ śaktirasti yartye martyādhikāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,16.52 //
GP12garup2_u:2809: jāyante tasya te saumyāḥ sukhamṛtyupradāyinaḥ // GarP_2,16.53 //
GP12garup2_u:2810: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretayātrādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2814: eko me saṃśayo deva hṛdaye samprabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:2815: śramaṇāḥ kasya putrāśca kathaṃ yamapure sthitāḥ // GarP_2,17.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2816: mānuṣaiśca kṛtaṃ karma kasmājjānanti te prabho /
GP12garup2_u:2817: kathaṃ śṛṇvanti te sarve kasmājjñānaṃ samāgatam // GarP_2,17.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2824: kṣīrodasāgare pūrvaṃ mayi supte jagatpatau // GarP_2,17.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2827: brahmaṇā nirmitaṃ pūrvaṃ viṣṇunā pālitaṃ tadā /
GP12garup2_u:2828: rudraḥ saṃhāramūrtiśca nirmito brahmaṇā tataḥ // GarP_2,17.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2833: yoyo hi nirmitaḥ pūrvaṃ tattatkarma samācaret /
GP12garup2_u:2838: saṃcintya brahmaṇo mantraṃ vibudhaiḥ preritastadā // GarP_2,17.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2841: yoyaṃ vadati lokesmiñchubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham /
GP12garup2_u:2842: prāpayanti tataḥ śīghraṃ brahmaṇaḥ karṇagocaram // GarP_2,17.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2844: sarve śṛṇvanti yatpakṣiṃstenaiva śravaṇā matāḥ // GarP_2,17.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2845: sthitvā caiva tathākāśe jantūnāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:2846: tajjñātvā dharmarājāgre mṛtyukāle vadanti ca // GarP_2,17.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2847: dharmaṃ cārthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca mokṣaṃ ca kathayanti te /
GP12garup2_u:2850: uttamā dhamamārgeṇa vainateya prayānti hi // GarP_2,17.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2854: pāṣāṇaiḥ kaṇṭakaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ pāśabaddho 'tha yāti vai // GarP_2,17.20 //
GP12garup2_u:2860: dvādaśaṃ sakalatraṃ ca mama prītyai prapūjayet // GarP_2,17.23 //
GP12garup2_u:2861: devaiḥ sarvaiśca saṃpūjya svargaṃ yānti sukhepsayā /
GP12garup2_u:2864: śravaṇānāṃ ca māhātmyamutpattiṃ ceṣṭitaṃ śubham // GarP_2,17.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2865: śṛṇoti pakṣiśārdūla sa ca pāpairna lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:2866: iha loke sukhaṃ bhuktvā svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,17.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2867: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretaklape śravaṇamahātmyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptadaso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2871: śravaṇānāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā kṣaṇaṃ dhyātvā punastataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2874: citraguptastataḥ sarvaṃ karma tasmai vadatyatha // GarP_2,18.2 //
GP12garup2_u:2875: vācaiva yatkṛtaṃ karma kṛtaṃ caiva tu kāyikam /
GP12garup2_u:2876: mānasaṃ ca tathā karma kṛtaṃ bhuṅkte śubhāśubham // GarP_2,18.3 //
GP12garup2_u:2878: viśrānti dāni sarvāṇi sthānāni kathitāni te // GarP_2,18.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2880: divā rātrau tamuddiśya sthāne dīpaprado bhavet // GarP_2,18.5 //
GP12garup2_u:2882: dīpte 'dhvani ca te yānti dīpo dattaśca yairnaraiḥ // GarP_2,18.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2883: kārtike ca caturdaśyāṃ dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:2889: tadahni dīyate sarvaṃ dvādaśāhe viśeṣataḥ // GarP_2,18.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2893: eka evāsti sarvatre vyavahāraḥ khagādhipa // GarP_2,18.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2897: mṛte yadbāndhavairdattaṃ tadāśritya sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,18.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2900: dīyate kasya deveśa tadvadasva yathātatham // GarP_2,18.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2903: āsanaṃ bhājanaṃ caiva padaṃ saptavidhaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,18.16 //
GP12garup2_u:2904: ātapastatra yo raudro dahyate yena mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2907: aśvārūḍhāśca gacchanti dadate ya upānahau // GarP_2,18.18 //
GP12garup2_u:2908: āsane svāgate (bhojane) caiva dattaṃ tasmai dvijāyate /
GP12garup2_u:2909: sukhena bhuṅkte sa pretaḥ pathi gacchañchanaiḥ śanaiḥ // GarP_2,18.19 //
GP12garup2_u:2921: mahiṣīratha (dugdha) dānācca sukhī bhavati niścitam // GarP_2,18.25 //
GP12garup2_u:2924: sa gacchati mahāmārge taddattaṃ kena gṛhyate // GarP_2,18.26 //
GP12garup2_u:2926: gṛhṇāti varuṇo dānaṃ mama haste prayacchati /
GP12garup2_u:2927: ahaṃ ca bhāskare deve bhāskarātso 'śnute sukham // GarP_2,18.27 //
GP12garup2_u:2929: sarve te narakaṃ yānti yāvatpāpasya saṃkṣayaḥ // GarP_2,18.28 //
GP12garup2_u:2933: teṣāṃ madhye śreṣṭhatamā ghorā yā ekaviṃśatiḥ // GarP_2,18.30 //
GP12garup2_u:2940: yeṣāṃ tu narake ghore bahvabdāni gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:2941: santātarnaiva vidyate dūtatvaṃ te tu (pretya) yānti hi // GarP_2,18.34 //
GP12garup2_u:2942: yamena preṣitāste vai mānuṣasya mṛtasya tu /
GP12garup2_u:2945: māsānte bhojanaṃ piṇḍameke yacchanti tatra vai // GarP_2,18.36 //
GP12garup2_u:2946: tṛptiṃ prayānti te sarve pratyahaṃ caiva vatsaram /
GP12garup2_u:2951: jāmadagnyasyeva rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tejaḥ prasarpati // GarP_2,18.39 //
GP12garup2_u:2956: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi /
GP12garup2_u:2957: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇānyanyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī // GarP_2,18.42 //
GP12garup2_u:2958: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍa saṃvāde vṛṣotsarganānādānaphalayamalokagamanakarmajadehaprāptinirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:2963: te dehaṃ sa samāsādya yamena saha gacchati // GarP_2,19.1 //
GP12garup2_u:2969: dattaṃ tenaiva tṛpyanti yamasya puracāriṇaḥ // GarP_2,19.4 //
GP12garup2_u:2970: gatvā ca tatra te sarve pratīhāraṃ vadanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:2973: tatra gatvā pratīhāro brūte tasya śubhāśubham // GarP_2,19.6 //
GP12garup2_u:2975: paśyanti ca durātmāno yamarūpaṃ subhīṣaṇam // GarP_2,19.7 //
GP12garup2_u:2976: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhayabhītastu hāheti vadate janaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2977: kṛtaṃ dānaṃ ca yairmartyaisteṣāṃ nāsti bhayaṃ kvacit // GarP_2,19.8 //
GP12garup2_u:2978: prāptaṃ sukṛtinaṃ dṛṣṭvā sthānācca lati sūryajaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2979: eṣa me maṇḍalaṃ bhittvā brahmalokaṃ prayāsyati // GarP_2,19.9 //
GP12garup2_u:2981: eṣa mārgo viśālo 'tra na kenāpya nugamyate /
GP12garup2_u:2982: dānapuṇyaṃ vinā vatsa na gaccheddharmamandiram // GarP_2,19.10 //
GP12garup2_u:2983: tasminmārge tu raudre vai bhīṣaṇā yamakiṅkarāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2986: gṛhṇanti māsamāsānte pādaśeṣaṃ tu tadbhavet // GarP_2,19.12 //
GP12garup2_u:2991: daivikīṃ paitṛkīṃ yoniṃ mānuṣīṃ vātha nārakīm // GarP_2,19.14 //
GP12garup2_u:2993: mānuṣyaṃ tattvataḥ prāpya sa puttraḥ puttratāṃ vrajet // GarP_2,19.15 //
GP12garup2_u:2994: yathāyathā kṛtaṃ karma tāntāṃ yoniṃ vrajennaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:2997: yadā bhavati mānuṣyaṃ tadā dharmaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,19.17 //
GP12garup2_u:2998: kṛmayo bhasma viṣṭhā vā dehānāṃ prakṛtiḥ sadā /
GP12garup2_u:2999: andhakūpe mahāraudre dīpahastaḥ pātettu vai // GarP_2,19.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3001: yastatprāpya careddharmaṃ sa gacchetparamāṃ gatim // GarP_2,19.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3002: api jānanvṛthā dharmaṃ duḥ khamāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,19.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3003: jātīśatena labhate kila mānuṣatvaṃ tatrāpi durlabhataraṃ khaga bho dvijatvam /
GP12garup2_u:3004: yastatra pālayati lālayati vratāni tasyāmṛtaṃ bhavati hastagataṃ prasādāt // GarP_2,19.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3005_0: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
GP12garup2_u:3009: ye kecitpretarūpeṇa kutra vāsaṃ labhanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3010: pretalokādvinirmuktāḥ kathaṃ kutra vrajanti te // GarP_2,20.1 //
