GP12garup2_u:3016: pakṣirāja śṛṇuṣva tvaṃ yatra pretāścaranti vai /
GP12garup2_u:3021: te vyavasyanti ca pretā vadhopāyaṃ ca bandhuṣu // GarP_2,20.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3024: svaṃ veśma punarāgatya mitrasthāne viśanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3031: pibanti te ca pānīyaṃ bhojanocchiṣṭayojitam // GarP_2,20.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3034: kathaṃ kurvanti te pretāḥ kena rūpeṇa kasya kim /
GP12garup2_u:3035: jñāyate kena vidhinā jalpanti na vadanti vā // GarP_2,20.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3036: enaṃ chindhi manomohaṃ mama cedicchasi priyam /
GP12garup2_u:3037: kalikāle hṛṣīkeśa pretatvaṃ jāyate bahu // GarP_2,20.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3040: jīvansa dṛśyate snehī mṛto duṣṭatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3042: satyavāk priyavādī ca na pretaiḥ sa hi pīḍyate // GarP_2,20.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3046: kṛtādau dvāparānte ca na preto naiva pīḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:3051: virodho bandhubhiḥ sārdhaṃ pretadoṣeṇa kāśyapa // GarP_2,20.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3057: syāddhantakalaho nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3061: paradravyāṇāṃ ca hartā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3063: loke kalahakārī ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3065: pretapīḍā tu sā jñeyā satyaṃsatyaṃ khageśvara // GarP_2,20.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3066: hīnajātyā ca sambandho hīnakarma karoti yaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3067: adharme ramate nityaṃ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3071: jāyā saṃpīḍhyate yacca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3073: abhāvo jāyate dharme sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3075: pratyakṣaṃ vā parokṣaṃ vā sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3078: strīṇāṃ garbhavināśaḥ syānna puṣpaṃ dṛśyate tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3079: bālānāṃ maraṇaṃ yatra sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3081: svayameva na kurvīta sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3082: tīrthe gattvā parāsaktaḥ svakṛtyaṃ ca parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:3083: dharmakārye na sampattiḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3085: paradrohe matiścaiva sā pīḍā pretasaṃbhavā // GarP_2,20.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3086: puṣpaṃ yatra na dṛśyena phalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3087: viraho bhāryayā yatra sā pīḍā pretasagbhavā // GarP_2,20.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3088: yeṣāṃ vai jāyate cihnaṃ sadoccāṭaparaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3089: svakṣetre niṣphalaṃ tejaḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.39 //
GP12garup2_u:3091: na prītirnāpi saukhyaṃ ca sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3092: pitṛvākyaṃ na kurute svapatnīṃ ca na sevate /
GP12garup2_u:3093: sadā krūramatirvyagraḥ sā pīḍā pretasambhavā // GarP_2,20.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3097: pretatvaṃ jāyate tārkṣya pīḍyante yena jantavaḥ // GarP_2,20.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3099: yo vai na manyate pretānmṛtaḥ pretatvamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,20.44 //
GP12garup2_u:3100: pretadoṣaḥ kule yasya sukhaṃ tasya na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3102: tṛtīye pañcame puṃsi vaṃśacchedo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3104: ye kecitpetarūpā vikṛtamukhadṛśo raudrarūpāḥ karālā manyante naiva gotraṃ sutaduhitṛpitṝn bhrātṛjāyāṃ vadhūṃ vā /
GP12garup2_u:3105: kṛtvā kāmyaṃ ca rūpaṃ sukhagatirahitā bhāṣamāṇā yatheṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭaṃ bhoktukāmā vidhivaśapatitāḥ saṃsmaranti svapākam // GarP_2,20.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3106: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretāvāsatadbādhāprakāranirūpaṇaṃ nāma viṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3111: yanmuktau ca manuṣyāṇāṃ na pīḍā jāyate punaḥ // GarP_2,21.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3113: teṣāṃ kadā bhavenmuktiḥ pretatvaṃ na kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,21.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3114: pretatve hi pramāṇaṃ ca kati varṣāṇi saṃkhyayā /
GP12garup2_u:3117: muktiṃ prāyanti te pretāstadahaṃ kathayāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3118: yadaiva manujo 'vaiti mama pīḍā kṛtā tviyam // GarP_2,21.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3120: svapne dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vṛkṣaḥ phalitaścūtacampakaḥ // GarP_2,21.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3121: vipro vā vṛṣabho devo bhramate tīrthago yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3122: evaṃ dṛṣṭo yadā svapno mṛtaḥ ko 'pisvagotrajaḥ // GarP_2,21.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3126: dharmāpāyaṃ prakurute pretapīḍā tadā vrajet // GarP_2,21.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3127: tadā tatra vināśāya cittabhaṅgaṃ karoti sā /
GP12garup2_u:3129: aśreyasi pravṛtti ca prerayanti punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3130: uccāṭanaṃ ca krūratvaṃ sarvaṃ pretakṛtaṃ khaga // GarP_2,21.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3132: tasya karmaphalaṃ sādhu pretavṛttiśca śāśvatī // GarP_2,21.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3133: sa bhavettena muktastu dattaṃ śreyaskaraṃ param /
GP12garup2_u:3134: svayaṃ tṛpyati bhoḥ pakṣinyasyoddeśena dīyate // GarP_2,21.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3135: śṛṇu satyamidaṃ tārkṣya yaddadāti bhunakti saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3136: ātmānaṃ śreyasā yuñjyātpretastṛptiṃ ciraṃ vrajet // GarP_2,21.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3138: ajñātayastu ye duṣṭāḥ pīḍayanti svavaṃśajān // GarP_2,21.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3141: sadā bandhuṣu yacchanti vṛddhimṛddhiṃ khagādhipa // GarP_2,21.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3143: na prāpayati mūḍhātmā pretaśāpaiḥ sa lipyate // GarP_2,21.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3146: evaṃ bruvanti te pretāḥ punaryābhyaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3149: nāma gotraṃ na dṛśyeta pratītirnaiva jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3151: na svapnaścaiṣṭitaṃ naiva darśanaṃ na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3152: kiṃ kartavyaṃ suraśreṣṭha tatra me brūhi niścitam // GarP_2,21.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3157: kṛtvā kṛṣṇabaliṃ caiva puraścaraṇa pūrvakam // GarP_2,21.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3159: kṛtena tena vighnāni vinaśyanti khageśvara // GarP_2,21.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3162: vimuktaḥ sarvapīḍābhya iti satyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,21.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3165: navame daśame varṣe pikṣuddeśena vai pumān /
GP12garup2_u:3166: gāyattrīmayutaṃ japtvā daśāṃśena ca homayet // GarP_2,21.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3173: anyā yā devatā loke na dehaprabhavo hi tāḥ // GarP_2,21.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3175: deho datto hi yenaivaṃ ko 'nyaḥ pūjyatamastataḥ // GarP_2,21.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3177: tatsarvamātmanā bhuṅkte dānaṃ vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,21.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3179: tasmātputtra iti prokta iha cāpi paratra ca // GarP_2,21.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3183: yaḥ paṭhecchṛṇuyādvāpi pretacihnaṃ na paśyati // GarP_2,21.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3184: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakādṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde svapnādhyāyo nāmaikaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3188: sambhavanti kathaṃ pretāḥ kena teṣāṃ gatirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3189: kīdṛkteṣāṃ bhavedrūpaṃ bhojanaṃ kiṃ bhavetprabho // GarP_2,22.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3190: suprītāste kathaṃ pretāḥ kva tiṣṭhanti sureśvara /
GP12garup2_u:3191: prasannaḥ kṛpayā deva praśramenaṃ vadasva me // GarP_2,22.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3194: jāyante te mṛtāḥ pretāstāñchṛṇuṣva vadāmyaham // GarP_2,22.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3196: prapāṃ sadma suvṛkṣāṃśca tathā bhojanaśālikāḥ // GarP_2,22.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3200: karṣayanti ca ye lobhātpretāste vai bhavanti hi // GarP_2,22.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3210: rajasvalādidoṣaiśca na ca bhūmau matāśca ye // GarP_2,22.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3212: sūtakaiḥ śvādisaṃparkaiḥ pretabhāvā iha kṣitau // GarP_2,22.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3214: te sarve pretayonisthā vicaranti marusthale // GarP_2,22.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3215: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3216: adṛṣṭadoṣāṃ tyajati sa preto jāyatedhruvam // GarP_2,22.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3220: viśvāsaghātī krūrastu sa preto jāyate dhruvam // GarP_2,22.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3228: kena vā mucyate kasmāttanme brūhi pitāmaha /
GP12garup2_u:3229: yacchrutvā na punarmohamevaṃ yāsyā mi suvrata // GarP_2,22.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3231: yenaiva jāyate preto yenaiva sa vimucyate /
GP12garup2_u:3232: prāpnoti narakaṃ ghoraṃ dustaraṃ daivatairapi // GarP_2,22.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3235: śrūyate hi purā vatsa brāhmaṇaḥ śaṃsitavrataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3236: nāmnā santaptakaḥ khyāta stapor'the vanamāśritaḥ // GarP_2,22.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3238: yajansa sakalānyajñānyuktyā kālaṃ ca vikṣipan // GarP_2,22.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3245: bahūnyabdāni vijane vane tasya gatāni vai /
GP12garup2_u:3246: tasya buddhistato jātā tīrthānugamanaṃ prati // GarP_2,22.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3251: dadarśādhvani gacchansa pañca pretān sudāruṇān // GarP_2,22.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3256: papraccha madhurābhāṣī ke yūyaṃ vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3257: kiñcāśubhaṃ kṛtaṃ karma yena prāptāḥ stha vaikṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:3258: kathaṃ vā caikataḥ karma prasthitāḥ kutra niścitam // GarP_2,22.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3260: svaiḥ svaistu karmabhiḥ prāptaṃ pretatvaṃ hi dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3263: hatavākyā hataśrīkā hata saṃjñā vicetasaḥ // GarP_2,22.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3264: na jānīmo diśaṃ tāta vidiśaṃ cātiduḥ khitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3265: kva nu gacchāmahe mūḍhāḥ piśācāḥ karmajā vayam // GarP_2,22.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3266: na mātā na pitāsmākaṃ pretatvaṃ karmabhiḥ svakaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3267: prāptāḥ sma sahasā jātaduḥ khodvegasamākulam // GarP_2,22.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3271: śīghrago rogha (ha) kaścaiva pañcamo lekhakaḥ smatṛtaḥ // GarP_2,22.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3272: evaṃ nāmnā ca sarve vai saṃprāptāḥ pretatāṃ vayam /
GP12garup2_u:3277: mayā svādu sadā bhuktaṃ dattaṃ paryuṣitaṃ dvija // GarP_2,22.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3278: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3280: śīghraṃ gacchati vipreṇa yācitaḥ kṣudhitena vai /
GP12garup2_u:3287: tena karmavipākena lekhako nāma cocyate // GarP_2,22.45 //
GP12garup2_u:3288: pretatvaṃ karmabhāvena prāptaṃ nāmāni ca dvija /
GP12garup2_u:3289: meṣānano lekhako 'yaṃ rodha (ha) kaḥ parvatānanaḥ // GarP_2,22.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3293: sarve ca vikṛtākārā lamboṣṭhā vikṛtānanāḥ // GarP_2,22.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3295: etatte sarvamākhyātaṃ pretatve kāraṇaṃ mayā // GarP_2,22.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3296: jñānino 'pi vayaṃ sarve jātāḥ sma tava darśanāt /
GP12garup2_u:3297: yatra te śravaṇe śraddhā tatpṛccha kathayāmi te // GarP_2,22.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3302: yadi te śravaṇe śraddhā āhārāṇāṃ dvijottama /
GP12garup2_u:3303: asmākaṃ tu mahībhāga śṛṇutvaṃ susamāhitaḥ // GarP_2,22.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3309: yacchrutvā garhase brahman bhūyobhūyaśca garhitam // GarP_2,22.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3311: ucchiṣṭaiścaiva cānyaiśca pretānāṃ bhojanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,22.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3313: malināni prasūtāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.56 //
GP12garup2_u:3314: nāsti satyaṃ gṛhe yatra na śaucaṃ na ca saṃyamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3315: patitairdasyubhiḥ saṅgaḥ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3317: svādhyāya vratahīnāni pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3318: na lajjā na ca maryādā yadātra strījito gṛhī /
GP12garup2_u:3319: guravo yatra pūjyā na pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3320: yatra lobhastathā krodho nidrā śoko bhayaṃ madaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3321: ālasyaṃ kalaho nityaṃ pretā bhuñjanti tatra vai // GarP_2,22.60 //
GP12garup2_u:3322: bhartṛhīnā ca yā nārī paravīryaṃ niṣevate /
GP12garup2_u:3323: bījaṃ mūtrasamāyurkta pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.61 //
GP12garup2_u:3324: lajjā me jāyate tāta vadato bhojanaṃ svakam /
GP12garup2_u:3325: yatstrīrajo yonigataṃ pretā bhuñjanti tattu vai // GarP_2,22.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3327: yathā na bhavitā pretastanme vada tapodhana /
GP12garup2_u:3328: nityaṃ mṛtyurvaraṃ jantoḥ pretatvaṃ mā bhavetkvacit // GarP_2,22.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3331: vrataiśca vividhaiḥ pūto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3333: aparaiḥ sukṛtaiḥ pūto na preto na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3337: vidyādo 'bhayadaścaiva na preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3338: śūdrānnena tu bhuktena jaṭharasthena yo mṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3339: durmṛtyunā mṛto yaśca sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.68 //
GP12garup2_u:3341: kārubhiśca rato nityaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.69 //
GP12garup2_u:3343: ajñānādbhakṣayanmāṃsaṃ sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.70 //
GP12garup2_u:3344: devadravyaṃ ca brahmasvaṃ gurudravyaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3345: kanyāṃ dadāti śulkena sa preto jāyate naraḥ // GarP_2,22.71 //
GP12garup2_u:3346: mātaraṃ bhaginīṃ bhāryāṃ snuṣāṃ duhitaraṃ tathāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3352: hartā hemnaśca bhūmeśca sa predṛ // GarP_2,22.74 //
GP12garup2_u:3354: evaṃ bruvati vai vipre ākāśe dundubhisvanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3357: svargaṃ gatā vimānaiste divyaiḥ saṃpṛcchya taṃ munim // GarP_2,22.76 //
GP12garup2_u:3363: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe bhīṣma yudhiṣṭhirasaṃvāde pretatvotpattitanmuktipeñcapretopākhyāna nirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3368: vadanti vā kadācitkiṃ tadvadasva sureśvara // GarP_2,23.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3370: teṣāṃ svarūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cihnaṃ svapnaṃ yathātatham /
GP12garup2_u:3373: tatra yacchanti liṅgāni darśayanti khageśvara // GarP_2,23.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3375: hayo gajo vṛṣo martyodṛśyate vikṛtānanaḥ // GarP_2,23.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3376: śayānaṃ viparītaṃ tu ātmānaṃ ca viparyayam /
GP12garup2_u:3378: svapne narau hi nigaḍairbadhyate bahudhā yadi /
GP12garup2_u:3379: annaṃ ca yācate svapne kuveṣaḥ pūrvajo mṛtaḥ // GarP_2,23.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3381: ātmanastu paro vāpi tṛṣārtastu jalaṃ pibet // GarP_2,23.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3383: utpatya gaganaṃ yāti tīrthe yāti kṣudhāturaḥ // GarP_2,23.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3385: liṅge gaje tathā deve bhūte prete niśācare // GarP_2,23.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3387: svakalatraṃ svabandhuṃ vā svasutaṃ svapatiṃ vibhum /
GP12garup2_u:3389: yācate yaḥ paraṃ svapne kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ ca pariplutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3392: pitā bhrātā kalatraṃ ca pretadoṣaistu paśyati // GarP_2,23.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3394: kṛtvā snānaṃ gṛhe tīrthe śrīvṛkṣe tarpaṇaṃ jalaiḥ // GarP_2,23.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3398: paṭhate śṛṇute vāpi pretacihnaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,23.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3399: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakṛtitaduktitaccihnatadvimuktyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3404: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyopi vā // GarP_2,24.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3406: vedairuktaṃ tu yadvākyaṃ śataṃ jīvati mānuṣe // GarP_2,24.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3407: jīvanti mānuṣe loke sarve varṇā dvijātayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3409: na dṛśyate kalau tacca kasmāddeva samādiśa /
GP12garup2_u:3413: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3416: kasmānmṛtyumavāpnoti rājā vā śrotriyo 'pi vā // GarP_2,24.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3418: sādhusādhu mahāprājña yastvaṃ bhakto 'si me priyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3421: tato vakṣyāmi pakṣīndra kāśyapeya mahādyute // GarP_2,24.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3423: vikarmaṇaḥ prabhāveṇa śīghraṃ cāpi vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3433: prāpayanti vaśaṃ mṛtyostato yāti ca yātanām /
GP12garup2_u:3434: svakarmāṇi parityajya mukhyavṛttāni yāni ca // GarP_2,24.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3438: snānaṃ dānaṃ japo homo svādhyāyo davartāccanam // GarP_2,24.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3439: yasmindine na sevyante sa vṛthā divaso nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:3442: yatprātaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ sāyaṃ nūnamannaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,24.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3444: gataṃ jñātvā tu pakṣīndra vapurardhaṃ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,24.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3450: anekabhavasambhūtaṃ pātakaṃ tu tridhā kṛtam // GarP_2,24.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3451: yadā prāpnoti mānuṣyaṃ tadā sarvaṃ tapatyapi /
GP12garup2_u:3458: na jānātiḥ khagaśreṣṭha bālabhāvaṃ samāśritaḥ // GarP_2,24.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3459: yauvane timirāndhaśca yaḥ paśyati sa muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:3460: ādhānānmṛtyumāpnoti bālo vā sthaviro yuvā // GarP_2,24.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3463: taporato yogaśīlo mahājñānī ca yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3465: vinā mānupadehaṃ tu sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,24.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3469: yoniṃ pūrayate yasmānmṛto 'pyāyāti yāti ca // GarP_2,24.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3472: iti kṛṣṇavacaḥ śrutvā garuḍo vākyamabravīt // GarP_2,24.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3476: kathaṃ kiṃ kena dātavyaṃ mṛtānte ko vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3479: yadi garbho vipadyate stravate vāpi yoṣitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3482: tato jāte vipanne tu ā cūḍākaraṇācchiśoḥ // GarP_2,24.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3483: dugdhaṃ bhojyaṃ tāśakti bālānāṃ ca pradīyate /
GP12garup2_u:3484: ā cūḍātpañcavarṣe tu dehadāho vidhīyate // GarP_2,24.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3485: dugdhaṃ tasya pradeyaṃ syādbālānāṃ bhojanaṃ śubham /
GP12garup2_u:3488: dātavyaṃ tu khagaśreṣṭha ṛṇasambandhakastu saḥ // GarP_2,24.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3489: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyurdhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3494: purāṇe gīyate gāthā sarvathā pratibhāti me // GarP_2,24.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3495: miṣṭānnaṃ bhojanaṃ deyaṃ dāne śaktistu durlabhā /
GP12garup2_u:3501: pāpaprabhāvānnarakaṃ prayāti punardaridraḥ punareva pāpī // GarP_2,24.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3502: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'lpāyurmaraṇahe tubālāntyeṣṭyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma caturviśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3507: jīvanvāpi mṛto vāpi pañcavarṣādhiko 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3508: pūrṇe tu pañcame varṣe pumāṃścaiva pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3512: garbhe naṣṭe kriyā nāsti dugdhaṃ deyaṃ mṛte śiśau /
GP12garup2_u:3513: paraṃ ca pāyasaṃ kṣīraṃ dadyādvalavipattitaḥ // GarP_2,25.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3517: bāle vā taruṇe vṛddhe ghaṭo bhavati vai mṛte // GarP_2,25.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3519: tataḥ paraṃ khagaśreṣṭha dehadāho vidhoyate // GarP_2,25.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3525: ā pañca varṣātkaumāraḥ paugaṇḍo navahāṃyanaḥ // GarP_2,25.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3527: mṛto 'pi pañcame varṣe avṛtaḥ savṛto 'pi vā // GarP_2,25.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3533: brahmabījodbhavāḥ putrā devarṣoṇāṃ ca vallabhāḥ // GarP_2,25.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3535: bālo vṛddho yubā vāpi ghaṭamicchanti dehinaḥ // GarP_2,25.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3536: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ sadā vetti dehī vai sarvagastviha /
GP12garup2_u:3539: tasmāddeyāni dānāni mṛte bāle suniścitam // GarP_2,25.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3543: dvādaśe hani samprāpte kuryācchrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,25.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3545: udakumbhapradānaṃ ca pada (upa) dānāni yāni ca // GarP_2,25.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3549: yadā nakriyate sarvaṃ mudgalatvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,25.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3550: vratātprāṅgeva deyaṃ tu tataḥ pitṛgaṇasya ca /
GP12garup2_u:3553: apasavyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ kṛte yānti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,25.24 //
GP12garup2_u:3557: ghaṭādiṣu pṛthak sarvaṃ paśya rūpaṃ ca tatsamam // GarP_2,25.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3559: yā yasya prakṛtiḥ pūrvaṃ śukraśoṇitasaṅgame // GarP_2,25.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3563: sadṛśaḥ ko 'pi loke 'sminna bhūto na bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,25.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3564: andhādandho na bhavati mūkānmūko na jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:3566: anurūpā na dṛśyante madīyaṃ vacanaṃ śṛṇu // GarP_2,25.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3569: saṃgṛhītaḥ suto yastu dāsīputtraśca tena kim // GarP_2,25.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3571: bhavenna duhitā yasya na dauhitro na vā sutaḥ // GarP_2,25.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3572: śrāddhaṃ tasya kathaṃ kāryaṃ vidhinā kena tadbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3574: mukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu putrasya mucyate paitṛkādṛṇāt // GarP_2,25.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3576: lokānantyaṃ divaḥ prāptiḥ puttrapauttra prapauttrakaiḥ // GarP_2,25.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3579: kurvantyanye sutāḥ śrāddhame koddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam /
GP12garup2_u:3581: śrāddhaṃ sāṃvatsaraṃ kurvañjāyate narakāya vai // GarP_2,25.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3583: saṃgṛhītaḥ sutaḥ kuryādekoddiṣṭaṃ na pārvaṇam // GarP_2,25.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3584: pratyabdaṃ pitṛmātṛbhyāṃ śrāddhaṃ dattvā na lipyate /
GP12garup2_u:3585: ekoddiṣṭaṃ parityajya pārvaṇaṃ kurute yadi // GarP_2,25.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3589: saṃgṛhītasuto bhūtvā pākaṃ vā yaḥ prayacchati // GarP_2,25.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3594: yastu pravrajitājjāto brāhmaṇyāṃ śūdrataśca yaḥ // GarP_2,25.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3597: taiḥ suvṛttaiḥ sukhaṃ prāpyaṃ kuvṛttairnarakaṃ vrajet /
GP12garup2_u:3601: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dhamakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasavāde mṛtabālāntyeṣṭibhinnābhinnasutakṛtāntyeṣṭyorvarṇanaṃ nāma pañcaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3605: satyaṃ brūhi suraśreṣṭha kṛpāṃ kṛtvā mayi prabho /
GP12garup2_u:3606: mṛtānāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ kadā kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3607: sapiṇḍatve kuto yānti asapiṇḍe kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3612: agnyārohe kathaṃ śrāddhaṃ vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,26.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3614: kathayasva prasādena hītāya jagatāṃ prabho // GarP_2,26.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3618: sapiṇḍane tato vṛtte pitṛlokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:3623: sahapiṇḍe kṛte pretastato yāti parāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3624: tannāma samparityajya tataḥ pitṛgaṇo bhavet // GarP_2,26.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3627: vivāhaṃ naiva kurvīta mṛte ca gṛhamedhini /
GP12garup2_u:3633: niragnikaḥ sāgniko vā dvādaśāhe sapiṇḍayet // GarP_2,26.14 //
GP12garup2_u:3634: dvādaśāhe tripakṣe vā ṣaṇmāse vatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3643: etaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiḥ śrāddhaiḥ preto muktastu jāyate // GarP_2,26.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3645: yāvajjīva ca sadbhatryā na kuryātsahapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,26.20 //
GP12garup2_u:3648: āsurādivivā heṣu yā vyūḍhā kanyakā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3651: puttrābhāve tu patnī syātpatnyabhāve sahodaraḥ // GarP_2,26.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3652: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputtro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:3655: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ putrahīne nare khaga // GarP_2,26.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3657: sarvete tena putreṇa putriṇo manurabravīt // GarP_2,26.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3665: ye sapiṇḍīkṛtāḥ pretāsteṣāṃ na syātpṛthak kriyā // GarP_2,26.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3666: sapiṇḍane kṛte vatsa pṛthaktvaṃ tu vigarhitam /
GP12garup2_u:3667: yastu kuryātpṛthak piṇḍaṃ pitṛhā so 'bhijāyate // GarP_2,26.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3669: pṛthak piṇḍe kṛte paścātpunaḥ kuryātsapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,26.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3671: ātmānaṃ ca tathā pretaṃ sa nayeddamaśāsanam // GarP_2,26.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3673: ghaṭādi bhojanaṃ nityaṃ padadānāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:3674: sapiṇḍīkaraṇe vṛtte ekasyaiva tu dāpayet // GarP_2,26.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3678: divyadeho vimānasthaḥ sukhaṃ yāti yamālayam // GarP_2,26.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3679: jīvamāne ca pitari na hi puttre sapiṇḍatā /
GP12garup2_u:3680: strīṇāṃ sapiṇḍanaṃ nāsti tathā bhartari jīvati // GarP_2,26.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3682: tasyā bhartṛdine kāryaṃ vṛṣotsargādikaṃ ca yat // GarP_2,26.38 //
GP12garup2_u:3686: putreṇaiva pṛthak śrāddhaṃ kṣayākhye tasya vāsare // GarP_2,26.40 //
GP12garup2_u:3688: pṛthak śrāddhāni kurvīta sāpiḍyaṃ patinā saha // GarP_2,26.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3689: pṛthakpṛthak ca piṇḍena dampatī patinā saha /
GP12garup2_u:3690: na lipyate mahādoṣairetatsatyaṃ vaco mama // GarP_2,26.42 //
GP12garup2_u:3696: ekagotre mṛtānāṃ tu striyā vā puruṣasya vā /
GP12garup2_u:3700: ekenaiva tu pākena śrāddhāni kurute sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3702: tīrthe cāparapakṣe vā candrasūryagrahe 'pi vā // GarP_2,26.47 //
GP12garup2_u:3704: agnirdahati gātrāṇi ātmānaṃ naiva pīḍayet // GarP_2,26.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3705: dahyate dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malam /
GP12garup2_u:3706: tathā nārī daheddehaṃ hutāśe hyamṛtopame // GarP_2,26.49 //
GP12garup2_u:3708: taptatailena lohena vahninā naiva dahyate // GarP_2,26.50 //
GP12garup2_u:3709: tathā sā patisaṃyuktā dahyate na kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:3712: bhartṛlokaṃ na sā yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,26.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3714: mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajya sā ciraṃ sukhamedhate // GarP_2,26.53 //
GP12garup2_u:3716: tāvatkālaṃ vasetsvarge nakṣatraiḥ saha sarvadā // GarP_2,26.54 //
GP12garup2_u:3717: tadante carate loke kule bhavati bhoginām /
GP12garup2_u:3718: sā hi labdhamahāprītirbhartrā saha pativratā // GarP_2,26.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3719: evaṃ na kurute nārī dharmoḍhā patisaṃgamam /
GP12garup2_u:3721: valgulī gṛhasodhā vā godhā vā dvimukhī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3724: manasā karmaṇā vācā mṛtaṃ jīvantameva vā // GarP_2,26.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3725: jīvamāne mṛte vāpi kilbiṣaṃ kurute tu yā /
GP12garup2_u:3726: sa ca vaidhavyamāpnoti janmajanmani durbhagā // GarP_2,26.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3729: evaṃ kṛte khagaśreṣṭha pitṛloke ciraṃ vaset /
GP12garup2_u:3732: pativratā yathā nārī bhartṛduḥkhaṃ na vindati // GarP_2,26.62 //
GP12garup2_u:3736: punaḥ kuryātsadā nityaṃ ghaṭānnaṃ pratimāsikam // GarP_2,26.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3738: yaḥ karoti naraḥ kaścitkṛt pūrvaṃ vinaśyati // GarP_2,26.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3740: pratimāsaṃ ghaṭā deyā sodanā jalapūritāḥ // GarP_2,26.66 //
GP12garup2_u:3741: arvākca vṛddheḥ karaṇācca tārkṣya sapiṇḍanaṃ yaḥ kurute hi putraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3742: tathāpi māsaṃ pratipiṇḍamekamannaṃ ca kumbhaṃ sajalaṃ ca dadyāt // GarP_2,26.67 //
GP12garup2_u:3743: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍedvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pretakalpe sapiṇḍananirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3747: kathaṃ pretā vasantyatra kīdṛgrūpā bhavanti te /
GP12garup2_u:3750: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena ca śubhe na ca /
GP12garup2_u:3751: tanme kathaya deveśa mama cedicchasi priyam // GarP_2,27.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3753: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tārkṣya mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3756: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābāho tena te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,27.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3766: vanamadhye tadā rājā mṛgaṃ dūrādapaśyata // GarP_2,27.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3767: tena viddho mṛgo 'tīva bāṇena sudṛḍhena ca /
GP12garup2_u:3768: bāṇamādāya taṃ tasya sa vane 'darśanaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3780: utkacaṃ malinaṃ kubjaṃ (rūkṣaṃ) nirmāṃsaṃ bhīmadarśanam // GarP_2,27.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3783: taṃ dṛṣṭvā vikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ vismito babhruvāhanaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3784: preto 'pi dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ghorāmaṭavīmāgataṃ nṛpam // GarP_2,27.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3786: abravītsa tadā tārkṣya pretarājo nṛpaṃ vacaḥ // GarP_2,27.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3787: pretabhāvo mayā tyaktaḥ prāpto 'smi paramāṃ gatim /
GP12garup2_u:3791: kathayasva mama prītyā yathaivaṃ cāsi tattvataḥ // GarP_2,27.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3792: tathā pṛṣṭaḥ sa vai rājñā provāca sakalaṃ svakam // GarP_2,27.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3795: pretatve kāraṇaṃ śrutvā dayāṃ kartuṃ mamārhasi // GarP_2,27.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3800: vaiśyo jātyā sudevo 'haṃ nāmnā viditamastu te // GarP_2,27.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3806: yathā me niṣphalaṃ jātaṃ sukṛtaṃ tadvadāmi te // GarP_2,27.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3807: na me 'sti santatistāta na suhṛnna ca bāndhavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3808: na ca mitraṃ hi me tādṛgyaḥ kuryādaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,27.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3809: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tena mama jātaṃ nṛpottama /
GP12garup2_u:3811: pratimāsyāni cānyāni evaṃ śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,27.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3813: pretatvaṃ susthiraṃ tasya dattaiḥ śrāddhaśatairapi // GarP_2,27.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3815: varṇānāṃ cāpi sarveṣāṃ rājā bandhurihocyate // GarP_2,27.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3816: tanmāṃ tāraya rājendra maṇiratnaṃ dadāmi te /
GP12garup2_u:3818: tathā kāryaṃ mahābāho kṛpā yadi mayīṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:3822: piśācāśca bhavantīha karmabhiḥ kaiśca tadvada // GarP_2,27.35 //
GP12garup2_u:3825: ye haranti nṛpaśreṣṭha pretayoniṃ vrajanti te // GarP_2,27.36 //
GP12garup2_u:3826: tāpasīṃ ca sagotrāṃ ca agamyāṃ ye bhajanti hi /
GP12garup2_u:3827: bhavanti te mahāpretā ambujāni haranti ye // GarP_2,27.37 //
GP12garup2_u:3836: kathaṃ muktā bhavantīha pretatvāttvaṃ ca te 'pi ca /
GP12garup2_u:3838: vidhinā kena tatkāryaṃ sarvametadvadasva me // GarP_2,27.41 //
GP12garup2_u:3843: ato vakṣyāmi te viṣṇupūjāṃ pretatvanāśinīm // GarP_2,27.43 //
GP12garup2_u:3848: pūrve tu śrīdharaṃ devaṃ dakṣiṇe madhusūdanam /
GP12garup2_u:3849: paścime vānamaṃ devamuttare ca gadādharam // GarP_2,27.46 //
GP12garup2_u:3850: madhye pitāmahaṃ pūjya tathā devaṃ maheśvaram /
GP12garup2_u:3853: ghṛtena dadhnā kṣīreṇa viśvāndevāṃstathā nṛpa // GarP_2,27.48 //
GP12garup2_u:3860: sānnāśca sodakā deyā ghaṭāḥ pretahitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3861: śayyādānamatho dattvā ghaṭaṃ pretasya nirvapet // GarP_2,27.52 //
GP12garup2_u:3868: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ mahārāja kathayāmi nibodha te /
GP12garup2_u:3869: pretatvaṃ na bhavedyena dānena sudṛḍhena ca // GarP_2,27.55 //
GP12garup2_u:3872: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ tu ghaṭaṃ vidhāya brahmośakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3873: kṣīrājyapūrṇavivaraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,27.57 //
GP12garup2_u:3874: brahmā madhye tathā viṣṇuḥ śaṅkaraḥ śaṅkaro 'vyayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3875: prācyādiṣu ca tatkaṇṭhe lokapālānkrameṇa tu // GarP_2,27.58 //
GP12garup2_u:3877: tato dugdhājyasahitaṃ ghaṭaṃ deyaṃ hiraṇmayam // GarP_2,27.59 //
GP12garup2_u:3883: tato bale samāyāte dattvā rājñe mahāmaṇim /
GP12garup2_u:3886: svapuraṃ sa samāsādya sarvaṃ tatpretabhāṣitam // GarP_2,27.63 //
GP12garup2_u:3888: tasya puṇyapradānena preto mukto divaṃ yayau // GarP_2,27.64 //
GP12garup2_u:3890: kiṃ punaḥ putradattena pitā yātīti cātbhutam // GarP_2,27.65 //
GP12garup2_u:3893: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde babhruvāhanapretasaṃvāde pretatvahetutannivṛttyupāyanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3898: pretatvānmucyate yena dānena sukṛtena vā // GarP_2,28.1 //
GP12garup2_u:3901: santaptahāṭakamayaṃ ghaṭakaṃ vidhāya brahmeśakeśavayutaṃ saha lokapālaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3902: kṣīrājyapūrṇaviviraṃ praṇipatya bhaktyā viprāya dehi tava dānaśataiḥ kimanyaiḥ // GarP_2,28.2 //
GP12garup2_u:3906: saṃsāre sādhu me nātha brūhi kṛtyaṃ janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:3907: yathā kāryā naraiḥ samyak kriyā caivaurdhvadaihikī // GarP_2,28.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3909: kambhavanti suraśreṣṭha karmabhiḥ kaiḥ śubhāśubhaiḥ // GarP_2,28.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3911: tanme kathaya deveśa ahamicchāmi veditum // GarP_2,28.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3913: adhastācca tilā darbhāḥ pādau yāmyāṃ vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,28.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3915: kimarthaṃ smaryate viṣṇuḥ viṣṇusūktañca paṭhyate // GarP_2,28.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3920: tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:3921: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāvo dīyate kena he tunā // GarP_2,28.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3922: kathaṃ ca mriyate janturmṛtasya ca kuto gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3923: ativāhaśarīraṃ ca kathaṃ viśramate tadā // GarP_2,28.12 //
GP12garup2_u:3924: śaṃva skandhe vahetputro vahnidātā ca pautrakaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3925: kimarthaṃ deva deveśa ājyenābhyañjanaṃ kutaḥ // GarP_2,28.13 //
GP12garup2_u:3929: vastraṃ naraśca nārī ca vidadhyādadharottaram // GarP_2,28.15 //
GP12garup2_u:3931: navakāni ca piṇḍāni kimarthaṃ vitaretsutaḥ // GarP_2,28.16 //
GP12garup2_u:3932: kimarthaṃ catvare dugdhaṃ pātre pakve ca mṛnmaye /
GP12garup2_u:3933: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇe baddhvā kṛtvā rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,28.17 //
GP12garup2_u:3935: dāhodakaṃ kimarthaṃ ca saṃvādaḥ svajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.18 //
GP12garup2_u:3938: idaṃ ca kriyate deva kasmātpiṇḍaṃ pradāpayet // GarP_2,28.19 //
GP12garup2_u:3941: dvitīye 'hni kutaḥ snānaṃ caturthe sāgnike dvije /
GP12garup2_u:3942: daśame kiṃ malasnānaṃ kāryaṃ sarvajanaiḥ saha // GarP_2,28.21 //
GP12garup2_u:3944: taiḥ samudvartanaṃ cāpi dadyuḥ sthalajalāśraye // GarP_2,28.22 //
GP12garup2_u:3946: piṇḍaṃ caikādaśe kasmād vṛṣotsargaḥ kathaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,28.23 //
GP12garup2_u:3950: prāpte kāle ca mriyate anityo mānavaḥ prabho // GarP_2,28.25 //
GP12garup2_u:3951: chidraṃ tu naiva paśyāmi kuto jīvaḥ sa nirgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3952: kuto gacchanti bhūtāni pṛthivyāpo manastathā // GarP_2,28.26 //
GP12garup2_u:3953: tejo vadasva me nātha vāyurākāśameva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3954: vāyavaścaiva pañcaite kathaṃ gacchanti cāptaye // GarP_2,28.27 //
GP12garup2_u:3956: tṛṣṇā kāmo 'pyahaṅkāraḥ kuto yānti janārdana // GarP_2,28.28 //
GP12garup2_u:3958: naṣṭe dehe kuto yānti dānāni vividhāni ca // GarP_2,28.29 //
GP12garup2_u:3959: sapiṇḍanaṃ kimarthaṃ ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:3960: pretasya melanaṃ sārdhaṃ kaiḥ samaṃ tatra ko vidhiḥ // GarP_2,28.30 //
GP12garup2_u:3961: ye dagdhā ye tvadagdhāśca patitā ye narābhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3962: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni teṣāmante bhavecca kim // GarP_2,28.31 //
GP12garup2_u:3963: pāpino ye durācārā mudgalatvaṃ ca ye gatāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:3964: ātmaghātī brahmahā ca steyī viśvāsaghātakaḥ // GarP_2,28.32 //
GP12garup2_u:3966: dhārayedvā brahmasūtraṃ kā gatistasya mādhava // GarP_2,28.33 //
GP12garup2_u:3967: viprasya brāhmaṇī bhāryā saṃgṛhī tā yadā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3969: sarvametanmayā pṛṣṭo vada lokahitāya vai // GarP_2,28.34 //
GP12garup2_u:3970: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadahikakarmakālakriyamāṇanānādānādiphalapraśranirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:3974: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā bhadra mānuṣāṇāṃ hitāya vai /
GP12garup2_u:3979: bhaktastvaṃ hi mahābhāga sarvaṃ te kathayāmyaham // GarP_2,29.3 //
GP12garup2_u:3980: aputrasya gatirnāsti svargo naiva ca naiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3981: yena kenāpyupāyena kāryaṃ janma sutasya ca // GarP_2,29.4 //
GP12garup2_u:3983: dāhaḥ putreṇa kartavyo deyaḥ pautreṇa pāvakaḥ // GarP_2,29.5 //
GP12garup2_u:3984: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:3985: pañcaratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,29.6 //
GP12garup2_u:3987: tasyāmevāturo muktaḥ sarvaṃ dahati pātakam // GarP_2,29.7 //
GP12garup2_u:3989: darbhāṃstatra hi ye bhūmyāṃ tilayuktāna saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.8 //
GP12garup2_u:3990: sarvatra vasudhā pūtā yatra lepo na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:3991: yatra lepaḥ sthitastatra punarlepena śudhyati // GarP_2,29.9 //
GP12garup2_u:3993: alipte āturaṃ muktaṃ viśantyete na saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,29.10 //
GP12garup2_u:3995: maṇḍalena vinā bhūmyāṃ kurvantyetacca niṣphalam // GarP_2,29.11 //
GP12garup2_u:3996: āturo mucyate naiva maṇḍalena vinā bhuvi /
GP12garup2_u:3997: brahmā rudraśca viṣṇuśca śrīrhutāśana eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:3999: anyathā mriyate yastu bālo vṛddho yuvāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4000: yonyantaraṃ sa vai gacchetkrīḍate vāyunā saha // GarP_2,29.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4001: miśritaṃ lohatāmraṃ tu tathaiva janma jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4002: tasmaivaṃ vāyubhūtasya na śrāddhaṃ nodaka kriyā // GarP_2,29.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4006: te me dahantu pāṣāni śarīreṇa kṛtāni ca // GarP_2,29.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4008: tarpaṇe dānahome ca datto bhavati cākṣayaḥ // GarP_2,29.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4015: darbhāgre śaṅkaraṃ vidyāttrayo devāḥ kuśe sthitāḥ // GarP_2,29.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4016: viprā mantrāḥ kuśā vahnistulasī ca khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4017: naite nirmālyatāṃ yānti kriyamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // GarP_2,29.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4021: pañca pravahaṇānyeva bhavābdhau majjatāṃ satām // GarP_2,29.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4029: viṣṇulokaṃ sa vai yāti mantrahīno 'pi mānavaḥ // GarP_2,29.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4033: tatra dattena dānena sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati // GarP_2,29.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4035: yasmādannarasāḥ sarve notkaṭā lavaṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,29.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4036: pitṝṇāṃ ca priyaṃ bhavyaṃ tasmātsvargapradaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4039: brāhmaṇa kṣattriyaviśāṃ strīṇāṃ śūdrajanasya ca // GarP_2,29.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4041: lavaṇaṃ tu tadā deyaṃ dbārasyoddhāṭanaṃ divaḥ // GarP_2,29.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4042_0: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde
GP12garup2_u:4046: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ guhyaṃ dānānāṃ dānamuttamam /
GP12garup2_u:4047: paramaṃ sarvadānānāṃ paraṃ gopyaṃ divaukasām // GarP_2,30.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4049: yena dattena prīyante bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti kramāt // GarP_2,30.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4054: yamalokaṃ vinirjitya svargaṃ tākṣya sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4055: gāṃ tilāṃśca kṣitaṃ hema yo dadāti dvijanmane /
GP12garup2_u:4058: taddvayaṃ dīyate vipre nānyavarṇe kadācana // GarP_2,30.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4060: anyeṣu naiva varṇeṣu poṣyavarge kadācana // GarP_2,30.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4062: āture voparāge ca dvayaṃ dānaṃ viśiṣyate /
GP12garup2_u:4063: āture dīyate dānaṃ tatkāle copatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,30.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4065: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ yaddattaṃ vikalendriye // GarP_2,30.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4067: ato dadyāt sa putro vā yāvajjīvatsasau ciram /
GP12garup2_u:4068: ativāhastathā preto bhogāṃśca labhate yataḥ // GarP_2,30.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4070: dehe tathātivāhasya parataḥ prīṇanaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,30.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4073: tilā lauhaṃ hiraṇyañca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4074: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pāvanaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,30.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4076: lavaṇe dīyamāne tu na bhayaṃ vidyate yamāt // GarP_2,30.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4077: karpāsasya tu dānena na bhūtebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4080: hemabhūmipradānācca na pīḍā narake bhavet // GarP_2,30.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4082: sarve te varadā yānti saptadhānyena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4087: tasmin kāle suto yastu sarvadānāni dāpayet /
GP12garup2_u:4090: putrairyatnena kartavyā pitaraṃ tārayanti te // GarP_2,30.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4092: aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ kalāṃ nārhati ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,30.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4093: dharmātmā sa nu putro vaidevairapi supūjyate /
GP12garup2_u:4094: dāpayedyastu dānāni hyāturaṃ pitaraṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,30.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4096: yamaṃ bhīmañca nāpnoti na gacchet tasya veśmani // GarP_2,30.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4097: kuṭhāro musalo daṇḍaḥ khaḍgaśca cchurikā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4101: garbhasthāḥ śiśavo ye ca yuvānaḥ sthavirāstathā /
GP12garup2_u:4104: śabalā śyāmadūtā ye lohadānena prīṇitāḥ // GarP_2,30.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4106: dadate nāture dānaṃ brahmaghnaistu samā hi te // GarP_2,30.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4107: pañcatve bhūmiyuktasya śṛṇu tasya ca yā gatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4108: ativāhaḥ punaḥ pretovarṣordhvaṃ sukṛtaṃ labhet // GarP_2,30.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4110: kālatrayaṃ trisandhyaṃ ca trayo varṇāstriśaktayaḥ // GarP_2,30.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4112: grīvāṃ yāvaddharirnābheḥ śarīre manujasya ca // GarP_2,30.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4116: dharmādharme matiṃ dadyāt sukhaduḥkhe kṛtākṛte // GarP_2,30.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4119: svargaṃ ca narakaṃ mokṣaṃ prayānti prāṇino dhruvam // GarP_2,30.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4120: svargasthaṃ narakasthaṃ vā śrāddhe vāpyāyanaṃ bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4122: matsyaṃ karmaṃ ca vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhañca vāmanam /
GP12garup2_u:4123: rāmaṃ rāmaṃ ca kṛṣṇaṃ ca buddhaṃ caiva sakalkinam /
GP12garup2_u:4124: etāni daśa nāmāni smartavyāni sadā budhaiḥ // GarP_2,30.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4125: svargaṃ jīvāḥ sukhaṃ yānti cyutāḥ svargācca mānavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4126: labdhvā sukhaṃ ca vittaṃ ca dayādākṣiṇyasaṃyutāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4129: aṣṭākṣaraṃ tathā mantraṃ japedvā dvādaśākṣaram // GarP_2,30.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4133: yatra viṣṇuṃ na paśyāmi tena vāsena kiṃ mama // GarP_2,30.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4135: jvālāmālākule viṣṇuḥ sarvaṃ viṣṇumayaṃ jagat // GarP_2,30.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4136: vayamāpo vayaṃ pṛthvī vayaṃ darbhā vayaṃ tilāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4137: vayaṃ gāvo vayaṃ rājā vayaṃ vāyurvayaṃ prajāḥ // GarP_2,30.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4138: vayaṃ hema vayaṃ dhānyaṃ vayaṃ madhu vayaṃ ghṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:4139: vayaṃ viprā vayaṃ devā vayaṃ śambhuśca bhūrbhuvaḥ // GarP_2,30.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4140: ahaṃ dātā ahaṃ grāhī ahaṃ yajvā ahaṃ kratuḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4141: ahaṃ hartā ahaṃ dharmo ahaṃ pṛthvī hyahaṃ jalam // GarP_2,30.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4143: yat karma kriyate kvāpi pūrvajanmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,30.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4145: yātanāṃ kurute so 'pi dharme muktiṃ dadāmyaham // GarP_2,30.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4146: manujānāṃ hitā tārkṣya ante vaitaraṇī smṛtā /
GP12garup2_u:4147: tayāvamatya pāpaughaṃ viṣṇulokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,30.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4148: bālatve yacca kaumāre yacca pariṇatau ca yat /
GP12garup2_u:4151: sandhyayoryat kṛtaṃ karma karmaṇā manasā girā // GarP_2,30.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4155: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,30.52 //
GP12garup2_u:4156: yā lakṣmīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yā ca deve vyavasthitā /
GP12garup2_u:4157: dhenurūpeṇa sā devī mama pāpaṃ vyapohatu // GarP_2,30.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4158: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde nānādānanirūpaṇaṃ nāma triṃso 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4165: aśvārūḍhāśca te yānti dadate ye hyupānahau // GarP_2,31.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4166: ātape śramayogena na dahyante ca kutracit /
GP12garup2_u:4167: chattradānena vai pretā vicaranti sukhaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4168: yamuddiśya dadātyannaṃ tena cāpyāyito bhavet // GarP_2,31.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4170: uddyotenaiva te yānti dīpadānena mānavāḥ // GarP_2,31.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4172: caturdaśyāñca dīyeta dīpadānaṃ sukhāya vai // GarP_2,31.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4174: yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ vāpi pretasya sukhalipsayā // GarP_2,31.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4175: kule dyotati śuddhātmā prakāśatvaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12garup2_u:4178: kuryādyāmyamukhaṃ pitre adbhiḥ saṅkalpya susthiram // GarP_2,31.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4183: sukhe na bhuñjamānastu dena gacchatyalaṃ pathi // GarP_2,31.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4188: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā preto 'sau prīṇito bhavet // GarP_2,31.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4190: mudrikāṃ vastrayugmañca tayā yāti parāṃ gatim // GarP_2,31.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4191: yo 'śvaṃ nāvaṃ gajaṃ vāpi brāhmaṇe pratipādayet /
GP12garup2_u:4194: yamaputtrasya yā mātā mahiṣī sugatipradā // GarP_2,31.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4196: tena samprīṇitāḥ sarve tasmin kleśaṃ na kurvate // GarP_2,31.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4201: na bhīṣayanti taṃ yāmyā vastradāne kṛte sati // GarP_2,31.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4206: tathā pretatvamukto 'sau modate saha daivataiḥ // GarP_2,31.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4209: jātasya mṛtyuloke vai prāṇino maraṇaṃ dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4210: mṛtiḥ kuryāt svadharmeṇa yāsyataśca parantapa // GarP_2,31.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4216: vātāhataḥ patatyeva nirādhāro yathā drumaḥ // GarP_2,31.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4217: pṛthivyāṃ līyate pṛthvī āpaścaiva tathāpsu ca /
GP12garup2_u:4219: ākāśe ca tathā kāśaḥ sarvavyāpī ca śaṅkare // GarP_2,31.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4220: tatra kāmastathā krodhaḥ kāye pañcendriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4221: ete tārkṣya samākhyātā dehe tiṣṭhanti taskarāḥ // GarP_2,31.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4227: praviśet sa navaṃ dehaṃ gṛhe dagdhe yathā gṛhī // GarP_2,31.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4229: ṣāṭkauśiko hyayaṃ kāyo mātā pitrośca dhātavaḥ // GarP_2,31.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4231: mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ tadyogā ye cānye vyādhayastathā // GarP_2,31.35 //
GP12garup2_u:4232: asthi śukraṃ tathā snāyuḥ dehena saha dahyate /
GP12garup2_u:4233: eṣa te kathitastārkṣya vināśaḥ sarvadehinām // GarP_2,31.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4241: tiṣṭhanti devatāḥ sarvā bhuvanāni caturdaśa // GarP_2,31.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4242: ātmānaṃ ye na jānanti te narāḥ paśavaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4247: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde dānapha lānyadehapraveśādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai katriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4252: tvacā raktaṃ tathā māṃsaṃ medo majjāsthi jīvitam // GarP_2,32.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4253: pādau pāṇī tathā guhyaṃ jihvā-keśa-nakhāḥ śiraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4255: kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lajjā mano harṣaḥ sukhāsukham /
GP12garup2_u:4258: kartā ko 'tra hṛṣīkeśa saṃsāre duḥ khasaṃkule // GarP_2,32.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4262: sādhu pṛṣṭaṃ tvayā loke sadayaṃ jīvakāraṇam /
GP12garup2_u:4267: tāvannālokyate vaktraṃ pāpaṃ yāvadvapuḥ sthitam // GarP_2,32.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4269: tṛtīye rajakī jñeyā caturthe 'hani śudhyati // GarP_2,32.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4277: yā caturdaśamī rātrirgarbhastiṣṭhati tatra cet // GarP_2,32.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4279: sā niśā tatra sāmānyairna labhyeta khagādhipa // GarP_2,32.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4285: tasyāścaivātapo varjya śītalaṃ kevalaṃ caret // GarP_2,32.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4287: dharmamādāya manasi sutalpaṃ saṃviśet pumān // GarP_2,32.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4292: caitanyaṃ bījarūpaṃ hi śukre nityaṃ vyavasthitam /
GP12garup2_u:4295: raktādhikye bhavennārī śukrādhikye bhavet pumān // GarP_2,32.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4299: ghanaṃ māṃsañca viṃśāhe garbhastho vardhate kramāt // GarP_2,32.24 //
GP12garup2_u:4301: tathā māse tu sampūrṇe pañcatattvaṃ nidhārayet // GarP_2,32.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4302: māsadvaye tu sañjāte tvacā medaśca jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4304: karṇau ca nāsike vakṣo jāyeran māsi pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:4307: aṣṭame calate jīvo dhātrīgarbhe punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4308: navamemāsi samprāpte garbhasthaujau dṛḍhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4310: nārī vātha naro vātha napuṃstvaṃ vābhijāyate // GarP_2,32.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4314: majjāsthiśukramāṃsāni roma raktaṃ balaṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4316: navame daśame māsi jāyate pāñcabhautikaḥ // GarP_2,32.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4321: mūlabhūtā ime proktāḥ sapta nāḍyantare sthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4323: ete pañca guṇāḥ proktā mayā bhūmeḥ khageśvara /
GP12garup2_u:4324: yathā pañca guṇāścāpastathā tacchṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,32.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4325: lālā mūtraṃ tathā śukraṃ majjāra raktañca pañcamam /
GP12garup2_u:4326: āpaḥ pañcaguṇāḥ proktā jñātavyāste prayatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4327: kṣudhā tṛṣā tathā nidrā ālasyaṃ kāntireva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4328: tejaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ proktaṃ tārkṣya sarvatrayogibhiḥ // GarP_2,32.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4329: rāgadveṣau tathā lajjā bhayaṃ mohastathaiva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4330: ityetat kathitaṃ tārkṣya vāyujaṃ guṇapañcakam // GarP_2,32.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4332: nirodhaḥ pañcamaḥ prokto vāyoḥ pañca guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ // GarP_2,32.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4334: ākāśasya guṇāḥ pañca jñāta vyāstārkṣya yatnataḥ // GarP_2,32.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4335: śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsā buddhīndriyāṇi ca /
GP12garup2_u:4336: pāṇī pādau gudaṃ prāk ca guhyaṃ karmendriyāṇi ca // GarP_2,32.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4337: iḍāca piṅgalā caiva suṣumṇā ca tṛtīyakā /
GP12garup2_u:4338: gāndhārī gajajihvā ca pūṣā caiva yasā tathā // GarP_2,32.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4340: piṇḍa madhye sthitā hyetāḥ pradhānā daśa nāḍayaḥ // GarP_2,32.44 //
GP12garup2_u:4341: prāṇāpānau samānaśca udāno vyāna eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:4342: nāgaḥ kūrmaśca kṛkaro devadatto dhanañjayaḥ // GarP_2,32.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4343: ityete vāyavaḥ proktā daśa deheṣu susthitāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4346: āhāro bhuktamātrastu vāyunā kriyate dvidhā // GarP_2,32.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4347: sa praviśya guhe samyak pṛthagannaṃ pṛthagjalam /
GP12garup2_u:4357: sapta lakṣāṇi keśāḥ syurnakhāḥ proktāstu viṃśatiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4360: palāni daśa medaśca tvacā caiva tu tatsamā // GarP_2,32.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4362: śukraṃ dvikuḍavaṃ jñeyaṃ śoṇitaṃ kuḍavaṃ smṛtam // GarP_2,32.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4364: asthnāṃ hi hyadhikaṃ proktaṃ ṣaṣṭyuttaraśatatrayāt // GarP_2,32.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4366: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaiva hi prāpyate // GarP_2,32.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4368: tale tu karayornyasya vardhate jānupārśvayoḥ // GarP_2,32.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4370: jānupṛṣṭhe tathā netre jānumadhye ca nāsikā // GarP_2,32.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4373: nāḍī vāpyāyanī nāma nābhyāṃ tatra nibadhyate /
GP12garup2_u:4374: strīṇāṃ tathāntrasuṣire sa nibaddhaḥ prajāyate // GarP_2,32.61 //
GP12garup2_u:4380: tathātathā yatiṣyāmi garbhaṃ nāpnomyahaṃ yathā // GarP_2,32.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4384: navame daśame vāpi māsi saṃjāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,32.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4396: svargaṃ ca nirayaṃ caiva svakarmaphalamaśnute // GarP_2,32.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4398: svarloke narake caiva bhuktaprāye dvijottamāḥ // GarP_2,32.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4400: dṛśyate nātra modante pātyamānāstu nārakaiḥ // GarP_2,32.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4406: jātasya bālabhāve 'pi vṛddhatve duḥkhameva ca // GarP_2,32.77 //
GP12garup2_u:4408: duḥsvapnaṃ yā vṛddhatā ca maraṇe duḥ khamutkaṭam // GarP_2,32.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4409: kṛṣyamāṇaśca yāmyaiḥ sa narake 'pi ca yātyadhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4410: punaśca garbhājjanma syānmaraṇaṃ duṣkaraṃ tathā // GarP_2,32.79 //
GP12garup2_u:4414: vinatāsuta mokṣāya yatitavyaṃ tato naraiḥ // GarP_2,32.81 //
GP12garup2_u:4416: kathayāmi kramapraśraṃ pṛṣṭaṃ vā vartate spṛhā // GarP_2,32.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4419: praśrasyāpi tṛtīyasya uttaraṃ ca vidhīyatām // GarP_2,32.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4422: śṛṇu tatrottaraṃ tūktaṃ kathayāmi samāsataḥ // GarP_2,32.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4425: vāsasī paridhāryātha dhaute tu śuci nī śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4427: tilān gomayaliptāyāṃ bhūmau tatra niveśayet // GarP_2,32.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4428: prāgudakśirasaṃ vāpi mukhe svarṇaṃ viniḥ kṣepet /
GP12garup2_u:4429: śālagrāmaśilā tatra tulasī ca khageśvara // GarP_2,32.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4432: ādau tu praṇavaṃ kṛtvā pūjādāne tataḥ smṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4435: dattvā dānaṃ ca viprebhyo dīnānāthebhya eva ca // GarP_2,32.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4437: nivartayenmamatvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ pādau hṛdi smaran // GarP_2,32.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4439: puttrādyāḥ prapaṭheyuste mriyamāṇe nije jane // GarP_2,32.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4445: tilairdarbhaiśca niḥ kṣiptaiḥ snānaṃ kratumayaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,32.96 //
GP12garup2_u:4449: vrajate yadi pāpasyālpatvaṃ puṃso bhavetkhaga // GarP_2,32.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4450: pañcaratne mukhe mukte jive jñānaṃ prarohati /
GP12garup2_u:4451: tulasī brāhmaṇā gāvo viṣṇurekādaśī khaga // GarP_2,32.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4461: dātavyāni yathāśaktyā prīto 'sau sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,32.104 //
GP12garup2_u:4463: brahmāṇḍe ye guṇāḥ santi śarīre te vyavasthitāḥ // GarP_2,32.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4466: pādādhastu talaṃ jñeyaṃ pādordhvaṃ vitalaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4467: jānubhyāṃ sutalaṃ viddhi sakthideśe mahātalam // GarP_2,32.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4471: svargalokaṃ hṛdaye vidyāt kaṇṭhadeśe mahastathā // GarP_2,32.109 //
GP12garup2_u:4474: trikoṇe saṃsthito meruradhaḥ koṇe ca mandaraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4475: dakṣiṇe ceva kailāso vāmabhāge himācalaḥ // GarP_2,32.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4478: asthisthāne sthito jambūḥ śāko majjāsu saṃsthitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4479: kuśadvīpaḥ sthito māṃse krauñcadvīpaḥ śirāsthitaḥ // GarP_2,32.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4480: tvacāyāṃ śālmalidvāpo plakṣaḥ romṇāṃ ca sañcaye /
GP12garup2_u:4486: nādacakre sthitaḥ sūryo binducakre ca candramāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4487: locanasthaḥ kujo jñeyo hṛdaye ca budhaḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,32.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4489: nābhisthāne sthito mando mukhe rāhuḥ sthitaḥ sadā // GarP_2,32.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4490: pāyu (da) sthāne sthitaḥ ketuḥ śarīre grahamaṇḍalam /
GP12garup2_u:4492: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4493: bubhukṣā ca tṛṣā raudrā dāhodbhūtā ca mūrchanā // GarP_2,32.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4495: vināśaḥ pūrṇakāle ca jāyate sarvadehinām // GarP_2,32.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4500: yamaloke vasantyete kuṭyāṃ janma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:4501: evaṃ sañjāyate tārkṣya martye jantuḥ svakarmabhiḥ // GarP_2,32.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4502: utpannā ye hi saṃsāre mriyante te na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4503: āyuḥ karma ca vittañca vidyā nidhanameva ca // GarP_2,32.125 //
GP12garup2_u:4505: karmaṇā jāyate jantuḥ karmaṇaiva pralīyate // GarP_2,32.126 //
GP12garup2_u:4506: sukhaṃ duḥ khaṃ bhayaṃ kṣemaṃ karmaṇaivābhipadyate /
GP12garup2_u:4511: yathāyathā duṣkṛtaṃ tat kule hīne prajāyate // GarP_2,32.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4513: ataḥ paraṃ kimarthaṃ te kathayāmi khageśvara // GarP_2,32.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4514: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmadṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde jantūtpattitadgadhātvādivibhāgabhuvanādivibhāgavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4520: vistaraṃ tasya me brūhi adhvā caiva kiyān smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,33.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4521: kaiśca pāpaiḥ kṛtairdeva kena vā śubhakarmaṇā /
GP12garup2_u:4527: tatra gacchanti pāpiṣṭhā mānavā mūḍhacetasaḥ // GarP_2,33.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4530: vṛkṣacchāyā na tatrāsti yatra viśramate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4532: tasmin mārge na cānnādyaṃ yena prāṇān prapoṣayet /
GP12garup2_u:4533: na jalaṃ dṛśyate tatra tṛṣā yena vilīyate // GarP_2,33.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4534: kṣudhayā pīḍito yāti tṛṣṇayā ca mahāpathe /
GP12garup2_u:4536: yadyasya yādṛśaṃ pāpaṃ sa panthāstasya tādṛśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4537: sudīnāḥ kṛpaṇā mūḍhā duḥ khairvyāptāstaranti tam // GarP_2,33.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4538: rudanti dāruṇaṃ kecit keciddrohaṃ vadanti ca /
GP12garup2_u:4540: īdṛgvidhaḥ sa vai panthā vijñeyo dāruṇaḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4541: vitṛṣṇā ye narā loke sukhaṃ tasmin vrajanti te // GarP_2,33.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4542: yāniyāni ca dānāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4545: bhramanti vāyubhūtāste ye kṣudrāḥ pāpakarmiṇaḥ // GarP_2,33.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4546: īdṛśaṃ vartma tadraudraṃ kathitaṃ tava suvrata /
GP12garup2_u:4547: punaśca kathayiṣyāmi yamamārgasya yā sthitiḥ // GarP_2,33.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4549: sarvaṃ vajramayaṃ divyamabhedyaṃ tat surāsuraiḥ // GarP_2,33.15 //
GP12garup2_u:4551: svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vai yasyāṃ yamo dūtaiḥ samanvitaḥ // GarP_2,33.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4560: tatrastho bhagavān dharma āsane tu same śubhe /
GP12garup2_u:4574: na muhyati kadācit sa sukṛte duṣkṛte 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4575: yadyenopārjitaṃ yāvat tāvadvai vetti tasya tat // GarP_2,33.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4581: aiśanyāṃ vai śiro 'rtiśca āgneyyāñcaiva mṛkatā // GarP_2,33.31 //
GP12garup2_u:4583: ebhiḥ parivṛto nityaṃ citraguptaḥ sa tiṣṭhati // GarP_2,33.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4584: yat karma kurute kaścittat sarvaṃ vilakhatyasau /
GP12garup2_u:4596: pīḍyante yamadūtaiśca pāpiṣṭhāḥ subhṛśaṃ narāḥ // GarP_2,33.38 //
GP12garup2_u:4598: yamaloke mayā dṛṣṭā mamasvaṃ bhakṣitaṃ tvayā // GarP_2,33.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4601: dānopakāraṃ vakṣyāmi yathā tatra sukhaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,33.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4602: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pratakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde yamalokavistṛtidṛvarṇanaṃ nāma trayastriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4607: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ nṝṇāmagre dhāvati dhāvatām // GarP_2,34.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4609: dvāpare yajñadāne ca dānamekaṃ kalau yuge // GarP_2,34.2 //
GP12garup2_u:4611: iṣṭāpūrte svaśaktyā hi kurvatāṃ nāsti pātakam // GarP_2,34.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4613: yamamārge sukhaṃ tasya vrajato nitarāṃ bhavet // GarP_2,34.4 //
GP12garup2_u:4615: tapyamānāḥ sukhaṃ yānti sarva kāmaiḥ prapūritāḥ // GarP_2,34.5 //
GP12garup2_u:4617: tena sarvamidaṃ dattaṃ yena dattā vasundharā // GarP_2,34.6 //
GP12garup2_u:4618: yāniyāni ca bhūtāni dattāni bhuvi mānavaiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4621: dadāti vidhinā putra prete tadu patiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4623: tārayet pitaraṃ ghorāt tena puttraḥ pravakṣyate // GarP_2,34.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4625: ativāhastadā preto bhogān vai labhate hi saḥ // GarP_2,34.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4627: dīyate pretarūpo 'sau prīto yāti yamālaye // GarP_2,34.11 //
GP12garup2_u:4628: apakve mṛnmaye pātre dugdhaṃ dattaṃ dinatrayam /
GP12garup2_u:4629: kāṣṭhatrayaṃ guṇairbaddhvā prītyai rātrau catuṣpathe // GarP_2,34.12 //
GP12garup2_u:4630: prathame 'hni dvitīye ca tṛtīye ca tathā khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4634: na pūrvāhne na madhyāhne nāparāhne na sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:4636: puttreṇa datte te sarve gotriṇo hitabāndhavāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4637: svajātyaiḥ parajātyaiśca deyo nadyāṃ jalāñjaliḥ // GarP_2,34.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4638: gantavyaṃ naiva vipreṇa dātuṃ śīghraṃ jalāñjalim /
GP12garup2_u:4639: nivṛttāśca yadā nāryo lokācāraḥ sadābhavet // GarP_2,34.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4640: pañcatvañca gate śūdre yaḥ kāṣṭhaṃ nayate citām /
GP12garup2_u:4642: trirātre ca tataḥ pūrṇe nadīṃ gacchet samudragām /
GP12garup2_u:4643: prāṇāyāmaśataṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ prāśya viśudhyati // GarP_2,34.19 //
GP12garup2_u:4644: śūdro gacchati sarvatra vaiśyastriṣu dvayoḥ paraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4645: gacchati svīyavarṇeṣu dātuṃ prete jalāñjalim // GarP_2,34.20 //
GP12garup2_u:4647: tyajanti gotriṇaḥ sarve dināni nava kāśyapa // GarP_2,34.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4649: yatra sthāne mṛto yastu adhvanyapi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4650: viśleṣastu tataḥ sthānānna kvacidvihito budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4655: gotribhirna ca kartavyaṃ gṛhānnañca na bhojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4656: bhuñjīta mṛnmaye pātre uttānañca vivarjayet // GarP_2,34.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4660: vāyurūpo bhramatyeva vāyurūrdhvaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.27 //
GP12garup2_u:4662: navakaiḥ ṣoḍaśaśrāddhaiḥ prayāti hi kuṭīṃ naraḥ // GarP_2,34.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4663: tilairdarbhaiśca bhūmyāṃ vai kuṭī dhātumayī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4664: pañca ratnāni vaktre tu yena jīvaḥ prarohati // GarP_2,34.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4665: yadā puṣpaṃ pranaṣṭaṃ hi tadā garbhaṃ na dhārayet /
GP12garup2_u:4666: ādarācca tato bhūmau tiladarbhānviniḥ kṣipet // GarP_2,34.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4667: paśutve sthāvaratve ca yatra kvāpi sa jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4670: yathā śrāddhaṃ yamuddiśya kṛtaṃ tasyopatiṣṭhati // GarP_2,34.32 //
GP12garup2_u:4673: piṇḍadānaṃ na yasyābhūdākāśe bhramate tu saḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4675: ākāśe vasate trīṇi dinamekantu vāsake // GarP_2,34.34 //
GP12garup2_u:4676: dagdhe dehe ca vahnau ca jalenaiva tu tarpitaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4678: prathame 'hni tṛtīye ca pañcame saptame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4680: gṛhadvāre śmaśāne vā tīrthe devālaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4681: yatrādyo dīyate piṇḍastatra sarvān samāpayet // GarP_2,34.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4685: dadyādviprāya yaḥ śayyāṃ yathoktaṃ pretamokṣadām // GarP_2,34.39 //
GP12garup2_u:4686: na bhavet yadā sa gotro paro 'pi vidhimācaret /
GP12garup2_u:4687: bhāryā vā puruṣaḥ kaścit tuṣṭaśca kurute striyaḥ // GarP_2,34.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4689: annādyena ca tenaiva sarvaśrāddhāni kārayet // GarP_2,34.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4691: śrāddhaṃ kṛtantu yairvastraistāni tyaktvā gṛhaṃ viśet // GarP_2,34.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4692: asagotraḥ sagotro vā yadi strī yadi vā pumān /
GP12garup2_u:4693: prathame 'hani yaḥ kuryāt sa daśāhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,34.43 //
GP12garup2_u:4697: caturṇāmapi varṇānāmeṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.45 //
GP12garup2_u:4699: caturastu dvitīye 'hni tṛtīye trīṃśtathaiva ca // GarP_2,34.46 //
GP12garup2_u:4701: ekoddiṣṭantu vai śrāddhaṃ caturthe 'hani kārayet // GarP_2,34.47 //
GP12garup2_u:4703: cakṣuḥ śrotrañca nāsā ca dvitīye 'hni prajāyate // GarP_2,34.48 //
GP12garup2_u:4704: gaṇḍau vaktraṃ tathā grīvā tṛtīye 'hani jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:4705: hṛdayaṃ kukṣirudaraṃ caturthe tadvadeva hi // GarP_2,34.49 //
GP12garup2_u:4707: ṣaṣṭhe ūrū ca vijñeye saptame gulphasambhavaḥ // GarP_2,34.50 //
GP12garup2_u:4708: aṣṭame divase prāpte jaṅghe ca bhavato 'ṇḍaja /
GP12garup2_u:4709: pādau ca navame jñeyau daśame balavatkṣudhā // GarP_2,34.51 //
GP12garup2_u:4711: siddhānnaṃ tasya dātavyaṃ kṛśarāḥ pūpakāḥ payaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4714: tripakṣañcāpi ṣaṇmāse dve śrāddhāni ca ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,34.53 //
GP12garup2_u:4715: prati māsaṃ pradātavyaṃ mṛtāhe yā tithirbhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4716: sa māsaḥ prathamo jñeya iti vedavido viduḥ // GarP_2,34.54 //
GP12garup2_u:4718: tadeva prathamaṃ śrāddhaṃ tat syādekādaśe 'hani // GarP_2,34.55 //
GP12garup2_u:4719: sā tithirmāsike śrāddhe mṛto yasmin dine naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4720: riktayośca tripakṣe ca sā tithirnādriyeta vai // GarP_2,34.56 //
GP12garup2_u:4721: paurṇamāsyāṃ mṛto yo 'sau caturthī tasya conakā /
GP12garup2_u:4722: caturthyāntu mṛto yastu navamī tasya conakā // GarP_2,34.57 //
GP12garup2_u:4723: navamyāñca mṛto yaśca riktā tasya caturdaśī /
GP12garup2_u:4724: etā riktāśca vijñeyā antyeṣṭau kuśalena ca // GarP_2,34.58 //
GP12garup2_u:4726: catuṣpathe tyajedannaṃ punaḥ snānaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,34.59 //
GP12garup2_u:4732: etasmāddīyate kumbhaḥ prītiḥ pretasya jāyate // GarP_2,34.62 //
GP12garup2_u:4733: yasmin dine mṛto janturaṭavyāṃ viṣame 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4734: yadā tadā bhaveddāhaḥ sūtakaṃ mṛtavāsarāt // GarP_2,34.63 //
GP12garup2_u:4736: ekādaśāhe dātavyaṃ tena śūddho dvijo bhavet // GarP_2,34.64 //
GP12garup2_u:4737: kṣattriyo dvādaśāhe tu vaiśyaḥ pañcadaśe tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4738: śuddhiḥ śūdrasya māsena mṛtake jātasūtake // GarP_2,34.65 //
GP12garup2_u:4739: māsatraye trirātraṃ syāt ṣaṇmāsena tu pakṣiṇī /
GP12garup2_u:4741: anenaivā nusāreṇa śuddhiḥ syāt sārvavarṇikī // GarP_2,34.66 //
GP12garup2_u:4745: evaṃ pracchādyate sarvaṃ na preto bhavati kvacit // GarP_2,34.68 //
GP12garup2_u:4747: anityaṃ jīvanaṃ ysamāt paścāt ko nu pradāsyati // GarP_2,34.69 //
GP12garup2_u:4749: mṛte mṛta iti jñātvā kṣaṇāt sneho nivartate // GarP_2,34.70 //
GP12garup2_u:4753: evaṃ jānannidaṃ sarvaṃ svahastenaiva dāpayet // GarP_2,34.72 //
GP12garup2_u:4756: tasyāṃ saṃsthāpya haimañca hariṃ lakṣmyā samanvitam // GarP_2,34.73 //
GP12garup2_u:4758: vijñeyo garuḍa prītyai sa nidrākalaśo budhaiḥ // GarP_2,34.74 //
GP12garup2_u:4766: vastraiḥ suśobhanaiḥ pūjya cailakaṃ paridhāpayet // GarP_2,34.78 //
GP12garup2_u:4773: tathā caikādaśāhe tu vidhireṣa prakīrtitaḥ // GarP_2,34.82 //
GP12garup2_u:4774: dadāti yo hi dharmārthe bāndhavo bāndhave mṛte /
GP12garup2_u:4775: viśeṣamatra pakṣe tu kathyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu // GarP_2,34.83 //
GP12garup2_u:4776: upayuktañca tasyāsīt yat kiñcit svagṛhe purā /
GP12garup2_u:4778: yadabhīṣṭañca tasyāsīt tat sarvaṃ parikalpayet // GarP_2,34.84 //
GP12garup2_u:4779: sthāpayet puruṣaṃ haimaṃ śayyopari śubhaṃ budhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4783: pīḍayanti na taṃ yāmyāḥ puruṣā bhīṣaṇānanāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4784: na gharmeṇa na śītena bādhyate sa naraḥ kvacit // GarP_2,34.87 //
GP12garup2_u:4786: apiḥ pāpasamāyuktaḥ svargalokaṃ sa gacchati // GarP_2,34.88 //
GP12garup2_u:4790: bharturyā kurute nārī tasyāḥ śreyo hyanantakam // GarP_2,34.90 //
GP12garup2_u:4791: upakārāya sā bharturjīvantī na mṛtā tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4792: uddharejjīvamānā sā satī satyavatī priyam // GarP_2,34.91 //
GP12garup2_u:4794: vastrabhūṣā tathā śayyā sarvametaddhi dāpayet // GarP_2,34.92 //
GP12garup2_u:4796: bhūṣaṇaṃ gātralagnañca vastu bhogyādikañca yat // GarP_2,34.93 //
GP12garup2_u:4797: tat sarvaṃ melayitvā tu svesve sthāne niyojayet /
GP12garup2_u:4803: ātmā śambhuḥ śivā gaurī śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12garup2_u:4806: gṛhīte brāhmaṇastatra ko 'dāditi ca kīrtayet // GarP_2,34.98 //
GP12garup2_u:4808: vidhinānena vai pakṣin dānamekasya dāpayet // GarP_2,34.99 //
GP12garup2_u:4809: bahubhyo na pradeyāni gaurgṛhaṃ śayanaṃ striyaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4810: vibhaktadakṣiṇā hyete dātāraṃ pātayanti hi // GarP_2,34.100 //
GP12garup2_u:4811: evaṃ yo vitaret tārkṣya śṛṇu tasya ca yat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4812: sāgraṃ varṣaśataṃ divyaṃ svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,34.101 //
GP12garup2_u:4814: dvārakāyāntu yat puṇyaṃ candrasūryagrahe tathā // GarP_2,34.102 //
GP12garup2_u:4819: yatrāsau jāyate prāṇī bhuṅkte tatraiva tat phalam /
GP12garup2_u:4820: karmakṣaye kṣitau yāti mānuṣaḥ śubhadarśanaḥ // GarP_2,34.105 //
GP12garup2_u:4822: punaḥ sa yāti vaikuṇṭhaṃ mṛto 'sau narapuṅgavaḥ // GarP_2,34.106 //
GP12garup2_u:4824: aho 'sau havyakavyeṣu pitṛbhiḥ saha modate // GarP_2,34.107 //
GP12garup2_u:4826: maghāsu pitṛparvāṇi yāniyāni ca teṣu ca // GarP_2,34.108 //
GP12garup2_u:4827: śṛṇu tārkṣya yathānyāyaṃ pretatve pitaro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:4829: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryaṃ pūrṇe varṣe na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4830: ādyantu śavaśuddhyarthaṃ kṛtvā caivākṣa ṣoḍaśīm // GarP_2,34.110 //
GP12garup2_u:4832: vṛddhiṃ prāpyāgrataḥ kuryācchūdrasya svacchayaiva hi // GarP_2,34.111 //
GP12garup2_u:4834: na cāsau kurute yāvat preta eva sa vahnimān /
GP12garup2_u:4835: dvādaśāhe tataḥ kāryaṃ sāgnikena sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.112 //
GP12garup2_u:4837: abdamadhye na kurvīta sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.113 //
GP12garup2_u:4838: sapatnyo yadi bahvyaḥ syurekā putravatī bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:4841: samācārādbhavet pāpī pitṛhā cāpi jāyate // GarP_2,34.115 //
GP12garup2_u:4842: mṛte bhartari yā nārī prāṇāṃścaiva parityajet /
GP12garup2_u:4843: bhartraiva hi samaṃ tasyāḥ prakurvīta sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.116 //
GP12garup2_u:4844: asthānikāpi yā vyūḍhā vaiśyā vā kṣattriyāpi vā /
GP12garup2_u:4845: yāḥ patnyo vai pituḥ kaścit kuryāt putraḥ sapiṇḍanam // GarP_2,34.117 //
GP12garup2_u:4847: ekoddiṣṭantu tacchrāddha sā tu tenaiva yujyate // GarP_2,34.118 //
GP12garup2_u:4848: anye tu daśa ye putrā jātā varṇa catuṣṭaye /
GP12garup2_u:4849: te tāsutāsu yoktvayāḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇe sadā // GarP_2,34.119 //
GP12garup2_u:4851: pituḥ pṛthak pradāvyaṃ striyāḥ piṇḍaṃ sapiṇḍane // GarP_2,34.120 //
GP12garup2_u:4853: sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ kāryamiti tārkṣya mataṃ mama // GarP_2,34.121 //
GP12garup2_u:4854: aputrāyāṃ mṛtāyāṃ tu patiḥ kuryāt sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4856: putro nāsti na bhartā ca strīṇāṃ tārkṣya sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:4859: ekoddiṣṭena dātavyaṃ pareṇa saha bhrātṛbhiḥ // GarP_2,34.124 //
GP12garup2_u:4862: adāhe na ca kartavyaṃ sadāhe kārayedbudhaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4864: pituḥ putreṇa kartavyaṃ na kurbvīta pitā sute /
GP12garup2_u:4869: antyeṣṭiṃ kurute hyeko munibhaiḥ samudāhṛtam // GarP_2,34.129 //
GP12garup2_u:4871: ekaikena ca kartavyā putreṇa ca svayaṃsvayam // GarP_2,34.130 //
GP12garup2_u:4874: bhrātā vā bhrātṛputro vā sapiṇḍaḥ śiṣya eva vā /
GP12garup2_u:4879: pārvaṇaṃ na sutaiḥ kāryaṃ śrāddhaṃ nāndīmukhaṃ na ca // GarP_2,34.134 //
GP12garup2_u:4883: pitṛpiṇḍo na dātavyaḥ sapiṇḍīkaraṇaṃ vinā // GarP_2,34.136 //
GP12garup2_u:4885: apūrṇe 'pyabdamadhyepi kartavyamiti ke ca na // GarP_2,34.137 //
GP12garup2_u:4887: kartavyaṃ tacca vai sarvameṣa eva vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // GarP_2,34.138 //
GP12garup2_u:4889: ṛṣīṇāṃ pitaro devāḥ pitā jayati tena vai // GarP_2,34.139 //
GP12garup2_u:4892: mṛte pitaryabdamadhye yaḥ śrāddhaṃ kārayet sutaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4893: saptajanmakṛtā dharmāt hīyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // GarP_2,34.141 //
GP12garup2_u:4895: bhramanti vāyunā sarve kṣuttṛḍbhyāṃ paripīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,34.142 //
GP12garup2_u:4897: atha māturvipattiḥ syāt pitṛkāryaṃ na lupyate // GarP_2,34.143 //
GP12garup2_u:4898: mṛtā mātā pitā tiṣṭhejjīvantī ca pitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4899: sapiṇḍanantu kartavyaṃ pitāmahyā sahaiva tu // GarP_2,34.144 //
GP12garup2_u:4900: satyaṃsatyaṃ punaḥ satyaṃ śrūyatāṃ vacanaṃ mama /
GP12garup2_u:4901: na piṇḍo milito yeṣāṃ mṛtānāntu nṛṇāṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,34.145 //
GP12garup2_u:4904: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde aurdhvadehikādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catustriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:4909: puruṣasya ca kasyāpi matā pañcatvamāgatā // GarP_2,35.1 //
GP12garup2_u:4910: pitāmahī jīvati ca tathā ca prapitāmahī /
GP12garup2_u:4913: kena sā melyate mātā etat kathaya me prabho // GarP_2,35.3 //
GP12garup2_u:4922: antyastu tyājako jñeyo yo vṛddhaprapitāmahaḥ // GarP_2,35.7 //
GP12garup2_u:4924: lepakastvantimo yastu sa bhavet paṅktisannidhaḥ // GarP_2,35.8 //
GP12garup2_u:4926: ityete pitaro jñeyā ekaviṃśati saṃkhyakāḥ // GarP_2,35.9 //
GP12garup2_u:4928: jāyate 'tra na sandehaḥ śṛṇu tasyāpi yat phalam // GarP_2,35.10 //
GP12garup2_u:4929: pitā dadāti puttrān vai vicchinnasantatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4931: kṛte śrāddhe guṇā hyete pitṝṇāṃ tapeṇe smṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4933: yasya puṃsaśca martye vai vicchinnā santatiḥ khaga /
GP12garup2_u:4934: sa vasennarake ghore paṅke magnaḥ karī yathā // GarP_2,35.13 //
GP12garup2_u:4936: na santatiṃ vinā so 'tra mucyate narakāddhruvam // GarP_2,35.14 //
GP12garup2_u:4937: ācāryastasya śiṣyo vā yo dūre 'pi hi gātrejaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4940: nivasennākaloke ca nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // GarP_2,35.16 //
GP12garup2_u:4942: revatyantaṃ sadā dūṣyamaśubhaṃ sarvadā bhavet // GarP_2,35.17 //
GP12garup2_u:4944: dīyate na jalaṃ tatra aśubhaṃ jāyate dhruvam /
GP12garup2_u:4945: lokayātrā na kartavyā duḥ khārtaḥ svajano yadi // GarP_2,35.18 //
GP12garup2_u:4951: sadyāhutikaraṃ puṇyaṃ tīrthe taddāha uttamaḥ // GarP_2,35.21 //
GP12garup2_u:4953: śavasya ca samīpe tu kṣipyante puttalāstataḥ // GarP_2,35.22 //
GP12garup2_u:4955: tato dāhaḥ prakartavyaḥ taiśca puttalakaiḥ saha // GarP_2,35.23 //
GP12garup2_u:4957: pañcakeṣu mṛto yo 'sau na gatiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4958: tilān gāśca suvarṇaṃ ca tamuddiśya ghṛtaṃ dadet // GarP_2,35.25 //
GP12garup2_u:4960: sūtakānte ca satputraiḥ sa preto labhate gatim // GarP_2,35.26 //
GP12garup2_u:4964: vidhānaṃ yo na kurvīta vighnastasya prajāyate // GarP_2,35.28 //
GP12garup2_u:4966: āśiṣo dviguṇān darbhān praṇavān naikapiṇḍatām // GarP_2,35.29 //
GP12garup2_u:4968: vikiraṃ ca svadhākāraṃ pitṛśabdaṃ na coccaret // GarP_2,35.30 //
GP12garup2_u:4971: na kuryāt tilahomañca dvijaḥ pūrṇāhutiṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:4974: sthāne dvāre cārdhamārge citāyāṃ śavahastake // GarP_2,35.33 //
GP12garup2_u:4976: ṣaṣṭhaṃ sañcayane proktaṃ daśa piṇḍā daśāhikāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:4978: anyacca ṣoḍaśaṃ madhye dvitīyaṃ tārkṣya me śṛṇu /
GP12garup2_u:4981: evaṃ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhuretat tattvavido janāḥ // GarP_2,35.36 //
GP12garup2_u:4983: tripakṣasambhavañcaiva dve rikte khaga ṣoḍaśa // GarP_2,35.37 //
GP12garup2_u:4986: śatārdhena vihīno yo militaḥ paṅktibhāṅna hi /
GP12garup2_u:4989: melanīyaḥ śatārdhena sandhiḥ śrāddhena tattvataḥ // GarP_2,35.40 //
GP12garup2_u:4992: evaṃ cenna vidhānaṃ vidhīyate tatpiśācaparibhavanam // GarP_2,35.41 //
GP12garup2_u:4994: śavaṃ na muñceta mucyate cet duḥ sparśāddurgatirbhavet // GarP_2,35.42 //
GP12garup2_u:4995: grāmamadhye sthite prete śrute bhuṅkte yadṛcchayā /
GP12garup2_u:4998: grāmamadhye sthite prete varjayet piṇḍapātanam // GarP_2,35.42 // (35.44)
GP12garup2_u:5000: grāmamadhye sthite prete śuddhyarthaṃ jñātidharmataḥ // GarP_2,35.43 // (35.45)
GP12garup2_u:5003: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sapiṇḍanaśavavidhyornirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5008: svagṛhantu parityajya tīrthe vai mriyate yadi // GarP_2,36.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5009: aprāpya tīrthaṃ mriyate gṛhe vā mṛtyu māgataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5010: būtvā kuṭīcaro yastu sa kāṃ gatimavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,36.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5011: saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yastu tīrthe vāpi gṛhe 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5013: niyame cet kṛte deva cittabhaṅgo hi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5014: kena tasya bhavet siddhiḥ kṛtenāpyakṛtena vā // GarP_2,36.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5016: kṛtvā niraśanaṃ yo vai mṛtyumāpnoti ko 'pi cet /
GP12garup2_u:5017: mānupīṃ tanumutsṛjya mama tulyo virājate // GarP_2,36.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5020: tīrthe gṛhe vā saṃnyāsaṃ nītvā cenmriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5021: pratyahaṃ labhate so 'pi pūrvoktaṃ dviguṇaṃ phalam // GarP_2,36.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5023: punarna jāyate rogo devavaddhi virājate // GarP_2,36.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5024: ya āturaḥ san sannyāsaṃ gṛhṇāti yadi mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5025: punarna jāyate bhūmau saṃsāre duḥ khasāgare // GarP_2,36.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5029: mṛto muktimavāpnoti yathā sarve maharṣayaḥ // GarP_2,36.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5031: tasmāt svasthe cottare vā sādhayenmokṣalakṣaṇam // GarP_2,36.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5032: puttradravyādi santyajya tīrthaṃ vrajati yo naraḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5036: vrataṃ niraśana kṛtvā svagṛhe 'pi mṛto yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5038: annañcaiva tathā toyaṃ parityajya naro yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5041: yamadūtā viśeṣeṇa na yāmyāstasya pārśvagāḥ // GarP_2,36.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5044: sevite 'pi sadā tathi hyanyatra mriyate yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5045: śubhe deśe kule dhīmān sa bhavedvedaviddvijaḥ // GarP_2,36.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5047: brāhmaṇān sa samāhūya sarvasvaṃ yat parityajet // GarP_2,36.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5049: anṛtaṃ na vadet paścāddharmameva samācaret // GarP_2,36.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5050: tīrthe gatvā ca yaḥ ko 'pi punarāyāti vai gṛham /
GP12garup2_u:5051: anujñātaḥ sa vai vipraiḥ prāyaścittamathācaret // GarP_2,36.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5053: tīrthaṃ yadi labhed yastu mṛtyukāle sa bhāgyavān // GarP_2,36.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5055: padepade tu godānaṃ yadi hiṃsā na jāyate // GarP_2,36.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5056: gṛhe tu yat kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tīrthasnānena śudhyati /
GP12garup2_u:5057: kurute tatra pāpañcedvajralepasamaṃ hi tat // GarP_2,36.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5059: tatra dattāni dānāni jāyante cākṣayāṇi vai // GarP_2,36.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5062: dānavantaṃ naraṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭāḥ sarve divaukasaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5063: ṛṣibhiḥ saha dharmaṇa citraguptena sarvadā // GarP_2,36.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5065: parādhīnaṃ mṛte sarvaṃ kṛpayā kaḥ pradāsyati // GarP_2,36.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5067: ātmānaṃ sadhanaṃ tena cakre putraprapautrakaiḥ // GarP_2,36.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5071: mṛtāḥ śocanti te sarve kadaryāḥ pāpinastviti // GarP_2,36.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5076: udāse dhārmikaḥ saumyaḥ prāpyāpi vipulaṃ dhanam /
GP12garup2_u:5078: na caivopadravāstasya mohajālo na caiva hi /
GP12garup2_u:5079: mṛtyukāle na ca bhayaṃ yamadūtasamudbhavam // GarP_2,36.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5080: samāḥ sahasrāṇi ca sapta vai jale daśaikamagnau pavane ca ṣoḍaśa /
GP12garup2_u:5081: mahāhave paṣṭiraśītirgogṛhe anāśake kāśyapa cākṣayā gatiḥ // GarP_2,36.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5082: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'naśanamṛta gatinirūpaṇaṃ nāma ṣaṭtriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5087: vidhinā kena kartavyā kṛtireṣā janārdana // GarP_2,37.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5088: kiṃlakṣaṇāḥ kena pūrṇāḥ kasya deyā janārdana /
GP12garup2_u:5094: dvādaśāhe ca paṇmāse traipakṣe vāpi vatsare /
GP12garup2_u:5095: udakumbhāḥ pradātavyā mārge tasya sukhāya vai // GarP_2,37.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5099: suprītastena dattena preto yāmyaiḥ sa gacchati // GarP_2,37.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5101: vidhinā tatra saṅkalpaya ghaṭān dvādaśasaṃkhyakān // GarP_2,37.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5103: viṣṇumuddiśya dātavyā saṃkalpya brāhmaṇe śubhe // GarP_2,37.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5104: eko vai dharmarājāya tena tuṣṭena muktibhāk /
GP12garup2_u:5105: citraguptāya caikaṃ tu gatastatra sukhī bhavet // GarP_2,37.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5110: pakvānnajalapūrṇo hi yāvat saṃvatsaraṃ dinam // GarP_2,37.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5112: ekā vai vardhanī tatra tasyāṃ pātrantu vaṃśajam // GarP_2,37.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5119: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyāṃśe pretakalpe dharmakāṇḍe sodakumbhaśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5123: dānatīrthārthitaṃ mokṣaṃ svargañca vada me prabho /
GP12garup2_u:5124: kena mokṣamavāpnoti kena svarge vasecciram // GarP_2,38.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5126: mānuṣyaṃ kena labhate narakeśu nimajjati // GarP_2,38.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5128: brūhi kasmin mṛte svarge punarjanma na vidyate // GarP_2,38.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5130: mānuṣyaṃ bhārate varṣe trayodaśasu jātiṣu // GarP_2,38.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5131: tat prāpya mriyate kṣetre punarjanma na vidyate /
GP12garup2_u:5132: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantikā // GarP_2,38.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5134: sannyastamiti yo bruyāt prāṇaiḥ kaṇṭhagatairapi // GarP_2,38.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5135: mṛto viṣṇupuraṃ yāti na punarjāyate kṣitau /
GP12garup2_u:5138: kṛṣṇakṛṣṇeti kṛṣṇeti yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ // GarP_2,38.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5140: śālagrāmajilā yatra yatra dvāravatī śilā // GarP_2,38.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5141: ubhayoḥ saṅgamo yatra muktistatra na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5145: tulasī dahate pāpaṃ nṛṇāṃ janmārjitaṃ khaga // GarP_2,38.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5147: yaḥ snāto mānase tīrthe na sa lipyeta pātakaiḥ // GarP_2,38.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5148: na kāṣṭhe vidyate devo na śilāyāṃ kadācana /
GP12garup2_u:5149: bhāve hi vidyate devastasmādbhāvaṃ samācaret // GarP_2,38.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5151: na te śivapurīṃ yānti cittavṛttirgarīyasī // GarP_2,38.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5152: yādṛk cittapratītiḥ syāt tādṛk karmaphalaṃ nṛṇām /
GP12garup2_u:5154: brāhmaṇārthe gavārthe ca strīṇāṃ balavadheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5155: prāṇatyāgaparo yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,38.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5156: anāśake mṛtau yastu sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt /
GP12garup2_u:5157: anāśake mṛto yastu sa muktaḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ // GarP_2,38.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5159: ete vai mokṣamārgāśca svargamārgāstathaiva ca // GarP_2,38.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5162: ātmānaṃ tatra santyajya svargavāsaṃ labhecciram // GarP_2,38.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5166: prabhāse śrīsthale caiva arbude ca tripuṣkare // GarP_2,38.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5167: bhūteśvare mṛto yastu svarge vasati mānavaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5168: brahmaṇo divasaṃ yāvat tataḥ patati bhūtale // GarP_2,38.22 //
GP12garup2_u:5170: sarvaṃ kalaṃ sa muddhṛtya svargaloke mahīyate // GarP_2,38.23 //
GP12garup2_u:5172: indraloke vaset so 'pi svakulaiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ // GarP_2,38.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5176: jīrṇoddhāreṇa vā teṣāṃ tat puṇyaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // GarP_2,38.26 //
GP12garup2_u:5178: kṛtvā viprāya viduṣe pradadāti kuṭumbine // GarP_2,38.27 //
GP12garup2_u:5179: tisraḥ koṭyordhakoṭī ca naraḥ svarge mahīyate // GarP_2,38.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5180: yā strī savarṇā saṃśubā mṛtaṃ patimanuvrajet /
GP12garup2_u:5181: sā mṛtā svargamāpnoti varṣāṇāṃ romasaṃkhyatā // GarP_2,38.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5183: svargaṃ labhetāṃ tau cobhau divyastrībhiralaṅkṛtau // GarP_2,38.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5185: prakṣālayati sarvāṇi yā svaṃ patimanuvrajet // GarP_2,38.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5195: saro bhirdaśabhistulyā yā prapā nirjale vane // GarP_2,38.36 //
GP12garup2_u:5196: yā vāpī nirjale deśe yaddānaṃ nirdhane dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5197: prāṇināṃ yo dayāṃ dhatte sa bhavennākanāyakaḥ // GarP_2,38.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5199: sa tat sarvaṃ phalaṃ prāpya pratiṣṭhāṃ paramāṃ labhet // GarP_2,38.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5200: phalgu kāryaṃ parityajya satataṃ dharmavān bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5201: dānaṃ damo dayā ceti sārametat trayaṃ bhuvi // GarP_2,38.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5204: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde uttamalokagatyāgatimokṣamānuṣyahetunirūpaṇaṃ nāmāṣṭātriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5208: sūtakānāṃ vidhiṃ brūhi dayāṃ kṛtvā mayiprabho /
GP12garup2_u:5209: vivekāya hi cittasya mānavānāṃ hitāya ca // GarP_2,39.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5214: dānaṃ pratigraho homaḥ svādhyāyaśca nivartate // GarP_2,39.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5218: snānaṃ sacelaṃ kartavyaṃ sadyaḥ śaucaṃ vidhīyate // GarP_2,39.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5219: āmagarbhāśca ye jīvā ye ca garbhādviniḥ sṛtāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5222: rājānaḥ śrotiyāścaiva sadyaḥ śaucāḥ prakīrtitāḥ // GarP_2,39.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5224: eteṣāṃ sūtakaṃ nāsti yasya cecchanti pārthivāḥ // GarP_2,39.8 //
GP12garup2_u:5225: prasave ca sapiṇḍānāṃ na kuryāt saṅkaraṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5226: daśāhācchrudhyate mātā avagāhya pitā śuciḥ // GarP_2,39.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5232: tāvat syādaśucirvipro yāvat tat syādanirdaśam // GarP_2,39.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5233: udite niyame dāne ārte vipre nivedayet /
GP12garup2_u:5234: tathaiva ṛṣibhiḥ proktaṃ yathākālaṃ na duṣyati // GarP_2,39.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5236: mṛttikayā tathānte ca naraḥ snātvā śucirbhavet // GarP_2,39.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5237: dānaṃ pariṣade dadyāt suvarṇaṃ govṛṣaṃ dvije /
GP12garup2_u:5238: kṣattriyo dviguṇaṃ caiva vaiśyastu triguṇaṃ tathā // GarP_2,39.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5242: ahastu sūtakaṃ tasya tvabdānāṃ saṃkhyayā smṛtam // GarP_2,39.17 //
GP12garup2_u:5243: brāhmaṇārthe vipannā ye nārīṇāṃ gograheṣu ca /
GP12garup2_u:5251: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dhadṛpretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde sūtakakālādinirūpaṇaṃ nāmai konacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5256: kathaṃ teṣāṃ bhavenmārgaḥ kiṃ sthānaṃ kā gatirbhavet // GarP_2,40.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5257: kiñca yuktaṃ bhavetteṣāṃ vidhānaṃ vāpi kīdṛśam /
GP12garup2_u:5258: tadahaṃ śrotumicchāmi brūhi me madhusūdana // GarP_2,40.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5262: śṛṇu tārkṣya paraṃ gopyaṃ jāte durmaraṇe sati /
GP12garup2_u:5267: yānti te narakeghore ye ca mlecchādibhirhatāḥ // GarP_2,40.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5269: ullaṅghitā mṛtā ye ca mahārogaiśca pīḍitāḥ // GarP_2,40.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5275: na teṣāṃ kārayeddāhaṃ sūtakaṃ nodakakriyām // GarP_2,40.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5276: na vidhānaṃ mṛtādyaṃ ca na kuryādaurdhvadaihikam /
GP12garup2_u:5279: ṣaṇmāsaṃ brāhmaṇe dāhastrimāsaṃ kṣattriye mataḥ // GarP_2,40.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5280: sārdha māsaṃ tu vaiśyasya sadyaḥ śūdre vidhīyate /
GP12garup2_u:5281: gaṅgāyāṃ yamunāyāñca naimiṣe puṣkare 'tha ca // GarP_2,40.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5282: taḍāge jalūpūrṇe vā hrade vā vimalodake /
GP12garup2_u:5283: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe gṛhe vā pratimālaye // GarP_2,40.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5285: pretāya tarpaṇaṃ kāryaṃ mantraiḥ paurāṇavaidikaiḥ // GarP_2,40.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5293: dānadharmarataḥ śāntaḥ praṇamya vāgyataḥ śuciḥ // GarP_2,40.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5295: bhaktyā tatra prakurvīta śrāddhatyekādaśaiva tu // GarP_2,40.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5298: haviṣyānnaṃ śubhaṃ mudrāṃ chatroṣṇīṣe ca calekam /
GP12garup2_u:5303: śaṅkhapātre tathā tāmre tarpaṇañca pṛthakpṛthak // GarP_2,40.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5310: ye devāsaścaturthe tu samudraṃ gaccha pañcame /
GP12garup2_u:5311: agnirjyoti stathā ṣaṣṭhe hiraṇyagarbhaḥ saptame // GarP_2,40.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5313: taśame yāḥ phalinīti piṇḍe caikādaśe tataḥ // GarP_2,40.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5321: sīsakaṃ tu bhavetpretaṃ tvatha vā darbhakaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5322: śannodevīti mantreṇa govindaṃ paścime nyaset // GarP_2,40.33 //
GP12garup2_u:5326: madhye maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā sthāpyo darbhamayo naraḥ // GarP_2,40.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5327: brahmā viṣṇustathā rudro yamaḥ pretaśca pañcamaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5330: japaṃ karyātpṛthaktatra brahmādau devatāsu ca // GarP_2,40.37 //
GP12garup2_u:5333: śaṅkhe vā tāmrapātre vā alābhe mṛnmaye 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5344: palāśasya ca vṛntānāṃ vibhāgaṃ śṛṇu kāśyapa // GarP_2,40.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5346: śatatrayeṇa ṣaṣṭyā ca vṛntaiḥ prokto 'sthisañcayaḥ // GarP_2,40.45 //
GP12garup2_u:5350: bāhuyugme śataṃ dadyātkaṭi deśe ca viṃśatim // GarP_2,40.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5354: nārikelaṃ śiraḥ sthāne tumbaṃ dadyācca tāluke /
GP12garup2_u:5356: antreṣu nālakaṃ dadyādbālakaṃ prāṇa eva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5357: vasāyīṃ medakaṃ dadyādgomūtreṇa tu mūtrakam // GarP_2,40.50 //
GP12garup2_u:5358: gandhakaṃ dhātavo deyo haritālaṃ manaḥ śilā /
GP12garup2_u:5359: retaḥ sthāne pāradañca purīṣe pittalaṃ tathā // GarP_2,40.51 //
GP12garup2_u:5360: manaḥ śilāṃ tathā gātre tilakalkañca sandhiṣu /
GP12garup2_u:5361: yavapiṣṭaṃ tathā māṃse madhu vai kṣaudrameva ca // GarP_2,40.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5365: vṛntākaṃ vṛṣaṇadvandve liṅge syādgṛñjanaṃ śubham // GarP_2,40.54 //
GP12garup2_u:5366: ghṛtaṃ nābhyāṃ pradeyaṃ syātkaupīne ca trapu smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5369: paridhānaṃ paṭṭasūtraṃ hṛdaye rukmakaṃ nyaset // GarP_2,40.56 //
GP12garup2_u:5370: ṛddhivṛddhī bhujau dvau ca cakṣuṣośca kapardakau /
GP12garup2_u:5373: sāgnike (kaiścā) cāpi vidhinā yajñapātraṃ nyasetkramāt // GarP_2,40.58 //
GP12garup2_u:5374: śirome śrīriti ṛcā punantu varuṇeti ca /
GP12garup2_u:5377: (tilā lohaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca kārpāsaṃ lavaṇaṃ tathā /
