GP12garup2_u:5378: saptadhānyaṃ kṣitirgāva ekaikaṃ pānaṃ samṛtam // GarP_2,40.61 //
GP12garup2_u:5379: tilapātraṃ tato dattvā padadānaṃ tathaiva ca // GarP_2,40.61*1 //
GP12garup2_u:5383: pretaṃmokṣaṃ tataḥ kuryāddhṛdi viṣṇuṃ prakalpya ca // GarP_2,40.63 //
GP12garup2_u:5384: oṃ viṣṇuriti saṃsmṛtya pretaṃ tanmṛtyumeva ca /
GP12garup2_u:5387: sarvaṃ varṣavidhiṃ kuryādevaṃ pretaśca muktibhāk // GarP_2,40.65 //
GP12garup2_u:5388: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde 'pamṛtyau sukhaduḥ khalābhālābhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma catvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5393: kārtikādiṣu māseṣu paurṇamāsyāṃ śubhe dine // GarP_2,41.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5396: vāpyāṃ kūpe gavāṃ goṣṭhe sthāpyāgniṃ vidhivattataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5399: puryukṣaṇānte homaṃ ca karyā dvai brāhmaṇena tu // GarP_2,41.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5400: āghārāvājyabhāgau ca cakṣuṣī ca pradā payet /
GP12garup2_u:5403: agnaye rudrāya śarvāya paśupataye ugrāya śivāya /
GP12garup2_u:5419: evaṃ vidhiḥ samāyuktaḥ pretamokṣe karoti hi // GarP_2,41.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5420: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde vṛṣotsarganirūpaṇaṃ nāmai kacatvāriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5428: nāsti bhamisamaṃ dānaṃ nāsti bhamisamo nidhiḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5429: nāsti satyasamo dharmo nānṛtātpātakaṃ param // GarP_2,42.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5430: agnerapatyaṃ prathamaṃ suvarṇaṃ bhūrvaiṣṇavī sūryasutāśca gāvaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5434: kṛtvā bahūni pāpāni raudrāṇi vipulāni ca /

GP12garup2_u:5441: vṛtticchede tathā vṛtteḥ karaṇaṃ lakṣadhenukam // GarP_2,42.9 //

GP12garup2_u:5443: ekāṃ hṛtvā śataṃ dattvā na tena samatā bhavet // GarP_2,42.10 //
GP12garup2_u:5444: svayameva tu yo dattvā svayameva prabādhate /
GP12garup2_u:5445: sa pāpī narakaṃ yāti yāvadābhūtasaṃplavam // GarP_2,42.11 //
GP12garup2_u:5447: avṛttikarśite dīne brāhmaṇe gakṣite yathā // GarP_2,42.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5449: yatpuṇyaṃ durbale traste brāhmaṇe parirakṣite // GarP_2,42.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5451: yuddhakāle viśīryante saikatāḥ setavo yathā // GarP_2,42.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5452: svadattāṃ paradattāṃ vā yo harecca vasundharām /
GP12garup2_u:5461: jvalantamagnimutsṛjya na hi bhasmani hūyate // GarP_2,42.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5462: saṃkrāntau yāni dānāni havyakavyāni yāni ca /
GP12garup2_u:5465: pratigrahācchrudhyati jāpyahomaṃ na yājanaṃ karma punanti vedāḥ // GarP_2,42.21 //
GP12garup2_u:5468: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde bhūdānādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma dvicatvāriṃśatamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5473: aindavābhyāṃ viśudhyanti dattvā dhenuṃ tathā vṛṣam // GarP_2,43.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5475: prāyaścittaṃ carenmātā pitā vānyo 'pi bāndhavaḥ // GarP_2,43.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5477: rājadaṇḍo na tasyāsti prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate // GarP_2,43.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5478: raktasya darśane daṣṭe āturā strī bhaved yadi /
GP12garup2_u:5479: caturthe 'hni padādīṃśca tyaktvā snātvā viśudhyati // GarP_2,43.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5481: snātvāsnātvāspṛśedenaṃ tataḥ śudhyet sa āturaḥ // GarP_2,43.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5482: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde śuddhinirūpaṇaṃ nāma tricatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5492: na teṣāṃ syānnava śrāddhaṃ na saṃskāraḥ sapiṇḍanam /
GP12garup2_u:5493: śrāddhāni ṣoḍaśoktāni na bhavanti ca tānyapi // GarP_2,44.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5497: ekādaśīṃ samāsādya śuklapakṣe ca kāśyapa // GarP_2,44.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5499: daśa piṇḍān ghṛtāktāṃśca darbheṣu madhusaṃyutān // GarP_2,44.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5500: yajñopavīti satilān dhyāyan viṣṇuṃ yamaṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5502: uddhṛtya miśritān paścāt tīrthe 'bhmaḥ su viniḥ kṣipet /
GP12garup2_u:5503: kṣipan saṃkīrtayennāma gotraṃ ca mṛtakasya ca // GarP_2,44.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5509: apare 'hani madhyāhne yamaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathārcayet // GarP_2,44.12 //
GP12garup2_u:5513: pretaṃ yamaṃ ca viṣṇuṃ ca smaran śrāddhaṃ samāpayet // GarP_2,44.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5515: pṛthagvā daśa piṇḍāṃśca pañca dadyāt krameṇa tu // GarP_2,44.15 //
GP12garup2_u:5516: prathamaṃ viṣṇave dadyādbrahmaṇe ca śivāya ca /
GP12garup2_u:5517: sabhṛtyāya śivāyātha pretāyāpi ca pañcamam // GarP_2,44.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5518: nāma gotraṃ smaret tasya viṣṇuśabdaṃ prakīrtayet /
GP12garup2_u:5522: dadyādannaṃ dvijānāṃ ca tāmbūlaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ tathā /
GP12garup2_u:5523: evaṃ śiṣṭatamaṃ vipraṃ hariṇyena prapūjayet // GarP_2,44.19 //
GP12garup2_u:5525: anuvrajya dvijān paścāt tyaktāmbho dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // GarP_2,44.20 //
GP12garup2_u:5536: arcayet tāṃ sitaiḥ puṣpaiḥ sugandhaiścandanenaca // GarP_2,44.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5542: dhenuṃ dattvā tato brūyāt prīyatāṃ nāgarāḍiti // GarP_2,44.28 //
GP12garup2_u:5545: pretatvānmocayet tāṃstu svargamārgaṃ nayet ca // GarP_2,44.29 //
GP12garup2_u:5546: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśākhye dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde durmaraṇe kāryākāryakriyādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma catuścatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5554: ekoddiṣṭaṃ na kuryātāṃ pratyabdaṃ tau tu pārvaṇam // GarP_2,45.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5555: yadā tvanyataraḥ sāgniḥ putro vāpyathavā pitā /
GP12garup2_u:5556: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ tatra kuryātāṃ kṣetrajaurasau // GarP_2,45.4 //
GP12garup2_u:5557: anagnayaḥ sāgnayo vā putrā vā pitaro 'pi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5558: ekoddiṣṭaṃ sutaiḥ kāryaṃ kṣayāha iti kecana // GarP_2,45.5 //
GP12garup2_u:5559: darśakāle kṣayo yasya pretapakṣe 'tha vā punaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5560: pratyabdaṃ pārvaṇaṃ kāryaṃ tasya sarvaiḥ sutairapi // GarP_2,45.6 //
GP12garup2_u:5563: bahirlūnāḥ sakṛllanāḥ śrāddhaṃ vṛddhimṛte sadā // GarP_2,45.7 //
GP12garup2_u:5564: kartavye pārvaṇe śrāddhe āśaucaṃ yadi jāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5566: ekoddiṣṭe tu samprāpte yadi vighnaḥ prajāyate /
GP12garup2_u:5567: māsenyasmin tithau tasyāṃ kuryācchrāddhaṃ tadaiva hi // GarP_2,45.9 //
GP12garup2_u:5570: ekakāle gatā sūnāṃ bahūnāmatha vā dvayoḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5572: dadyāt pūrvaṃ mṛtasyādau dvitīyasya tataḥ punaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5575: tārayitvā pitṝn sarvān prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim // GarP_2,45.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5578: yadā māso na vijñāto vijñātaṃ dinameva ca /

GP12garup2_u:5581: prasthānadinamāsau tu grāhyau śrāddhe mayoditau // GarP_2,45.16 //

GP12garup2_u:5586: gṛhasthe proṣite yacca kaścittu mriyate gṛhe /

GP12garup2_u:5592: dātrā boktrā ca na jñātaṃ sūtakaṃ mṛtakaṃ tathā /

GP12garup2_u:5603: dattvā tu dakṣiṇāṃ śaktyā namaskārairvisarjayet // GarP_2,45.27 //

GP12garup2_u:5612: patiputrānvitāḥ sādhvyo yoṣito 'ṣṭau ca bhāvayet // GarP_2,45.32 //

GP12garup2_u:5618: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīyāṃśe dharmakāṇḍe pretakalpe śrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde pratyābdikādiśrāddhanirūpaṇaṃ nāma pañcacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ

GP12garup2_u:5626: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayāte nānṛtam /

GP12garup2_u:5650: kharo vai bahuyājī syātkāko nirmantrabhojanāt // GarP_2,46.14 //
GP12garup2_u:5654: annaṃ paryuṣitaṃ vipre pradadatkukkaro bhavet // GarP_2,46.16 //

GP12garup2_u:5714: hā bhrātaḥ putra tāteti pralapanti muhurmuhuḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5717: taranti gopradānena tvanyathā ca patanti te // GarP_2,47.8 //

GP12garup2_u:5727: brāhmaṇāya pratīśrutya yamārthaṃ na dadāti tam /
GP12garup2_u:5728: āhūya nāsti yo brūyāttasya vāsastu tatra vai // GarP_2,47.13 //
GP12garup2_u:5734: godhanasya tṛṣārtasya vāpyā bhedaṃ karoti yaḥ // GarP_2,47.16 //
GP12garup2_u:5737: ete vasanti satataṃ mā vicāraṃ kṛthāḥ kvacit /
GP12garup2_u:5738: kṛpaṇo nāstikaḥ kṣudraḥ sa tasyāṃ nivasetkhaga // GarP_2,47.18 //
GP12garup2_u:5742: kṛtaghno garbhasantāpī vaitaraṇyāṃ sa majjati // GarP_2,47.20 //

GP12garup2_u:5750: anityāni śarīrāṇi vibhavo naiva śāśvataḥ // GarP_2,47.24 //
GP12garup2_u:5752: kṛṣṇāṃ vā pāṭalāṃ vāpi kuryādvaitaraṇīṃ śubhām // GarP_2,47.25 //
GP12garup2_u:5763: tartukāmo dadāmyenāṃ tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīṃ namaḥ // GarP_2,47.30 //
GP12garup2_u:5764: gāvo me agrataḥ santu gāvo me santu pārśvataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5765: gāvo me hṛdaye santu gavāṃ madhye vasāmyaham // GarP_2,47.31 //
GP12garup2_u:5767: sadakṣiṇā mayā dattā tubhyaṃ vaitaraṇīnamaḥ // GarP_2,47.32 //
GP12garup2_u:5770: pucchaṃ saṃgṛhya dhenvāśca agre kṛtvā tu vai vdijam /

GP12garup2_u:5773: anuvrajettu gacchantaṃ sarvaṃ tasya gṛhaṃ nayet // GarP_2,47.35 //
GP12garup2_u:5774: evaṃ kṛte vainateya sā saritsutarā bhavet /
GP12garup2_u:5778: mṛtasyaiva tu yaddānaṃ parokṣe tatsamaṃ smṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5779: svahastena tato deyaṃ mṛte kaḥ kasya dāsyatī // GarP_2,47.38 //
GP12garup2_u:5781: asthireṇa śarīreṇa sthiraṃ karma samācaret // GarP_2,47.39 //
GP12garup2_u:5782: avaśyameva yāsyanti prāṇāḥ prāghuṇi (ghūrṇi) kā iva // GarP_2,47.40 //
GP12garup2_u:5783: itīdamuktaṃ tava pakṣirāja viḍambanaṃ jantugaṇasya sarvam /
GP12garup2_u:5784: pretasya mokṣāya tadauddhvandaihikaṃ hitāya lokasya carecchubhāya tu // GarP_2,47.41 //
GP12garup2_u:5791: maraṇaṃ janma ca tathā pretatvañcaurdhvadaihikam // GarP_2,47.44 //
GP12garup2_u:5792: mayā proktaṃ vai muktyai nidānaṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12garup2_u:5795: dharmo jayati nādharmaḥ satyaṃ jayati nānṛtam /
GP12garup2_u:5796: kṣamā jayati na krodho viṣṇurjayati nāsurāḥ // GarP_2,47.46 //
GP12garup2_u:5798: yeṣāmeva sthirā buddhirna teṣāṃ durgatirbhavet // GarP_2,47.47 //
GP12garup2_u:5807: apavitraḥ pavitro vā sarvāvasthāṃ gatopi vā /
GP12garup2_u:5808: yaḥ smaretpuṇḍarīkākṣaṃ sa bāhyābhyantaraṃ śuciḥ // GarP_2,47.52 //
GP12garup2_u:5809: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpu- uttarakhaṇḍe dvitīdṛ dharmakādṛpretadṛśrīkṛṣṇagaruḍasaṃvāde karmavipākādinirūpaṇaṃ nāma saptacatvāriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12garup2_u:5813: ye martyaloke nivasanti mānavāste sarvajātau nidhanaṃ prayānti /
GP12garup2_u:5814: kāle svakīye nijapuṇyasaṃkhyayā vadanti lāka kathasva tanme // GarP_2,48.1 //
GP12garup2_u:5816: kenaiva puṇyena mudaṃ prayānti tiṣṭhanti kenaiva kulaṃ balaṃ vayaḥ // GarP_2,48.2 //
GP12garup2_u:5818: śrutvātha devo garuḍaṃ tvavocat smṛtvā vapuḥ karmabhayañca rūpam /
GP12garup2_u:5819: sṛṣṭā dharā yena carācaraṃ jagatsa yena śastā vihito yamo vibhuḥ // GarP_2,48.3 //
GP12garup2_u:5822: praviśyacāṅguṣṭhasame sa tatra vai taṃ prāpya dehaṃ svamandiram? // GarP_2,48.4 //

GP12garup2_u:5832: kṣattrānvayo vāpi viśonvayo vā śūdrānvayo vāpi hi nīcavarṇaḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5841: yaḥ kṣāttradehantu vihāya śocate raṇāṅgaṇe svāmivadhe ca gograhe /

GP12garup2_u:5856: varṇāśca catvāra iha praśastāḥ varṇeṣu dharmiṣṭhanarāḥ praśastāḥ /

GP12garup2_u:5862: mohādvināṣṭaṃ yadi garbhacintitaṃ smṛtaṃ punarmṛtyugate cadehe /

GP12garup2_u:5866: kṛcchreṇa lakṣmīḥ samupārjitā svayaṃ mayā na bhuktaṃ manasepsitaṃ dhanam /

GP12garup2_u:5874: na mātṛpūjā na ca viṣṇuśaṅkarau gaṇeśacaṇaḍyau na ca bhāskaro 'pi vā /

GP12garup2_u:5882: na bhūmidānaṃ na ca gopradānaṃ na vāridānaṃ na ca vastradānam /

GP12garup2_u:5888: na dṛśyate ko 'pi mṛtaḥ samāgato rājā yatirvā dvijapuṅgavo 'pi vā /

GP12garup2_u:6042: mṛdbhasmavāsī nityaṃ śvā sa kiṃ mukto bhaviṣyati // GarP_2,49.66 //
GP12garup2_u:6048: na pibanti mahītoyaṃ vratinaste bhavanti kim // GarP_2,49.69 //

GP12garup2_u:6066: na jānanti paraṃ tattvaṃ darvī pākarasaṃ yathā // GarP_2,49.78 //
GP12garup2_u:6067: śiro vahati puṣpāṇi gandhaṃ jānāti nāsikā /

GP12garup2_u:6074: ataḥ prajñāvatāṃ śāstraṃ tattvajñānasya lakṣaṇam // GarP_2,49.82 //

GP12garup2_u:6084: jñānādeva hi kaivalyaṃ nānyathā vinatātmajaḥ // GarP_2,49.87 //
GP12garup2_u:6086: tathaiva sarvakarmāṇi jñānameva hi kāraṇam // GarP_2,49.88 //

GP12garup2_u:6095: dve pade bandhamokṣāya namameti mameti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6097: tatkarma yanna bandhāya sā vidyā yā vimuktidā /

GP12garup2_u:6123: ahaṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma brahmāhaṃ paramaṃ padam /

GP12garup2_u:6128: sudhiyastāṃ gatiṃ yānti tānahaṃ kathayāmi te // GarP_2,49.109 //
GP12garup2_u:6130: dvandvairvimuktāḥ sukhaduḥ khasaṃjñairgacchantyamūḍhāḥ padamavyayaṃ tat // GarP_2,49.110 //
GP12garup2_u:6132: yaḥ snāti mānase tīrthe sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.111 //
GP12garup2_u:6134: pūrṇadṛṣṭiḥ prasannātmā sa vai mokṣamavāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.112 //

GP12garup2_u:6137: ayodhyā mathurā māyā kāśī kāñcī avantika /

GP12garup2_u:6139: iti te kathitaṃ tārkṣya mokṣadharmaṃ sanātanam /
GP12garup2_u:6141: mokṣaṃ gacchanti tattvajñā dhārmikāḥ svargatiṃ narāḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6142: pāpino durgatiṃ yānti saṃsaranti khagādayaḥ // GarP_2,49.116 //
GP12garup2_u:6147: ityuktvā viṣṇumāmantrya sa gataḥ kaśyapāśramam // GarP_2,49.118 //
GP12garup2_u:6148: sadyo dehāntaraṃ yāti yathā yāti vilambataḥ /
GP12garup2_u:6151: mārīco 'pi mudaṃ lebhe śrutvā vākyaṃ ramāpateḥ // GarP_2,49.120 //
GP12garup2_u:6157: mayā tu bhavatāṃ proktaṃ paraṃ guhyaṃ hareridam // GarP_2,49.123 //
GP12garup2_u:6158: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyānmartyo yo vāpyabhidadhāti ca /
GP12garup2_u:6159: ihāmutra ca loke sa sarvatra sukhamāpnuyāt // GarP_2,49.124 //
GP12garup2_u:6161: asya śravaṇataḥ puṇyaṃ tanmukto jāyate tataḥ // GarP_2,49.125 //
GP12garup2_u:6164: bhajata jitahṛṣīkāḥ kṛṣṇamenaṃ munīśaṃ samajani bata yasmādgīḥ sudhāsāradhārā /
GP12garup2_u:6165: pṛṣatamapi yadīyaṃ varṇarūpaṃ nipīya śrutipuṭaculukena prāpnuyādātmanaikyam // GarP_2,49.127 //
GP12garup2_u:6172: sa munirapi niśamya śaunakendro bahutaramānayati sma cātmani svam // GarP_2,49.130 //
GP12garup2_u:6174: dhanyo 'si sūta tvamihetyudairayanvyasarjayaṃstaṃ ca nivartite 'dhvare // GarP_2,
GP12garup2_u:6176: śṛṇvatāṃ kāmanāpūraṃ śrotavyaṃ sarvadaiva hi // GarP_2,49.132 //
GP12garup2_u:6184: vihāya yātanāṃ ghorāṃ dhūtapāpo divaṃ vrajet // GarP_2,49.136 //

GP12garup2_u:6186: iti śrīgāruḍe mahāpurāṇe dvitīyo dharmakāṇḍaḥ samāptaḥ
